Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"THIS IS MY 2ND KINDLE I HAVE THE 1ST KINDLE FIRE, AND IT STILL WORKS GREAT, BUT I WANTED SOMETHING FOR OUSIDE READING AND THIS IS PERFECT GREAT PRICE AND VERY LIGHT EASY TO HOLD! IF YOU WANT A EREADER FOR OUTSIDE ITS THE ONE!!!","AND IT STILL WORKS GREAT, BUT I WANTED SOMETHING FOR OUSIDE READING AND ...";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I found the app slow at like or tending to crash. This is more convenient and faster. Only drawbacks, I didn't have access to my books from other stores and publishers and the internal 4GB of memory are not enough. It's what has kept me from buying a paperwhite and voyager.",Five Stars;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Was completely on the fence if I wanted to keep expanding my book collection or jump into the 21st century of ereaders. My fiancee got me this as a Christmas gift and I couldn't be happier. If money is tight or you're just unsure if an ereader is for you go with this Kindle. Tons of sales and the price keeps dropping. I can see the convenience of the back-light on the newer paperwhite Kindle (maybe reading at night when significant other is trying to sleep, or in poorly lit areas) but this Kindle works just great.",Loving The World of Ereaders;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I have used Kindles since they first came out, and I personally love my basic Ereader because I read a lot and the batter life is much better than that of the tablets and I don't need the features that the Paperwhite offers.  My most recent purchase of a Kindle was as a gift for my husband's elderly aunt, she loves to read but is most housebound and on a fixed budget.  The ability to change fonts, order books digitally at a low price, and check out books from her local library without leaving her house are just what she needed.  My husband's aunt received her Kindle in the mail early in December and she calls me at least once a week to say how much she loves it!",A great ereader!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Absolutely Love my Kindle!  The size is perfect. Clear easy to read print. Quickly downloads your books upon purchasing, etc. While it would be nice if this one had a back-light, for the rare low-light reading occasion...The fact that it does not have a back-light is no big deal, since most of my reading is done outside and at all other times, in a well lit room.  Great Price!!! So glad I made this purchase!!!! Would totally buy it again.","LOVE my 6"" Glare Free Kindle!";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,Love it!  I especially love that I do not need to swipe or press a button to go to the next page. All that is needed is a tap to the screen. Very lightweight for reading in bed and small enough to carry in my small purse. Thank you!,"Kindle 6""";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Great value e-reader! I have both this e-reader and the Kindle Fire HD. When I bought this one, I wanted one that was a dedicated e-reader without the backlight. I used an earlier generation Kindle prior to getting my Kindle Fire and this e-reader. I am VERY happy with this new generation basic e-reader. It does everything I want my e-reader to do. Writing notes for research purposes is easy with the touchscreen and highlighting passages is very smooth as well. Very happy with this purchase!",Great value e-reader;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Love it, esay to use, easy on the eyes, can really get the print large if you need it. Love it, bought 3 of them for Christmas presents, one was a present for myself after I got my hands on the one I ordered for husband's present. We are enjoying them, charges fast, battery is holding so far. Easy on our older eyes. (60's)",Love it!! Great Grandma has gone modern!!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"It does everything it was advertised to do. I was using a 6 in Fire to read books on but this is much better. No glare, longer battery life, and it is much lighter than the Fire. For books you can;"t beat it.""
Review: Great reading tool.";;;;;

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"Really love the display, just like a page in a book with NO glare from anything.  I like the weight and size of it and that you can just tap to turn the page.  I turned in my old keyboard kindle for a credit and then bought this one and I am glad I did.  I wish it had more options for customizing the home page but that is a minor detail.",Really love the display;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love the small size and the greater contrast.  My first Kindle (which I still have and use) was a 2nd generation and I still love it, too.  The only problem with my new one, being a touchscreen, it can be very sensitive and change more than 1 page at a time.  This does not happen often, and I can easily deal with it.  The only time it is a real problem is when I'm reading and I start to fall asleep, I can hit the screen in several places without realizing it, and when I jerk awake, I have to figure out where I need to go.  This one will be even easier to pack for vacation since it is smaller.  I love Kindles!  Including my Kindle Fire, which I don't use for reading but I use it for lots of other things.",I love the small size and the greater contrast;;;;;;

Review: This is the MOST perfect reading device. Better than my daughters iPad mini and my iPad. No other device:1. Is readable in the sunlight.2. Is so lightweight you don't feel the weight in your purse.3. Has a battery that's lasts for weeks.4. Allows you to share books with family members.5. Is so inexpensive! $59 !!!
Title;;;;;;: KINDLE IS THE BEST DEVICE.. I purchased three. One each for my family members.;;;;;;

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"I am still trying to get the hang of my new kindle, as I am not really computer or Kindle smart.  It reacts really fast on changing pages,type size, etc. even when that's not what you want.  I am not use to having a touch screen on my Kindle.  My original Kindle (which was a gift from my son and daughter-in-law, because I read so much) was given to me about 3 1/2 years ago.  I have the Kindle fire which I use, but preferred my Kindle  for reading.  I will admit the touch screen is giving me problems.  And I can't seem to find the new books I download.  I hope to get a handle on this sooner than later.",Touch Screen Troubles;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I had a Kindle 6 but hated ""clicking"" the side buttons so decided to upgrade to the Kindle Touch. Didn't do Kindle Fire as I don't like the back light display for when I am reading. Love that the battery lasts longer, especially since I am a habitual ""forgot to plug Kindle in"" type of person. I am so use to touch screens for all my other devices I am finding I actually use it more now than I did my previous Kindle. Fits easily into my purse and accessories have been easy to find.",Happy On-The-Go Reader!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I do kind of wish we could change the contrast and make it a little brighter, but otherwise it is wonderful.  My visually impaired 6 year old has easily tripled the amount he is reading because of this device - worth every penny!",works like a charm!;;;;;;

Review: This thing has a display that's a nasty grey-green. It looks like something that's dying a slow death. Pictures are a foggy mess.I sent it back immediately. Avoid this piece of garbage.
Title;;;;;;: It looks like something that's dying a slow death;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I loved mine, but I returned it. Cause I'm going to get a Kindle with built in Wifi for anywhere book pick up. I also couldn't really afford it at the time. So I returned it. But it is a good device. I just wish that the Kindle would make it good with a stylus and turn it into a journal notebook too.","I loved mine, but I returned it";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I got this kindle at a discount price. It is really surprising me! It is a very comfortable reading experience. It is small and lightweight, comparable to a paperback book. The screen is not reflective at all. I hated to bring heavy books when traveling. This device saved me!",It is a very comfortable reading experience;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"My only ""issues"" are I wish it had a light and/or that the screen was just the smallest bit brighter. I can't believe how light it is and downloading books on this is a thousand times faster than on a computer, phone or tablet. Super fast! I can easily sit on the couch or bed and hold it in one hand and my arm doesn't get tired. For someone like me who wants to read but doesn't have the room in their home for large shelves or really wants to see what reading on an eReader is all about I would recommend this as a ""starter"" version. If you find you really like it the more expensive versions would probably be the way to go on down the road.",Good starter;;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"This is a downgrade from the previous version.What you gain with the touchscreen is more than offset by the downgrade to a cheap plastic casing. This Kindle feels something you would buy because you can't afford a Kindle. And this lack of quality is not something you get used to. I have been using this Kindle for months and it still feels cheap to me.The only thing preventing me from switching to the Paperwhite, which my wife uses and which is made of noticeably better materials, is that the Paperwhite does not allow you to completely turn off the screen lighting while you are reading. If device lighting is not an issue for you, buy the Paperwhite. If you are like me and do not want to stare into a lighted device at the end of the day, wait a few months and hope that the next generation of the basic Kindle is built to higher standards, with better materials.",Cheap materials. Feels like a Kindle knockoff;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Great software features with Goodreads integration. The screen resolution is actually brighter, even though the DPI remains at 167 like previous generations. For an entry level reader, this can't be best (especially when on sale). It gives you a lightweight and distraction free introduction to what reading should be...a glare free, minimally distracting reading experience that tablets and smart phones simply can't duplicate. It's very easy on the eyes, and despite a plastic housing, it feels well built. The lack of a back light can easily and inexpensively be remedied by a plethora of cases with built in lights or LED reading lamps. It's a great spare reader to have on hand for children too (particularly when I don't want them to have my new Voyage:).",Great Entry Level Experience at a Fantastic Value;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I recived this for my birthday, since I LOVE to read. I literally cannot tell you how awesome it is. Every single thing about it is a complete plus, but there is two downfalls. It is sometimes a bit slow and it also leaves a faded mark of the text if you go to a new page. Those minuses are NOT a big deal. If you're not sure to buy it or not, man up and do. This device is great, You'll love it!*UPDATE* Oops. Go ahead and laugh at me. I reviewed the wrong item. I was reviewing the kindle paperwhite 2nd gen. Sorry, guys.","Arguably the Best Reading Device, for a GEAT Price";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Bought this to replace a stolen iPad mini. Obviously it isn't quite the same, but it was so cheap compared to a new iPad mini that I decided to buy it. I have been thrilled with the purchase. I have loaded PDF's onto it to review some manuals for work. Depending on the quality of the PDF they can be pretty easy to read.  Other PDFs are hard to read because their quality is so bad. One thing I like is the option to turn it into landscape mode. This thing is so basic I was not expecting that feature. However, this doesn't compare the the vast number of apps made for Apple products. If you want a tablet to use for more than just reading DO NOT buy this.Reading on this is so much better than the iPad. My eyes don't hurt after reading for hours, unlike my iPad mini retina display which would make my eye sight blurry for a little afterwards.This kindle is super basic (read other reviews), but awesome. I would recommend this for someone who wants to use it for reading.",Purchased to replace a stolen iPad Mini Retina;;;;;;

Review: I bought this kindle to read outside.  It works great.  I have a kindle hd but it doe not work well on the beach.  This one does work outside and it weighs a lot less then the hd one.  I get to read out side in bright light without adjusting the brightness.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"This is probably the best thing I've ever bought. I was against buying a kindle because I LOVE having books in my hand. But, this is the lightest ""book"" I've ever carried and having multiple books is AWESOME! I skip around from book to book, so, this is fantastic for me.",This is probably the best thing I've ever bought;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love finally having a Kindle. For so many reasons, I couldn't be happier with this device! I don't really feel I need to go into great detail, since there are so many highly detailed reviews here, but I want to throw my two cents in. I didn't think I'd love this thing as much as I do. OK, you convinced me. My favorite things about it are: public domain books, the built-in dictionary feature, vocabulary builder, being able to read PDFs, and borrowing from my library from the comfort of my couch.",I love finally having a Kindle;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Although the touch screen is a bit too sensitive (I've accidentally changed the page by breathing on it, like seriously what) I love this kindle. It's got better storage than my old one did and it's easy to find all my books. I wish that the special offers on the lock screen would sometimes actually be something halfway aesthetically pleasing, but I didn't buy it to look at the ads.",It serves its purpose;;;;;;

Review: I had been borrowing my wife's Kindle because I was having to use my iPad for other things and needed it to keep its charge up. This Kindle has taken a little getting used to but it still works a lot like my wife's older model.

Rating: 2.0 out of 5 stars,"to hard to find the book I am looking for.  How can I list titles only.  Difficult to find instructions.  The original kindle was much more usableWhat I need is complete instructions on line, so I can make copies.",to hard to find the book I am looking for ...;;;;;;

Review: I never thought I'd buy one of these but because you had such a great price on Black Friday I bought one because some of the book I wanted were not out in paper.  The prices were so low on the first three books I bought it paid for the kindle.
Title;;;;;;: ... one of these but because you had such a great price on Black Friday I bought one because some ...;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I LOVE this. For years, I have been resisting getting a Kindle. I always love to feel and smell a good book but my husband eventually decided he knew better and got it for me anyway. He was right! I still love my hardbound books but the Kindle is great for roadtrips and traveling! I don't have to lug around a suitcase of books and new books are so much cheaper on the Kindle store! I love all of the features, like highlighting or the in-book dictionary (you touch a word and it defines it for you. SO much better than trying to remember what word you don't know that you wanted to look up.) Overall, just a great, reliable product with extremely good battery life. Also the ""special offers"" don't bother me at all. When my kindle is off, it goes black but when I let it fall asleep there's a personalized offer on the screen - normally about a new book or a case or something along those lines. It doesn't drain the battery and I got free Kindle Unlimited for a month! Also, it arrived very quickly!",Just a great product;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"N'ayant plus de place chez moi pour des livres, j'ai t obliger de trouver une alternative. J'ai commenc avec Kobo et aujourd'hui j'ai essay Kindle car il y avait des livres qui m'intressaient dont je n'avais pas accs. Quoi qu'il en soit je suis trs satisfaite du Kindle. Simple et rapide  d'utilisation, je le recommande  tous les amoureux de la lecture et qui comme moi n'ont plus d'espace ou encore pour pouvoir emener partout des centaines de livres en un seul. Apprcier et profiter !",N'hsiter pas !!!;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"I purchased this Kindle because the glare from my Kindle Fire HD was causing eye strain.  For the most part, it is good as an e-reader.  The major problems I've had, are that sometimes the pages don't want to turn, and I have to tap or swipe repeatedly.  Other times, I barely touch it and it will go forward or back several pages.  Also, it's very slow compared to my Kindle Fire.",it is good as an e-reader;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Nice, though my aging eyes would appreciate a whiter background. But I'm glad it's not backlit. Size is fine. The touchscreen is just a little bit unpredictable, sometimes over-responding, sometimes not responding. I wonder if this has anything to do with cold fingers, as this happens to me with other electronics, too. Overall, I'm pleased with this.","Nice, though my aging eyes would appreciate a whiter ...";;;;;;

Review: This is fabulous. I have been reading my kindle books on my iPad. After looking at the computer all day at work though I didn't want to look at a computer screen anymore. I finally decided to try this and it really feels like reading a regular paper book. So much better than reading on my iPad!

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"The product itself is lovely and exactly what I wanted for my daughter.  HOWEVER I'm still REALLY annoyed.Only after I purchased this device did I find out that the FreeTime subscription (which ensures your child won't be able to accidentally purchase content) can't transfer public library materials already checked out to your device.  So if your child checks out digital materials from your local public library and wants to read them on your Kindle they can't do it safely in FreeTime.  They have to read it from the home screen where they can access EVERYTHING.  I suppose this is more a failing of the FreeTime software than the device but if that is the case, why is that a KindleFire will allow this functionality?  Why can't I have this function on my device??90% of the reason I bought this Kindle as part of the Kindle for Kids bundle is so that my daughter could easily access free library content.  I'm annoyed that in order to allow her to do that it appears I have to give her access to my Amazon account.  I'm hoping to find another way than FreeTime (or getting her her own Amazon account) to block my daughter from purchasing content.  But I haven't found it yet and that's another problem I'm having with Kindle - the difficulty of finding answers to specific questions.",BEWARE: FreeTime Functionality for 7th Generation Kindle - No Library Check-outs!!;;;;;;

Review: This kindle is just the right size for me. I also dont think that the screen is sensitive at all.I find that I need to use a stylis to go to the next page. I hope this helps in making someone's decision to buy this new kindle easier.
Title;;;;;;: This kindle is just the right size for me. ...;;;;;;

Review: This was a surprise gift from a friend. What a great surprise! And I was reading a book as soon as I found one on amazon. Itwas quick to do and the kindle is very easy to read. Even with my 60 something eyes. I do not even have a smart phone so thekindle was unexplored technology for me. The kindle is a fun way to read books.
Title;;;;;;: What a great surprise! And I was reading a book as ...;;;;;;

Review: I have always enjoyed reading and this device makes it so easy to do. The touch screen is effortless and direct access to the Amazon store makes purchasing more books fast and convenient. It is great for causal readers and avid readers also. This kindle doesn't have a backlight but I prefer it that way since I stare at a computer screen and smart phone all day. Greatly recommend this product!

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love this device.  It has a dictionary that I can touch a word that I do not know the meaning of and it will give the meaning to me in a few seconds.  I like the lock page where I stop reading.  I am still learning about the device, but I love it.",Smart Reader;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I already own a Kindle Fire, which  I adore. In some ways, however, this device has some advantages over my Fire. Its text is quite easy to read in nearly all all lighting situations. It keeps a charge for a VERY long time and reading is more pleasurable to the eye on the Kindle 6"". I also seem to be able to read faster on this device.  I find it complements my Kindle Fire, for magazines and books witch color illustrations, I rely upon  my  Fire, for text only works, like novels or short story compilations, the Kindle 6"" is the device I prefer. It  was, for me, a quality product and a smart purchase.",this is better than my Kindle Fire;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I have had a kindle fire for a while, and always found it near impossible to use it in sunlight. I love to read so suggested my husband bought me an e-reader.  I received my reader a few weeks ago and took it on holiday to New Orleans.  It's brilliant! I have carried it in my handbag all over the southern states, it's so light it adds next to no weight to what I was carrying. I used it on the plane, in the car, by the pool. It went everywhere with me.  It is so light you can use it with one hand, you can adjust the font size, to suit your needs. It holds thousands of books which you can organise into categories/ authors, the page turn is quick and easy with a light tap. The battery lasts for many days / weeks on a single charge. All I can really say is it is what I have been looking for,  for a long time.  It's 'The bee's knee' s'",I love to read so suggested my husband bought me an ...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love all Kindle products.  I have a Kindle Fire but this is really nice if you really want the ""reading a book"" experience.  Having a device without a bright light while reading is easy on the eyes and comfortable.  The device fits perfectly in your hand and easy to tote along wherever you go.",Love Kindle Products;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"Touch screen and software is much better than old version, also resolution and refresh speed is superb. Unfortunately the material of the reader is quite a downgrade it is all made of plastic and feels cheap in my hands, also the device is too thick for an e-reader. After using paperwhite and voyage, I miss background light a lot. It's really cheap, but I would not mind several extra bucks for better material and thinner design.",Much better software in inferior case;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Got this on a promo for $29 and we love it.  My wife said in hindsight that we should have gotten more than 1.  I wish it had the ability to read the book and had a light option, but with this being the bottom-end model, it is understandable that some of the features had to be cut to save cost.  Those items being missing weren't deal breakers for us, especially at the $29 price we paid.  If we were paying full price, however, I'd probably rather drop a few more dollars for the more feature-rich paperwhite models.I hope to one day see a full-color e-ink display in one of these.  LCD displays for book-reading gets the job done, but it isn't ideal for some of the same reasons Amazon teases the iPad for in their commercials.  It's a bit silly considering Amazon has a direct competitor with iPad with the Kindle Fire product line.",Great deal for the promo price paid!;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Love the size and weight, even with cover.  Easy to throw in purse and take with you.  Only glitches for me is that the screen is a bit too dark and the pages a little tricky to turn. If there is a way to lighten the screen, please let me know!",Almost perfect;;;;;;

Review: I bought this kindle for when I go to the beach or the park and find it hard to read on my Kindle Fire HDX due to the glare.  I like that it is small and can be carried easily. I also like the touch screen feature.  It's much better than my first Kindle with the press button page turner.
Title;;;;;;: I like that it is small and can be carried easily;;;;;;

Review: I am very satisfied with my Kindle.  I can read easily in bright sunlight.  It is easy to use and performs just as advertised.  I do miss seeing my Library in color as it is on my I-pad but that in no way detracts from my satisfaction.  I will recommend this product without reservarion.
Title;;;;;;: I am very satisfied with my Kindle;;;;;;

Review: Am happy to have the Kindle to use just as a reader. I love my Kindle Fire but the screen for the HD is to hard to use outside. Since I spend a lot of time at the beach the new Kindle is just perfect with it's non glare screen and very light weight. Couldn't beat the price on it either.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I have always been a huge kindle fan. Started with a kindle fire 1st generation as a birthday gift from my college friends and now moved to a different direction with the Kindle e-reader. It's super easy on the eyes and feels as good as reading on real paper.  Only complaint I have use that the edges easily catches dust. Other than that, I can never put it down",It's super easy on the eyes and feels as good as ...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Love this product. Simple, clean design and affordable. In the past I used an older Kindle with a physical keyboard. I'm still not sure which one I prefer. This one is a bit smaller and requires some getting used to. So far, so good.",Love this product;;;;;;

Review: Awesome product. I just love it. I hesitated to buy this for quite some time assuming that it might not make much difference than tablets. But it does. It almost looks like paper. Must buy for anyone who reads a lot and gives more productivity.
Title;;;;;;: Awesome product. I just love it;;;;;;

Review: LOVE. LOVE. LOVE. my kindle. This is the third one I've bought. I'm a bit rough on them (military wife living international with homeschooled kids) so my stuff gets wear & tear! My kindle is my lifeline.My only regret is not getting the one with the built in light. It makes a big difference in dark rooms & travel.

Excellent Kindle for an 11 year old!  However her previous Kindle had the light built into the cover....Make a basic Kindle for a child with a built in light that is reasonably priced...like the Fire but less expensive and lighter

Perfect e-reader at a great price! If you have Prime the kindle first book and borrowing books for free is an amazing deal. Does not have a light (which is clearly written in the description) so get the paperwhite if you want the backlight.
Title;;;;;;: Perfect e-reader at a great price;;;;;;

Review: I used my iPad for reading and I always got a head ache so I took a chance on the kindle and now I can read for hours and hours every night and I don't get headaches anymore. Its not a perfect device but Im back to reading 3-5 books a week and thats what makes me happy so I give this 5 stars and would recommend it to anyone. I also LOVE that it connected to my goodreads account!

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"This is the first Kindle I have owned, Paperwhite.  I do nothing but read.  But setting outside with a Nook or tablet was really a downer.  And because I do read all the time, recharging the battery after a couple of hours was a chore.  I can read all day on the Paperwhite and still have plenty of battery time left.  Thank you Kindle!",The best thing ever!;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Darker words for more comfortable reading, compare to Kindle 3.Much easier control and page turnin in touch screen.But no sound no speech, and seems no game (activity) either, well, the last one turn out to be a feature because kids will not be attracted to games when they are reading.","Darker words for more comfortable reading, compare to Kindle 3";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"If you love reading but cant seem to find the space or want a cheaper alternative to hard copy books this kindle is for you. I believe this version is the best for its lightweight feel, massive storage space and relatively cheap price. The display isnt back-lit like other versions but I really like this as it makes it seem even more like a regular book. So, do be warned if you want to read in darker lighting situations.",PERFECT FOR BOOKWORMS;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"It took me a while to figure out how to use it because it works differently from previous kindles,but once I learned how to use it, it works great! I love it!Some have complained about you turn the page, but when you think about,that is how you turn a page on a real book. Right to Left with the same motion.Also the clarity and battery life is excellent. I don't need color or any of the features of a tabletbecause when i read a book I want just type in black and white with my imagination.The philosophy and organization structure of how it is constructed is well done.Works for me! bpysz",it works great! I love it;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Great device for book lovers. I have purchased two of these as gifts and both parties have been thrilled. This is a first for them both and I doubt they will ever go back to reading actual books again. I myself have one, and LOVE it.",Best e reader brand;;;;;;

Review: I thought this kindle did text to speech but it doesn't . That was the mean reason I was getting it. I did keep it because it was small and it fit in my hand bag . Works great and the middle size between my iPhone and iPad.
Title;;;;;;: Works great and the middle size between my iPhone and iPad;;;;;;

Review: I love Kindle - can't live without it.  So when my original Kindle that was given to me in 2008 finally wouldn't work I was frantic.  As soon as the new one arrived my old one mysteriously started functioning again.  So now I have them both working and can really compare the functions.  I still prefer the old one with the keyboard at the bottom.  It's easier for me to access the keyboard WHEN I WANT TO and not by accident as always happens with the new touchscreen Kindle.  I like the smaller overall size of the new one but not enough to give up the keyboard of the original.  I'm constantly touching the screen by accident and then have to figure out how to get rid of it.  I know I'll get used to it but it's annoying to have to do so.  The lighter weight of the newer one is nice considering that the weight of books is the reason I tried the Kindle to begin with.  I will eventually get used to the newer version.  Don't see much difference in the readability of them.
Title;;;;;;: I love Kindle - can't live without it;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I bought this for my husband who is a staunch paperback fan and he likes it. So, a conversion may have just occurred. Plus, we can read the same books together. I like that part! This will be my 3rd kindle purchase. I bet you can guess I love my kindle :)",I like that part;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"A little strange to get used to at first after using my smartphone to read for a while but the kindle is really great in the long run! The display technology is really really easy on the eyes since there's no backlight and it's not LED and really feels like you're reading a real book. Also, I can literally download a hundred books whereas before I had to download, read, then delete a few at a time on my iPhone. The battery life is phenomenal and so far I've only charged it once! The past three months, I traveled around the country multiple times every week and it's the perfect companion for airplane trips both long and short! Size is great too for travel and fits into most every bag. Also, you can send pdfs of books to your @kindle email address (you get a unique one for each tablet when you buy one) and they get automatically added to your kindle cloud already converted to the right format and ready for download! All in all an amazing buy for those who love to read for pleasure and especially those who are trying to read more (like me). Even on short bus or car rides, I can whip this out and read for 10 minutes which is better than not reading at all in my busy schedule!","Great for all readers, especially those who are trying to read more and/or travel alot!";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"This is my first Kindle, therefore I can not compare with the previous version. Anyway, this kindle is perfect for me: small size and easy to handle. I really like it. It is true that sometimes tapping on the screen doesn't work at first, but it is just a matter of practice. Maybe the only thing that I do not like so much is adverstisment of products different than the ones related to Kindle. For new kindle users I really recommend it. :)",Great for new kindle users :);;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I'm an avid reader and a supporter of printed books, but I really love my new Kindle! It's light for carrying. fits in almost any bag, and it's a great way to ""test"" novels for it's worth. If the book is so great worth buying in print and hold a place on my shelf, then reading it on the Kindle can help me assess that. Unfortunately, there is some glue or something on the screen when I received it, so now I have to return it and repurchase. Other than that, everything about it is great. I love the dictionary and I don't mind the ads. They're not very intrusive, so I'd rather save the $30 to buy more books!",Great product! I'm in love!;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I have an older kindle that I like just fine, but I always accidentally touch the buttons that turn the pages.  That is why I wanted the touchscreen kindle.  I do like that aspect of this kindle, but I have the same problem;"  touchy page turning!  Is it me
Review: or is it my kindle?""

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Love, Love Love it.  Syncs with my smart phone app and the no glare screen it great when you are outside.  Even on the Beach!!!!!  The battery lasts all week and I didn't have to charge it once on a week long cruise and I read several hours every day.  The only negative is its not back lit so you cant read it in the dark.  You need to upgrade to the Kindle Paperwhite for that","Love, Love Love it";;;;;;
4.0 out of 5 stars,"I am a Nook ereader user but my Nook was a first generation;" you know with the buttons on the side
Review: 3g download
Title;;;;;;: etc.  I wanted an ereader that was more current and smaller and much lighter.  The Kindle 6"""" glare-free ereader is exactly what I want.  My actual reading space is the same as my Nook ereader.  My only complaint is that the Kindle ereader background light seems dark and there is no control for brightness.  I would like to make my background screen lighter than what it is but I can""""t. Mine includes the ads but they are of no bother at all.  As others have already noted
column4: the ads only appear on the screen when it is locked.""
column5: I would like to make my background screen lighter than what it ...";;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Already set up for me right out of the box...I wasn't expecting that.  It is easy to use and fast.  There are not hiccups when changing pages, fonts or applications.  Best of all, I can read in bright outdoor light wearing sunglasses.",It is easy to use and fast;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Great black and white ereader to use outside and inside! No backlight for nightime reading which is fine for me as I have other readers, but this one is so lightweight and easy to use. The only initial concern I had was the special offers screen staying on all the time, but I have gotten use to this and actually check out the offers when not reading.",Great black and white ereader to use outside and inside;;;;;;

Review: It did not live up to the level of my other Kindle's. I thought that it would read to you but it doesn't. Also the directions weren't what I expected.The cover did not help matters as the quality was not as good as I expected again.-+
Title;;;;;;: The cover did not help matters as the quality was not as good as I expected again;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Perfect e-reader for my 8 and 10 year old. Small and very light-weight. Long lasting battery. Easy to download e-books from our public library. Note this does not light up for night-time reading and is just an e-reader, not a tablet.",Perfect for grade school kids;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,I'm in the process of acquainting myself with this new Kindle.  I haven't figured out the cloud yet.  Downloading the books I had on my old one to the new was pretty easy but I wish the ones that were in my cloud would have gone back to the cloud.,"Kindle 6"" glare Free Touch screen";;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"Preferred previous Kindle with buttons,it seemed easier to use. And it only comes with an adapter to charge from a computer. Fortunately, my cell phone has an adapter that fits. It seems smaller than the older kindle.I am getting used to it.",Liked my old Kindle;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Not a huge fan of the touch screen and it took getting used to, but it works well. It s easier to navigate, but the touch screen can turn pages when you're not ready because it's sensitive. I was happy that it fit into my old case and wasn't significantly different in size. Good for the price.",Good for the price.;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Pros:Simple, intuitive interface.A whole library worth of books you can carry around. It's hard to overestimate the awesomeness of that.Really opens up the world of fan-fiction (hpmor anyone?)No back-lighting. Could be a con for some people, but I prefer reading by ambient light.Cons:Claims that it looks like printed text are exaggerated. It's noticeably pixellated.It's not glare-free. You have to find the right angle.Bottom line:I like the device. A lot. But some of the marketing claims are overblown. If you temper your expectations, it's a great, relatively inexpensive reader.",Claims that it looks like printed text are exaggerated;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Great product.  I bought this as an extra for traveling and buy the pool.  I love my Kindle Fire, but this has a longer battery life.  I really like the feature of the Kindles that allows you to read on multiple devices and have them go to your current page when switching.",Great product. I bought this as an extra for ...;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I like it. It is small, light-weighted, and i love the dictionary and the popular highlight! Also it doesn't hurt my eyes, feel like i'm reading from a real paper except the feeling of the real book. My first Kindle. I am impressed. It's a simple e-book product, good for people who want to read only, nothing fancy.","Good for people who want to read only, nothing fancy";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Great and simple book tablet! Yes, there is no light so you can't read in the dark, but it looks just like a book and doesn't hurt my eyes! Also it's very easy to get onto wi-if and order books through Amazon. Very light weight and small enough to throw into my purse. So happy I got this!",Great and simple book tablet;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"When my first Kindle died I nearly went into withdrawal waiting for my new one to arrive.  I do like the button system on the sides for page turning far better than this newest model.  They took the ""touch"" system from Nook and that was what I didn't like about my Nook.",I do like the button system on the sides for page turning ...;;;;;;

Review: Before you purchase this please be advised that this Kindle does not have a light.This is a VERY basic eReader. You can shop and download books from the Kindle Store.. you can also use Good Reads through this Kindle. It is not able to surf the internet or play video games. It is meant for someone who just wants to be able to read books outside on an ereader and not have a glare.It is perfect for what it does.
Title;;;;;;: Good for what it is meant for;;;;;;

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"This did exactly what I wanted it to do:  be visible and read-able in bright sunshine on a cruise ship and beach.  I downloaded some of my books into it and it worked great. I wanted the version with the built-in light for night-time reading, but Best Buy was out of them when I went to get it.  Nevertheless, daytime reading in bright sunlight was the reason I bought it, and it was perfect for that.",Perfect even in bright sunshine;;;;;;

Review: Perfect grab n' go or snuggle up for the afternoon buddy. Love being able to hold it while in bed without the threat of a heavy book falling on my face or tiring my wrist/arm. It's the best thing to be able to whip out my novel instead of my iphone when stuck in a long line or on the train.
Title;;;;;;: Perfect grab n' go or snuggle up for the afternoon ...;;;;;;

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"Had a couple older Kindle models, so my review is based on my personal experience and unfulfilled expectations from supposed to be the leader of e-Reader pack.Pro: Screen contrast got better. Touch screen is (no pun intended) a nice touch.Con: The Kindle case is chunky, uncomfortable and awkward to hold. You can't turn a page with one hand as with an older Kindle by pressing on the side buttons. The case made from a composite material which has worst texture feels compare with an older model. May be Kindle ergonomic department lost touch (again, no pun intended) to what a nice book feels like to hold, but this is just my take on it.Unknown: Haven't check on battery life, but don't expect much, because the touch e-ink screen is an active device compare to a regular e-ink screen.Wish list: lighter weight, a little larger screen and softened with memory case would be attractive for my next purchase.Disclaimer: I waited and bought it for $50 from Amazon. So all my grumble were overweighted by $30 difference to a regular price.For this price it is the best e-Reader on the US market!",Screen contrast got better. Touch screen is (no pun intended) a nice ...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I am addicted to this Kindle.  It's small, light-weight, and portable.  There is no glare, so you can read forever!  I love the vocabulary builder which stores the words I look up.  I am connected to Goodreads on the Kindle, so my friends and I can suggest books to read.  It was so easy to set up.  My one problem was finding a case for it.  The one suggested that I order was not the right fit.  Luckily my mom had one that fit.",Awesome;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I really enjoy reading on this thing.  Ads are a non-issue.  I keep it in airplane mode and the battery lasts for weeks without a charge.  Only negative is the touch screen page turning, which never seems to turn back a page correctly when you want to.Otherwise, I'm not missing a real book much at all.",Almost as good as a book.;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Love my Kindle!! First one I've owned and am really enjoying it. I love how when you turn it off when you're finished reading, it takes you right back to the page you were on the next time you power it on. Great device. Highly recommend it!!",Love my Kindle;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Loved my kindle keyboard but after only 3 years battery no longer holds charge. Frustrated the new kindle doesn't fit in my wonderful kindle keyboard leather case. Like the new kindle touch screen a lot, but cases available were extremely disappointing, only plastic hinge which is sure to tear with use, doubles weight of the device AND has no closure so can pop open. That being said, I don't like the touch screen's way of cataloging books (by their cover picture) and would love a paper manual to be able to refer to doecific ""how to"" -if you go on line it's s BLOG of other users! For instance how to organize books by author in chronological order of original publishing since I read a lot of series by same authors. The device itself is functional and a good price.",Loved my kindle keyboard but after only 3 years battery ...;;;;;;

Review: I decided to start reading more and this was the easiest solution. The price was right and it is so easy to use. My birthday is coming up  and asked all gifters to get me giftcards for Amazon so I can get busy reading. Plus I've gone to the free selections and have some in mind there as well.YAY AMAZON!!!

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"After reading some of the bad reviews I was nervous about purchasing this new Kindle. I recently broke my prior Kindle (recliner crunched it) and was lost without it. I purchased this new Kindle and I could not be more happy with it. I think that if you are already accustomed to electronics with touch screens this will be no problem. One negative thing I found about this Kindle is that the new one is made of plastic, where the other one was metal. I do believe that the older kindle felt better in my hand, but I got used to this new one with no problems. It would not stop me from buying it.",Love It!!;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"An older model was easier to handle. This one has fewer places to hold it and its too easy to flip pages without realizing it. Then I have to hunt for my place, since it can flipa single or multiple pages. Also, I can change font, but not space between lines. It means to much white space, more page turning, and more opportunities for that inadvertent page flip to happen.",Not hand friendly;;;;;;

Review: I have an older version which I liked but I love the touchscreen and it is so easy to navigate. I thought about getting the paper white but I tried a friend's and the light was a little to bright for me. This fits the bill.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Love the new size and the fact that it is a touchscreen.  This will be perfect to take on vacation---fits much better in my purse/carry on and it is lighter so it won't weigh down my bag.  I have only had this since Christmas so this review is not going to cover much, but very pleased so far.",Love the new size and the fact that it is ...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Bought on Prime day for $49.  Worth every penny.  I have the kindle app on my 10"" tablet but I prefer to read on my new kindle.  Nice size to pack around.  It's my new little stress reducer.  Thank-you Amazon Prime.",Nice size to pack around;;;;;;

Review: Love my new kindle! This is my third one! This is the lightest and smallest and perfect for reading. I had the keyboard ones in the past and it's not really necessary if you just want to read. I keep coming back to Kindle for my reading as I love the way the screen looks like paper without the glare but I can have all the books I want without the paper! :)

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"It's obvious that a lot of thought went into designing the Kindle. It feels good in your hands. It's intuitive to use. It's super light.I love that it doesn't have a bunch of buttons. Just one small button on the bottom.It comes with ads but they don't bother me. It might even be a good way to discover books that I want to read (although that hasn't happened yet).It's important to note that this Kindle doesn't have a built-in light. I didn't realize that when I bought it. But now that I know, I still would have chosen this one because the built-in light isn't worth the extra cost to me.",Love it;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I purchased 2 of these for my younger children and I am so happy with my purchases. I have yet to be unhappy with anything I have ever purchased from Amazon. These reader's are one of those purchases you make and think, "" why didn't I do y that sooner!"" Hehe ",Great reader.;;;;;;

Review: This is my third Kindle! I had the first generation and the Fire and was looking for one that had much better battery life. This one finallyfits the bill for me! It is so lightweight and holds a charge WAY longer than the Kindle fire. Love it and best of all it is priced just right!
Title;;;;;;: I had the first generation and the Fire and was looking for one that had much better battery life;;;;;;

Review: I am so happy with my new kindle. What i like most about the kindle is that i can read for an extended amount of time and it is so light that my my arm does not hurt unlike when i read with my nook or even a book. I also like that you can skim through the pages and not lose your place. These are just some of the things i love about the kindle but there are many more. I would recommend this kindle as the #1 e-reader.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love my new Kindle.  I love the size and the touch screen.  It is my third Kindle.  My first was  Christmas gift a few years ago.  I then bought a Kindle Fire.  I am a Prime member and love the fact that I can do email, watch movies, surf the internet or read using my Fire.  I use my new Kindle to do most of my reading.  I can use one hand to hold it and turn the pages with the touch screen.  I love my Kindles and the world of entertainment they bring me.  I have bought my wife two Kindle.  One for mainly reading and a Kindle Fire for movies, email, etc.  I also bought my son a Kindle Fire for Christmas 2013.  We are all Kindle lovers and appreciate the many great offers that Amazon makes available for Kindle owners.",I love my new Kindle;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I picked up reading after a while, but now, this little thing is inseparable from me.  It is magnificent when traveling, stealing little moments of waiting for the next mode of transport or being alone in a new place.  This little companion is like a best friend with your own magical library.Only grouse: the touchscreen is too sensitive... an insect can turn turn the page!",Inseperable;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I needed a Kindle that would load the 'one way', German to English Collins Dictionary. Kindle Fire won't let you change dictionaries, so I purchased this Kindle. It worked like a charm.  I load a German book and start reading.  When I come to a word I don't understand, I just touch the word and the English definition pops up.  It's a great tool for learning a foreign language.",Great For German Book Translation!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I really enjoy my kindle. I have a iPad mini and now the kindle. I read books on both electronics. They both have their great qualities, but i wanted the kindle specifically for reading outside. It meets all of my expectations. I just wish they kept the speaker/headphone jack/text to speak on the kindle.",I really enjoy my kindle;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"My new Kindle 6"" Glare-Free is everything I read that it was. I love being able to just touch the page to turn it...makes it noiseless. It is easier to read than my first Kindle. The only thing I would like is a leather cover with the built-in light like my first cover. But I have a clip on light that will work in low light situations so really I have no complaints!",Love my new Kindle!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"After a couple years of enjoying my Keyboard Kindle the time came for a new one. At first, I was disappointed that only the new touch screens were available but after using it for a few weeks I've come to love it! I still haven't learned how to use all the features but the basics - down loading and reading a book- were as easy as ever. Transferring the books I hadn't finished reading was so very easy too. We recently moved to a rural area and with winter coming it's great to know I can have something I'd like to read on my night table all the time.",Touchscreen won't disappoint;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Excellent quality and truly is glare free! Love the built in dictionary and the Wi-Fi, plus there are 1000's of free titles in addition to the low cost options available. Also, I love that you can get unlimited access to books and other entertainment for $9.95!! I have already become obsessed with my Kindle and take it with me everywhere!",Excellent quality and truly is glare free;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Love it!  I bought this a s a replacement for my keyboard Kindle and it's been wonderful.  I do miss the page turn buttons on the side of the case, as sometimes I turn pages accidentally, but I'm getting used to it.",Love it! I bought this a s a replacement ...;;;;;;

Review: I was very disappointed with my kindle. I bought it so I could read my college ebooks and the Kindle doesn't support the books. I haven't decided if I want to keep it for my fun books. I'm not happy that my Kindle ebook doesn't work with a brand new kindle.
Title;;;;;;: I was very disappointed with my kindle;;;;;;

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"Only thing I don't care for is the fact that it doesn't work with the Kindle lighted cover I already have for the Original Kindle Touch. Price was OK and delivery was prompt. I just do not want to spend more money on a light for it. That is on me lthough, the Kindle works very well for what I use it for and is somewhat faster than the old Kindle Touch , it is replacing.",Only thing I don't care for is the fact that ...;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Great device with a LOT of new features compared to my Kindle I bought a couple of years ago. I will say, and this is just personal preference, that I preferred the side buttons over the touchscreen. I guess I just don't like getting finger smudges all over it. Other than that one minor grievance, I LOVE this thing. It allows you to highlight passages and share them with friends via social media, which I thought was very cool. Battery life is the same as I've always known. Excellent!",Love it!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Just replaced a 2010 2nd generation Kindle that died when I dropped it. This is much lighter, text is more clear, and I really don't miss the 3G since it has wi-fi. And there's no chance of me getting distracted form reading like I would on my phone or iPad. If you want a basic reader and don't care about a backlight (which I didn't want anyway), then this works great.","Great for ""just reading""";;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"This version is still clearer (greater ppi) and lighter than the last one I got.  I was too cheap to go for the 300ppi version though.  Graphics remain a challenge.  The concept of ""Collections"" is nice but difficult to use.  I can only move content between Collections using the Kindle instead of providing other means such as the Web where a mouse and keyboard would be handy.  Or better yet, the Kindle UI could be improved.  Seriously thinking of not using the Collections idea until it's easier to manage.","The concept of ""Collections"" is nice but difficult to use";;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I got the cheapest version of the Kindle 6"" which it is not advertising free. Nevertheless the reduced price  I paid for the device, it is worth it.  The advertising is barely noticed. It comes only on the screen saver, and even though the instructions state that there might be advertising at the bottom of the device while reading, I really didn't notice it since I started reading my favorites books several weeks ago.English is not my tongue language (as you can notice while reading my review), so the vocabulary builder is totally useful. I do not give to the device the fifth star because it does't come with a speaker to take advantage of the Text-to-Speech feature.",It really worth the price I paid for it!!!;;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"Was stoked about this, but within the first two weeks of use it has already started to do weird buggy things like freeze, jump around randomly when i haven't touched anything, or not respond when i do click something. The same thing happened to my last kindle, but at least it lasted for a few years before crapping out.",Buggy;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"It's great and works great. But it's just way to touchy. I barely sweep my hand by it and it turns the page, or it changes the font. Can't leave it in my purse because something will touch it. If it's trying to mimic a real book it has failed horribly.",Leave the touch screens for the tablets not a BOOK;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I hate reading on a computer screen, so I wasn't sure if  I would like an e-reader, but this thing is great!!. The white background is easy to see, even with my less-than-perfect vision, and you hold it like a book so it's MUCH easier than reading on a laptop. I'm an Amazon Prime member and I joined Kindle Unlimited, so all my books are basically free. There was nothing to do to set it up, except to turn it on. I'm really looking forward to taking it with me on my next trip, so I don't have to carry big heavy books on the plane!",Love this thing!!!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"This was a prize in a giveaway and my first Kindle.  I am just starting to read on it and everything seems to look good. I have downloaded two other prize books that I won and several free ones that I wanted to sample. They downloaded faster than I could read the page I was downloading from. Quite impressive. I found the directions PDF, downloaded and printed it quite easily. I will be signing up for the Kindle Unlimited feature as it is an affordable expense for budget conscious people like me. The unit was easy to charge and as the basic unit it has everything except for being self-lit but I find reading it under a light is easy. To try out new technology at an affordable price this is the unit to get.",I am just starting to read on it and everything seems looks good. I have downloaded two other prize books that ...;;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"I'm a Kindle, 2nd Generation, lucky to still have it, person. I purchased and returned the Glare-Free Touchscreen because, I missed the keyboard, and voice to text features. Somethings in the Kindle features should never be taken away. Those for me were the reasons I kept the 2nd Generation Kindle and returned the new. Love the newer technology, miss the keyboard and voice to text. Put it back.",2nd Generation Kindle Lover!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Great little reader!  I got it for my husband so he could read at the beach and out in the sun.  His Kindle Fire (which he loves) did not allow that. It is light, responsive and just a fun little device.  It does come with advertising on the ""start page"", which I wish I could get rid of.  That's my only complaint.",Great llittle reader!!!;;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"I find the touchscreen Kindle VERY annoying. If you put it down and anything touches it, the font size will change. I find the way to change pages (touching one half of the screen) to be very annoying as well. I miss my old kindle!",Touchscreen is annoying;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I ducking love it! I have always been a reader but the high cost of books left me with only a free metro in my hand and a new book maybe twice a month. Now with this kindle, and the kindle unlimited subscription service, I have a multitude of assorted things I can read for only $9.99 a month! I kind of feel like that guy in that one twilight zone episode, except people are around to fix my glasses, and my prescription is so low that if my glasses ever break it will only be a minor inconvenience.",I ducking love it! I have always been a reader but ...;;;;;;

Review: This Kindle is easy to use and all that I expected of it and more.  The more part is the advertising that is on the the kindle every time you shut it off.  When turning it on you have to swipe the advertisement so it goes away.  I own the kindle now and should not have to see ads every time I want to use my own Kindle.
Title;;;;;;: This Kindle is easy to use and all that I expected of it ...;;;;;;

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"This item was great-- my daughter opened it at her birthday dinner and was able to use it immediately!  It arrived already charged.  Very nice!  But I got this with the understanding that there would be a 2-year warrantee that comes.  She is 8 and I'm worried it will break at some point.  I understand the warrantee is very good, but I don't se any indication that I actually got the warrantee.  The description when I placed it in the cart said that the warrantee was in the bundle-- with the cover-- but now all I see is the kindle and the cover.  Do I have the warrantee?  If there is a problem, whom do I contact?",warrantee in the bundle or not?;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Now that I am getting used to it, I find I am reading a lot more than I used to read, and I like that change. I am not a techno-geek. a wall phone is fine for me. The Kindle is handy especially since I don't need to carry a bunch of books on vacations, but it did take me a bit of time to get used to the touch screen technology. An 8 page printed leaflet giving basic explanations and how-to hints would have been nice. Luckily 15 minutes with my neighbor gave me the same information.",and I like that change;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Great e-reader for the price. The only problem I can say I have with it is a minor one. It has so little internal storage, about 4GB I think... It is perfect for reading my manga on it too. Just don't expect color on the color pages. Still the images and font is B-E-A-UTIFUL!",Perfect for manga;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Light weight and easy to read.  Set up is not as easy as you claim because you are not clear in your instructions.  It merely says ""password"".  Not everyone is 100% computer literate or has a 3 year old in the house.  It would be good if you specified that the password refers to the Wi-Fi password that is found on the router.  When I first tried to connect the Kindle, it would not work.  I had to reset the Kindle and the modem.  Then it worked perfectly, but I wasted time trying passwords trying to figure out why the Kindle was harder to set up than and IPad.",Light weight and easy to read;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I give 5 stars to this reader, on the basis of what it is, in itself, standing on it's own, without comparison to a Paperwhite reader.  This is a great basic reader with 4GB of storage and a really crisp reading screen.  It's perfect outdoor, under sunlight, and looks very clear and easy to read with average indoor lighting.  Average, indoor, meaning not sitting next to a lamp.  No, it's not paper white in appearance but then I knew that buying it, so I'm not going to complain about that.  I previously had the Kindle Keyboard back in 2010 and the letters and words on the current basic Kindle looks far crisper and defined.  I like the touch interface on this also.  Far better than the Kindle Keyboard and very responsive.  Pages turn quickly and I love the page flip feature, where you can look ahead without losing your place.  Lack of that was very frustrating with my previous Kindle, and made it a real drawback in place of holding a physical book.  The extra features are numerous on this device, to much so to go into every one of them, but suffice to say that if you read and stay hooked into WiFi you can hook into Wikipedia for more information on what your reading and you can also share passages or highlights to your Facebook page.  All additions over my previous Kindle without losing any of the previous features I already liked about it.  I can say more, but why?  All of this is tucked into a device that I only spent $79.00 on.  It's a great dedicated basic reader.",This is a great basic reader with 4GB of storage and a really ...;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I've got this Kindle reader for my birthday, but unfortunately had to return it to Amazon since it did not meet my expectations for this kind of a gadget. I'll continue using my iPad for the Kindle app since it's easier to read in a dark place. If I wouldn't have a tablet, then this Kindle may work for me. But it doesn't make sense to have another device which is not better than my iPad.","Good Book Reader, but my iPad wins";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"My Kindle was a gift, and I enjoy it so much.  It's light in weight which I especially enjoy using when I purchase an author's ""hard cover"" book.  And....the screen is glare free meaning reading with it doesn't bother my eyes or interfere with my sleep.",and I enjoy it so much;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"It took me a long time to get around to buying a Kindle, but I'm really glad that I finally did.  Print size and clarity are about like a trade paperback but it is much easier to hold and the page turns are effortless and practically instantaneous.  I can read much faster on the Kindle and it is very  convenient to be able to look up unfamiliar words on the fly.  It was on sale when I bought it so that made the deal even sweeter.",I am very pleased with my Kindle.;;;;;;

Review: the first time the package is gone I looked for it for two weeks but still cant find it and then I made a call to customer service they fixed it immediately and I got my new package in one day.nice shopping.but I dont know why a book has in my kindle alredy since I did not buy it.may someone took my first package and used my id to buy a book called cow boy.I am a little confused of this.
Title;;;;;;: nice shopping. but I dont know why a book ...;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I bought refurbished one which is cheaper, obviously. It looks just like a new one, packaging with manual and etc. I absolutely love this thing. It does not hurt my eyes. Easy to carry and all. So far so good, not having any problems with it.",Refuebished one;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"My daughter got this for her birthday and now it goes everywhere with her. She loves having all her favorite books with her, she no longer has to choose just one book to bring. It's easy to use, lightweight, and the battery lasts a long time.I have already decided that I need one too!",Happy Mom needs a Kindle;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I never had a book reader before, but was tired of the clutter of book around the house. I knew this book didn't have a backlight, but I didn't care since I live alone and don't plan on reading in the dark. It's very basic but that's all I needed. It connected fast to my wi-fi, downloaded my first book quickly, keeps a charge for a long time, is simple to use, and I couldn't be happier with it. Not only that, but I got a $70 credit for getting an Amazon credit card and my Kindle, it's case, and first book only cost me $15 which went on the credit card. I highly recommend it.",Highly recommend;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Great buy, quality is excellent, price is really low compared to other options and the only important feature this model doesn't have is adjustable light, i.e. you can't read without external light. This model is not HD but it doesn't really matter since you can always make the font bigger.",Excellent buy;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I bought 2 of these for my kids.  They love them!They are both reading a lot more and really enjoy it!They were a little disappointed that I didn't get them the Fires, but they'll survive!  Maybe next time!",My Kids Love Theirs!;;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"I originally bought the Kindle because it had a headphone jack and text to speech capability.  I'm disabled and can't read normal text.  The battery recently tried to self destruct so I was sent a new Kindle.  Turns out that the new models no longer have headphone jacks or text to speech capability so I now have to pay for an ebook, pay extra for the audio feed (IF it is available) and then borrow my kid's smartphone so I can listen to the book.  The new Kindle is a paperweight.  Way to go backwards in accessibility for the handicapped Amazon!",Not handicapped friendly.;;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"VERY dim display.  I was aware that it doesn't have a light, but the display is akin to reading a book printed with dark grey ink on a light grey page.  There's very little contrast between the background and the e-ink.  It takes more light to read on this thing that it does to read a standard paperback.",VERY dim display.;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I bought this for my 87 year old mom for Christmas.  Yes I have had to help her to learn how to use it. But this has been a blessing for her, her eyesight is failiing and she has always loved reading .  She pretty much gave up because she couldnt read the print. Well now we can adjust the font size and the screen is easy for her eyes to read.  Im happy to say she has read six books in January and she loves her kindle. She calls it her machine. LOL  It makes me smile seeing my mom enjoying reading again.  Thanks Kindle  And she is learning and figuring it all out","Love, Love,Live";;;;;;

Review: Looks good. Have not tried it yet too soon. Still reading manual. Only thing was today I saw in my e-mails same unit $ 20.00 less than what I paid. Bit of a disappointment. Be careful before hitting the checkout box.
Title;;;;;;: Looks good. Have not tried it yet too soon;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"My daughter got this as her birthday present, and she LOVES it!  She is thrilled to have a portable device to read books where ever we go!  I'm still trying to figure it out, but she is a pro now!  The one thing I have't discovered yet is if there is a way to control the brightness.  Sometimes it seems very dim.  Otherwise, glad we purchased this!",Great birthday present for my nine year old!;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"I do enjoy reading books off this Kindle, but two things are very annoying.  It is advertised as having a long-life battery not needing re-charging for ""weeks"".  It last about 4 days consistently for me.  No, I don't read all day!!!  It takes at least a couple hours re-charging off the computer.  Also, this has no back-light for reading in very low light.  It seems like a no-brainer to me to have a back-light of some sort.  Otherwise, I like it.",Not a long-life battery;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Fabulous.  I've been really resistant to an e-reader, but the sale on this one tempted me.  It's perfect!  I don't find the issue with the power button that others have referred to, and the touch screen doesn't seem hypersensitive.Though it didn't come with a wall charger, we have a computer that can charge it as well as several other USB wall chargers for phones and stuff. So it really hasn't been necessary to purchase a special one.Thrilled with the product, and glad I finally caved.  I use it mostly for library books and the Kindle First offerings, and the download is seamless!",It's perfect! I don't find the issue with the power ...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love my kindle! I actually preferred the not paper white screen, with my eyesight this is easier to read. Came quickly and in great packaging. Very easy to use. Holds a lot, downloads quickly. Great product for a great price! Didn't have any issues with the fact that it's refurbished. Looks and feels new",I love my kindle;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"TECHNICAL REVIEW FOR THE KINDLE PAPERWHITE-  I refurbish old furniture for a living and my Kindle reads to me while I do so.  I've killed many a Kindle, 10 to be exact, and yet I still stand by the little guys.  Why?  Because I have concrete floors in my shop...enough said for the poor kindle I drop on it several times before it breaks.  I've never had one to break because of technical error only my user error- dropping it on the concrete floor.  So, now that you know every Kindle I order shakes in its packaging to be delivered to my shop, let's get down to business.  The only weakness I've been able to find with this kindle is the screen or what is under it to be precise.  It's glass and if you drop it just right- it shatters underneath the plastic top cover making your kindle unreadable but, still working. I've broken the screen and continued to have it read to me until a new one could be delivered.  That's the only weakness.  The case is made of plastic, hard and durable if you buy a cover for it.  I recommend that so you don't scratch the plastic screen if you decide to carry it with you in your purse or briefcase.  It is like a mini laptop in a sense- you have to protect the screen.  Next, the button version of this paperwhite is easy to push, a little small for your fingers but, doable after you learn the ropes of what to push and when.  The touch version is better and easier for a child or senior who has not so steady hands.  It is easy to learn how to work a Kindle.  My child, age 5 when I got my first Kindle, ended up showing me how to work it.  Everything is at the touch of a button or fingertip...there's no complicated programs or adding or removing things.  If you want to connect to Wi-Fi to buy a book, push a button and it takes you there.  That simple.  Your Amazon account is how you pay for a book and because you had to register your kindle, all you have to do is click the buy button and it downloads onto your kindle in less than 30 seconds.  I was in the grocery store last week and downloaded a new book, at a football game, at the doctors office...you get the idea- Anywhere.  This thing has the best Wi-Fi connection I've ever seen!!!!  I live in the sticks of Mississippi...When I say the Kindle can download anywhere, I mean anywhere.  In the middle of the wilderness on a four day camping trip down the Natchez Trace couldn't even stump my Kindle paperwhite's ability to download a book for me.  The app that allows you to listen while the Kindle reads to you-  It takes getting used to the robotic voice but, its a nice feature to have when your hands are full or busy doing other things.  Overall, I give this device five stars.",The kindle paperwhite is worth the money if you need a simple to use reader.;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I have only one major problem with the Kindle and Amazon because They put that DRM ( Digital Restriction Management ) on all their E- Reader's ! This mean's I can not transfer my e-Book's from my very old reader to the Kindle. Because Kindle does not support epub, the most commonly used program for e-reader's. I love my Kindle and I will continue to shop Amazon. I'm just a little disappointed that Kindle doesn't support epub. I have now owned my Kindle for a few months now, I love it ! At this price I just bought a Kindle for my daughter. You will need to buy a E-Reader Clip Light there is no backlight on this Kindle but the E-Reader Clip Light work's great. Book's download pretty fast. My Old e-reader I had to use my computer to download e-book's a pain in the Butt... (_|_)  ! With the Wi-Fi  on my Kindle one click and I have my e-book !  I'm still disappointed about Kindle not supporting the epub,  I have e-book's on my old e-reader that I would love to transfer to my Kindle (_|_) I can't because they are in the epub format, I'm looking for a program so I can convert my epub book's so far no luck as I'm finding out it is because of that DRM Kindle has. As far as the Special Offers on the Kindle, the only time I see them is when I turn my Kindle on so no problem there. I do Highly Recommend  this Kindle.",A little Disappointed;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I had a Kindle 2 for years until the battery died and wouldn't recharge anymore.  When I upgraded to this new device, it took a while to get used to the touch screen feature but I've grown to like it.  I'm satisfied with it and felt it was a good value.",Made a Generational Leap;;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"This is, without a doubt the worst Kindle I have ever used,  This is my seventh Kindle.  It is so poorly designed that it is almost un-useable.The activation button (on-off switch) is on the bottom of the device.  If you try to hold it with one hand, you are constantly turning the device OFF.  Non of the ""Settings"" hold.  In the course of one hour of reading, I have to reset the font size at least 5 times, it won't hold. The page advance touch screen is so course that you either DON'T get a page advance or you turn multiple pages.  The Kindle ""tools"" appear at random when you least expect them.  The location in book settings don't hold,  usually they reset or turn off while you are reading. My over-all rating of this device is PISS POOR!!!  I would rather have my old ""basic"" Kindle to use, at least when you set it up, the settings STAYED WHERE YOU SET THEM, I wasn't a constant battle to keep reading.","6"" Kindle touchscreen display is Pi** POOR!";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I've wanted a Kindle since the day they were released, but way back then you couldn't load library ebooks onto them. Now, though, I'm getting a free book every month as a Prime member and can load whatever books I wish onto it! I was planning to get at least the Paperwhite, but this one was $50 on Prime Day so I went for it. I'm very, very pleased! Text is easy to read and the transition from page to page is pretty good too. There's a nice tutorial that walks you through the basics as soon as you turn it on, and it's small and light enough that I can hold it in one hand comfortably. I'll get one with a backlight in the future, but the base model is fine, and the special offers aren't annoying like I expected them to be :)",very pleased! Text is easy to read and the transition ...;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Now that Ive discovered that the PDF articles can be read in landscape mode, I like this Kindle. I do wish, however, that memory can be expandable through a micro SD card or similar. Overall, this is a good basic reader with a very efficient battery.",I like this Kindle!;;;;;;

Review: My husband LOVED his Christmas gift. It has everything you could possibly need and more for an E reader. This one is touch screen to change the pages & the books download so quickly in wifi. I am probably going to by myself one as well!

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"The first time I used a e-reader was this product and I was simply amazed at how portable books had became. The idea of carrying thousands of books with you is a huge advance over hand held books. It of course is extremely portable not just because of size but because one charge lasts me so long. I never have really tested how long, because I always toss it onto a charger every few days just as a habit.They say it lasts weeks and I surely do believe that. I use this along with Kindle Books unlimited. One of the bests investments for any reader that is available. I read at least 6 books a month minimum that I find on there that interests me. It is a great investment to use with this. I also love the fact is plays a few basic time using games on here like soduko.I honestly have no complaints about this purchase even though I made it several years ago it is still working great. I purchased this when it first came out to release. I do not know even what year it was it has been so long ago.I never have had a issue with keeping it charged, or installing books or connecting to Wi-Fi , Durability is out of this world.",A purchase that has lasted me for Years.;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I previously owned a Kinde Fire HD but I wanted a Kindle that I could read books on and not be distracted but other features.  It does what I need it to do. 3.0 out of 5 stars,"I hate this product. The screen keeps flickering when you turn the page, or go to home or library. I'm definitely returning it. 5.0 out of 5 stars,"The Kindle is everything it was advertised as.  It size is very comfortable in the hand and ordering books is easy.
