Review: Love the compact size and light weight!  I was afraid I would be irritated by the small screen but it hasn't phased me one bit.  I had been using a full tablet to read but was reading less and less due to the amount of screen time every day. Now I'm back to reading every free minute I get and not getting eye strain from the back light!

Enjoying my Kindle immensely. No  problems so far. It appears that everything was thought through carefully. There's even a Kindle User's Guide already in your Kindle for easy reference. I've only call Amazon technical support once. The only challenge now is do I read my Kindle or do I read a regular book. Great problem for reading gurus to have.
Title;;;;;;: There's even a Kindle User's Guide already in your Kindle for easy reference. I've only call Amazon technical support once;;;;;;

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"Took a while to learn to use a kindle, and the device does not have a port for email, which meant I could not use it as I had expected, but surely it will prove useful  as my eyes already need larger print size.",A moderately useful device;;;;;;

Review: I really like it. So easy to use. Hope you keep making a non-backlit black and white (actually pale gray)reader. So easy on the eyes.  I know  several people with dyslexia and they are able to enjoy reading with this version of the Kindle. For those of you considering a Kindle this is the one I would recommend if you like curling up with a good book and reading for several hours at a stretch. I have a tablet and my eyes tire much faster with it so I don't do a lot of reading for pleasure on it. That's why I bought this Kindle.
Title;;;;;;: I recommend this type of Kindle for the avid reader.;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I am obsessed. At first I was a little put off by the fact that it didn't light up at all and was black and white. After using it for a few days, though, I fell in love! It's the perfect size and it's like reading the pages of a real book, except better. I take it with me evvverywhere. I don't know if I'll buy a paper book again! Also, they sell nifty little clip on book lights that are perfect for reading at night. If you're on the fence about this kindle, go for it!",I am obsessed.;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Amazing piece of equipment, The screen is super clear, I had a Kindle 3 keyboard version, and the upgrade was significantly greater, the pages turn faster, and i kinda like the new interface and the lack of page turning buttons. Of course all of this is relevant to the user.",Amazing piece of equipment;;;;;;

Review: Compact for portability but big enough for reading. Love the ability to read in the sun!  I had the first generation kindle previously - nice touch screen features. Ordered a waterproof case so I can use in the pool this summer!
Title;;;;;;: Love the ability to read in the sun;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I am a 20 year old college guy who has a million distractions in his life - from Xbox to his phone to class to work, etc. - and this makes me actually want to sit down and read. I always get distracted by looking on in physical books, but the Kindle helps me to focus on what I am reading at the moment - and nothing more. If you want to start reading again or just need somewhere to begin, look no further.",Finally - I ACTUALLY want to read.;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"My 6"" Glare-Free Touchscreen is just what the ""Doctor"" ordered  for my eyes!  I had eye surgery (cataracts removed from the left eye) on October 31,1914.  Reading on the  is a breeze.  The Kindle was a Christmas present.  The best present I could have received!",Good On The Eyes;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,Displays books as advertised and expected.  Ads are tiresome.  Device is 'slippery' - regularly falls from my hands and would benefit enormously from a more tactile surface.  But then Amazon might not sell as many Kindle covers.,"Works well, annoying ads, and is slippery";;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I love my Kindle and the Kindle program.  There are two minor problems with my now device:  (1)  It is smaller than my original device.  No problem with the text, but, it no longer fits into the book cover I bought for my old Kindle.  I will have to replace that.  (2).  The package didn't come with an instruction booklet.  It has taken me a while to figure out how to locate the home page, review stored editions, shop in the store, etc.  If you have some guidance for that, us older types would appreciate it.  JAD",I love my Kindle and the Kindle program;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love my Kindle. It's exactly what I wanted. My 2nd gen Kindle would no longer hold a charge. I loved it because I didn't want something with a light in it. I wanted a simple e-reader that read like a regular book. This does that and it still has all the bells and whistles too, like connecting to Goodreads. X-Ray is a fun feature too. I find it helpful to easily go to the next book in a series and download it quickly. I love the feature that tells you how much time is left in each chapter or to finish the book. The one negative I might have is the suggested books at the bottom of the screen. I'd prefer to not see that all the time.",I love my Kindle;;;;;;

Review: I really like it. Already read my first book. The idea of thousands of books at my fingertips in an instant is very cool. Portable - light weight. Touch screen is a plus. Text is clear. If your searching on Amazon online through the kindle though the pictures are blurry. I was disappointed with the purchasing- when I thought I purchased a book series but it turned out to be just one book from that series for $15. I was unable to resolve the issue on the kindle and needed to go on my laptop to cancel the order. Amazon did provide me with a full refund which was nice. That is a separate issue from the actual device though. I enjoy the kindle and hope you do too.
Title;;;;;;: I really like it. Already read my first book;;;;;;

Review: I was very disappointed in this Kindle.  Nothing in the specifications told me that I would need a Wi-Fi router to use it.  My first Kindle could be used anywhere I cared to use it - - so I thought this one would be just as easy.I ended up giving it to my sil who has a Wi-Fi hookup and is willing to play with it.The advertising should have made that clearer to those who are only SOMEWHAT able to understand techie talk.
Title;;;;;;: I was very disappointed in this Kindle;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"love the no-glare screen.  It is so light weight, and small.  If fits easily into my purse, but big enough that I can increase the font enough to not hurt my eyes, but still have plenty of words on a page.  Perfect size for me!",Perfect size!;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"The improved screen contrast is impressive.  However, not including the power adapter is just plain chintzy, especially at the price to buy one from Amazon at $20.  Power adapters are not that expensive normally so this part is a rip off.  If you have a power adapter from a previous Kindle don't waste your money buying one here.  I do miss the side buttons for page turning as I'd much prefer them to touch screen.  The options for getting a Kindle with the side buttons aren't great... mostly either buy a rebuilt or buy one used.  Looked around and could not find one new or I'd have bought it.  Otherwise this is a good basic Kindle that allows you to read e- books.",If you have a power adapter from a previous Kindle don't waste your money buying one here;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I was given a Kindle Fire and thought it was great.  And it is.  If I want to use other apps, shop Amazon or even read a magazine (color pages), but the light on the screen and the temptation to ""just check Facebook"" was not conducive to reading.  It was also bigger and bulkier and the battery doesn't last as long.  I still love the Fire and use it often, but for READING, this is my go-to device!I ordered this one just for reading and I absolutely love it.  It fits in my purse and goes everywhere with me.  I can carry lots of books with me on vacation or camping or just to the doctors office and read whatever I'm in the mood for.  The charge lasts a long time and it's readable in all sorts of lighting situations.  It's actually lighter and easier to hold than a real book.",My go-to reading device;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Awesome product!!! Easy to carry. Long lasting battery.As a non native English speaker/reader, the dictionary function incorporated is very useful.I also downloaded the ""Audible"" app on my iPhone to follow what I am reading which helps improving my pronunciation.","If you don't have your kindle yet, but it!";;;;;;

Review: Just received it a couple of weeks ago and never had any other e-readers before.  I love it so far and look forward to getting a lot of use out of it.  Can't beat the price at $49.99.  Love the idea of not having to carry books.

I have put off buying a kindle because I like reading hardbound books. However there are a lot of books I would have to order. Having the Kindle just makes those more accessible. I also like it because it's easy to hold and doesn't hurt my hands when I read for long periods of time.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Easy to read on, works great in bright sunlight, and battery life is excellent. You do have to get used to the screen going black for a moment when switching pages and navigating menu's but the other E-Readers I've had do the same.  I thought the small screen would bother me but it doesn't at all.  The ""free offers"" are just a screen saver and are worth the drop in price.",Totally worth the money;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"This basic model fits my needs. I have an iPad, but found that for reading books over an extended period, you just can't beat this device. It's easier to hold, I don't have to contend with screen glare, it's easier on the eyes, and syncs effortlessly with the Kindle app on my Apple devices. I don't have other distractions since this is just an eReader, which means I can concentrate more on what I'm reading. I can also read at night with no problems trying to fall asleep afterwards. I couldn't do that as easily after reading on my iPad mini.  A $5 book light that clips on devices works just fine when I need it.  I really like how it connects with Goodreads and now keep up with it more than I did before. Audible app syncs well with the Kindle and allows me to continue reading a book right where it left off in the audio version. I'm very happy with this basic touch screen model.  Love it!",I couldn't do that as easily after reading on my iPad mini;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love my new kindle!!! It's the first one I've bought, the first one I had was a hand me down.  I didn't think I would like a kindle being an avid reader and book lover but since I had a free one second generation I gave it a try and fell in love.  Gone are the bi-weekly trips to the library, lugging around arm loads of heavy books some of which I didn't have time to read or just didn't like and occasionally had previously read also the fines.  For readers like my self I recommend a paper white version I have over a thousand books on my new one already.  Most of which I got free, I don't think I have spent over five dollars on one yet.  The kindle unlimited is the way to go also.  I almost cried when I dropped my first one and broke it, I had dropped the thing a hundred times, literally.  I'm so happy with my new one it's hard to put in words.",I'm in love!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I bought this particular Kindle because I wanted to be able to read outside in the sunshine and I am extremely pleased with my purchase! The brighter the light is, the crisper the text is. I love it! The ""special offer"" is on the lock screen only and does not interfere with my reading. I hardly even notice it. I highly recommend this Kindle if you only want to read in bright light, since it is not backlit.",... read outside in the sunshine and I am extremely pleased with my purchase;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"It works quite well. But, I noticed that the previous extras in the Kindle Keyboard have been trimmed off, like the earphone slot. Overall, its an improvement over the previous versions and I appreciate the work that has gone into making this wonderful no-frills entry-level Kindle.",Lovely Kindle.;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I Absolutely Love my Kindle !!!!!!  It was given to me as a gift for Christmas.............. What an absolute treat it's been.  I was always a voracious reader but as I got older I found that I could be allergic to library books - dust, inks, etc - I got tired of not feeling well while reading so I stopped going to the library.  I'm trying the Kindle Unlimited"" plan to hopefully catch up with reading some of the things I missed in the last number of years.  I'm so thankful to my Friend Kathleen who gifted the Kindle to me ...... I couldn't be happier :))))))))))P.S.  This Kindle doesn't have backlighting - so I can't read in the dark.  When I purchase another I'd probably prefer to have that feature which I think is available in the Paperwhite or other versions of Kindle.  But even without it I'm still on cloud 9.",I Absolutely Love my Kindle;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"The special offers that appear on my home screen after I log in are a bit irritating, as they take up half the screen and are not on subjects that I'm interested in. If there's a way to change my ad preferences to display something more relevant, I haven't found it yet. Furthermore, there are very few good options for cases that include a light, and none I could find that were slim and light and drew power from the kindle battery like in previous models. If my mom hadn't wanted this one I would have returned it and bought something else instead.",there are very few good options for cases that include a light;;;;;;

Review: Bought this as a gift for my wife.  She absolutely loves the display.  The problem she was having with her Kindle Fire was the that the screen was hard to read while in the sun.  This Glare-Free Kindle gives her the ability to read while hanging out with the family by the pool.
Title;;;;;;: A great gift and a great product.;;;;;;

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"The viewing angle of the screen is narrower than my antique Kindle.  The rim of the unit is so narrow that I unintentionally change pages, and I'm not a big fan of touch-screens on such a small space.  I haven't been able to  change settings to my preference.  I also need a way to delete old material.  Items that I deleted from my old Kindle while not on line are returning.  I don't need to keep all the samples and uninspiring books.",Unconvinced;;;;;;

Review: This is exactly what I expected.  A light easy to use product.  The battery lasted at least a month. The kindle remembered where I was in each book so I could easily  switch from book to book.  Sadly my too large young dog chewed it up and now it no longer works.  I will be replacing it.
Title;;;;;;: A light easy to use product;;;;;;

Rating: 1.0 out of 5 stars,"I am very disappointed.  It does do a good job outside, which is a great thing, but not so good inside.  I have to have a lot of lights on to read, my house is never bright enough to read the screen and there are not brightness controls.  In addition, i would prefer to listen to many of my books and there is no bluetooth or audio output for this to happen.  I find it difficult to navigate thru the book except 1 page at a time.  I cannot flag pages easily.  Yes it is nice to lay it down and read without holding, but i do not enjoy having to hold it.",I am very disappointed. It does do a good job outside;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"Sooo I like the price , don't mind the little add bar at the bottom but can they do something about not being able to change brightness? Now I suppose I should done more research on it but I've never come across something like this that didn't allow brightness change... I'd have to say that's the biggest draw back especially for those who have a harder time seeing .....",Sooo I like the price;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"""I wasn't so sure about e-reader before.But after using kindle, I am in love with e-reader.I like books. I like the smell of papers. I like how it makes a sound when going to the next page.But sometimes it's uncomfortable. Some books are heavy. some books tear apart after a while.Hard to read in dark.But kindle fixed it all.Now i can only carry kindle when going somewhere.Easy to navigate between different books.Love this device.It changed my world.",Addicted!;;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"It was fine while it worked, but then the screen froze and it officially died. Contacted customer service, but because it happened a couple of months after the warranty expired (of course...), they offered me no help (except for a minor discount, if I buy a new one. No thanks!)This was my second Kindle (the 1st one also died after about 3 years). I won't be buying a third.",Died on me after a little more than a year.;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I travel a lot and love to read. I started running out of luggage space with all the books I was buying during my travels so I decided to get a kindle. It didn't matter to me if it was the latest model or if it had a ton of cool features, I just needed to make room in my suitcase for essentials lol. It's small enough to fit in my purse and can store dozens of books! I'm very satisfied with my purchase ",I travel a lot and love to read;;;;;;

Review: Description doesn't cleary say this is a type of kindle were you cannot adjust the brightness!!!!

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"The new Kindle met all my expectations and more. I bought it for its touch screen and low power consumption. The touch screen makes it much easier to use and let's you do things you couldn't easily do with the previous version. And of course, it's nice to read for long stretches without checking how much power is left on the device. This takes a great burden off my iPad, which I can now reserve for other tasks.",Meets my expectations;;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"This is my 3rd kindle. This is the first touch screen one I have had. The pages don't turn when you touch the screen every time. For some reason every time I set the kindle down, it changes the font size.It feels cheap. It's lighter, but it's thicker and bigger sized then previous versions. It just feels cheaper then previous versions and it doesn't work as well either.Overall, pretty disappointed in the quality of this version.",pretty disappointed in the quality of this version;;;;;;

Review: I really had to warm up to the idea of getting this kindle after the screen of my kindle keyboard got cracked. I just loved the way the kindle keyboard worked and I could listen to my book on it while driving. But I do like my new one and thou I am sad I cant listen to my books on this one I think I will live. It seems lighter than my old one and easier to tote around because itnfits in my purse.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Amazing how this thing works. I still struggle a bit with navigating around the menu, but that's just a matter of my learning curve.  I like that I can adjust the font size to suit my vision.  And to think that I can have several books at once on this little tablet.....amazing.",Amazing how this thing works;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"Need a light to read it whereas the Nook does not. This was not made clear in the advertising.  I have both Kindle and Nook. The Kindle is lighter, fits in the pocket, but the Nook can be read anywhere, is larger, more words on page, seemingly more user friendly. If you like reading in bed without disturbing anyone, get the Nook. If you read in the sunshine, get the Kindle.",Needs external light source;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I am loving my kindle!  The battery life is amazing, the screen is perfect, and the form factor is great!If you enjoy reading or used to enjoy reading and need to get back into it, do not hesitate in making this purchase!",I have re-kindled my love of reading thanks to the Kindle!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Love my kindle.  Bought it to replace an older model that would no charge anymore.  I like the basic kindle, instead of the tablet style.  It keeps me from downloading games.  I just use it to read and it is perfect.",Love my kindle;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I commute to work everyday by train, and this makes it easier to read when I only have one free hand. Most days I'll have to stand and hold onto a railing, and with the kindle I can turn pages with the tap of my finger.I still prefer physical books over digital, but this is well worth the price even if its only for the convienence.","I commute to work everyday by train, and this ...";;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"It does the job of providing glare free reading experience. I love the long battery life between charges, although that might be due to a non-color providing screen.  I didn't fully understand the idea of a backlit display until I tried reading it in low lighting. Definitely need to have the lights on.",I love the long battery life between charges;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"For anyone who likes to read I would recommend this product.  I was pretty much set on always have the real deal, but my friend bought one and I played around with it and it's amazing.  Really long battery life, actually no glare, with amazon prime you can rent books for free every month and it's just so small and light weight traveling with it is not an issue at all.",For anyone who likes to read I would recommend this product;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"My daughter's ~4 year old Kindle Touch become unresponsive and support was unable to resolve the issue.  So, we needed a replacement and my daughter wanted it replaced with the same version.  The Kindle, 6"" Glare-Free Touchscreen was closest in style and features to her previous version so this was her choice.  It does not feel as sturdy or seem to be made with the same high quality materials and workmanship as the original Kindle Touch (i.e., it feels cheap).  Time will tell how it will hold-up to daily use and getting stuffed into a backpack.",It does not feel as sturdy or seem to be made with the same high ...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"It is really, really good. I already have an Android device and I always thought ""why would I want a Kindle?"". Then I saw this version on sale and decided to give it a try. And now I just can't expect to read anything else without it. It is much, MUCH better than reading in any device with a bright display. It is just like a book - but with the upside of carrying lots of books. It does not make your eyes tired. And the possibility of using the dictionary on the fly just rocks. I am really happy with it.",really good. I already have an Android device and I ...;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Ordered the kindle for my mother. She loves it. This is the first time I purchased a kindle. The only thing I don't like about it, the display does not light up and you can't make the screen brighter. Would I order another one. No likely, I'd fine a kindle that allows me to turn the brightness up/down, instead of being one monotone color.  The work around is to just make the font much larger, which makes it easier to read, when the text is larger.",The only thing I don't like about it;;;;;;

Review: Bought this for mother n law who is 94.  she has been reading on it for four days and only has one time where she lost her way.  i would say this a great success rate.  she loves it and wanted to know why we never got one of these new thingies when she was younger.  OMG.... the Kindle Reader is the best thing sense dirt or should i say paperbacks........
Title;;;;;;: i would say this a great success rate;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Kindle is a very nice ebook reader. Easier to use, with dictionaries and vocabulary improvement, and a system of quotations,  this ebook reader allow you to have a comfortable reading experience.The only Kindle's problem is not be able to read epub books.",Kindle is a very nice ebook reader;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love my Kindle!!! It motivates me to read so much more than before I had it! It allows me to check webpages which is very convenient when I don't have my phone with me, but doesn't have all the apps to distract me from reading! Great product!",I love my Kindle;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"I am unable to download games on this Kindle as we did on my original and second Kindle.  Have a difficult time navigating, therefore, have not given to our daughter yet until I can figure out how to get some games on it like ""Every Word"" and Every Word: Crossing"".  These were so beneficial to our handicapped daughter to help her with her reading, etc.Could I trade this one for one of the original Kindle that is manual to use?  Our daughter understands the original one after three years.","have not given to our daughter yet until I can figure out how to get some games on it like ""Every Word"" and Every Word";;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I really love the size, simplicity, and functions (particularly the dictionary function for words) of the kindle.  I may be missing something, but it would be great if there was a way to change the coloring of the font/contrast of the font for different lights . . . I know other versions of the kindle can do this.",I really love the size;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love this product, works exactly as described.  I can go through all the books I want, take it with me anywhere and plug it in when I get home.  I can get through an average sized book (250 pgs) without it running out of charge.",Works as expected;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"After reading some reviewer comments regarding the sensitivity of the new touch screen I had some reservations, but I find the touch screen an improvement over the buttons on the side of my previous Kindle.  The new e-ink does seem sharper and the screen easy to see in most lighting.  Access to the dictionary is easier and quicker and getting around in the menu is simple and intuitive.  This is my third Kindle and each has been an improvement on its predecessor.",The new e-ink does seem sharper and the screen easy to see in most lighting;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I've been reading so much more since I got my Kindle. I easily rent kindle edition books from my local library while at home.  I like that this edition is in black and white so I'm not tempted to use it to go on websites such as Facebook.  For me, my Kindle is strictly for reading - a welcome break from the internet.  I recently took it on a trip, and could carry it in my purse - much more convenient than lugging around multiple books.  There are a few books I will always own in hard copy. As a minimalist living in a small space, I am happy to store everything else on my Kindle.","Saves space, more convenient, and I find I am reading more.";;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"This was one great book reading device. My only issue was not being able to add my own documents to my kids library so they don't touch my progress (which would force me to by another kindle just for them)Yet, I would recomment paper white more as a better deal since reading at dark with this one is impossible and having an external light is not a good option.I managed to change the fonts in this device to display Arabic language much more better and it really did fine.",This was one great book reading device;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"After being used to the Kindle Fire, I'm kind of sorry I bought this version to replace it (Fire no longer charging reliably). I find the smaller screen fine for reading books, but I don't like the layout for listing my books. It shows tiny, black and white book covers that I find difficult to read, in some cases. Also, it doesn't appear that I can turn the device horizontally to see larger images. Finally, on the home page the top half of the screen shows my books, but the bottom half shows books I might want to buy. I'd rather just see MY books a little larger so I can read the titles. I didn't think I necessarily needed all the bells and whistles of the Fire, since I basically used it for reading books and rarely for any other reason. But I miss the look of it, the larger screen, and the color elements.",A little disappointing but delivers what is promised;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love my Kindle, it's a great size and fits in my backpack easily. I already have 10 books on it and have had to charge it since I got it (keeping it on airplane mode helps). It has helped me get back into reading and enjoy the books I get with PrimeFirst. It was especially great to get it on sale on Prime Day, and I would recommend it to anyone seriously considering getting one!",Love it!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I bought this Kindle to replace my old keyboard Kindle.  I especially enjoy the glare-free touch screen.  This Kindle is small and lightweight enough to tuck in my small purse so that I can read while sitting in a waiting room.  I do also read on my i-Pad, but prefer the Kindle as it weighs less and is smaller.  It charges quickly.  I would definitely recommend it for an affordable venue for downloading and reading your favorite books.  The other positive is not having to decide where to store regular books.  I liked to save and re-read my favorites, and was quickly running out of space to store them.  Now I don't have to worry about having to store physical books, and can find and re-read my favorites as often as I like on my Kindle.",Five Stars;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Its hard to find an item that does exactly what it says, but the new touchscreen kindle has blown me away. Easy to use interface, awesome display, and so lightweight its amazing. Also very easy to move .mobi files via laptops for obtaining books from other sources. No complaints until I inevitably (albeit accidently) rocket it across the room and crack the confounded thing clean in half.",Best E-Reader;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Now that I know more about how it works, I love it.  Had a question on how just list my books and a lovely patient young lady named shevell helped me with that and got it done.  My next purchase, other than new books is a cover and screen protectors.  Thank you and your customer service department.",i love my kindle 5th generation device.;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"This has been great so far! I purchased the kindle for 69.99, bought 6 months of Kindle Unlimited for $30, and I bought the charger head for $15 (just the cord is included, you have to buy the part the plugs into an outlet separate).Negatives:- Kindle Unlimited does not include a lot of books that are popular or in demand. I have a booklist of around 50 books that I would like to read and only 5-6 are available for free through Kindle Unlimited (and those are the older books on my list, none of the current top sellers are included). So disappointed with the selection and probably will not purchase again at the end of 6 months.-This kindle does not include a light which means that you will need to have an actual light on to read this just as if you were reading a regular book. I didnt think this would bother me but it has turned in to a bit of a pain and lightening would have been nice when needed (for example: when taking the metro to work and the lightening isnt great)- When you turn the kindle off it defaults to an advertisement. I know that is a small thing but I don't like being bombarded with ads 24/7 especially when the device is supposed to be OFF.- I purchased these items directly from my bank account and and received the kindle and charger in two days with amazon prime. The info for the Kingle Unlimited was supposed to be sent to my via email. I never received the email so on the third day after purchase I called to make sure everything was ok. I spoke to a woman on the help line who said there was a delay but it was processing and that she would call me the next day to follow up with me. I didnt receive a phone call back from here on the fourth day after purchase so on the fifth day I called back to follow up. Sidenote: I was anxiously awaiting reading on my new kindle!!!! When I called back I was told that the delay was that I had paid for my purchase with a bank account and to buy the Kindle Unlimited you have to use a credit card. So I told her to just charge it to the credit card they had on file but because this was a bundle item she couldn't do it. So instead I had to go online and buy the Kindle Unlimited for $60 and then she refunded me the extra $30. Suffice to say this was a big headache and I was on the phone sorting all this out for almost an hour. It should be posted at purchase that this needs to be bought with a credit card! Plus side, she gave me a $10 credit applied to my amazon account for future purchases.- you have to be the charger head seperate. This left a bad taste in my mouth. I have to pay $15 extra dollars to be able to charge my kindle at an outlet (as opposed to just having the cord to plug into a computer). I felt like this was a cheap move on Amazon's part.-Also, this is literally just a device to buy and read books. To my knowledge, you can not access the internet to go to other websites etc.Positives:- The kindle is directly linked to your amazon account so buying books is done with just a click of the button. You can also create book lists to save for purchase later.- When you are reading a book on the kindle you can highlight words/passages, you can click on a word to see the definition, you can click on the name of a character to get info on them if you forget who they are (very helpful when reading a more complicated book), and it is pretty easy to navigate.-You can adjust the size of the font as needed.-It's a good size that is large enough to be about the size of a paperback book but small enough to easily carry around. It is much lighter than the more advanced (more expensive) kindles as well.Overall, I really like the kindle. I think if I had to do it again I would have spent the extra money and gotten the KIndle Paperwhite and NOT gotten the Kindle Unlimited. Maybe next time!",Like it but wouldn't buy again;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Pretty amazing device. Page turning is fluid, contrast is good. Very lightweight.Only issue has been with getting content purchased outside the Kindle store onto the reader. Amazon seems to have made this less easy than before, which is disappointing, but not deal breaking.It'd be nice if it had 3G...",Nice improvement to the Kindle product line;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I'm reallly enjoying it.  Some problems trying to figure out everything, but Kindle support was excellent!  Not sure why I can't seem to download Project Gutenburg books to the Kindle when I can to Kindle on my PC, but just a minor distraction.",but Kindle support was excellent! Not sure why I can't seem to download ...;;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"New kindle not nearly as good as my old one.  Screen on old one got cracked or I would never have changed.  New one very awkward to access my library, turning pages more awkward, and recommendations keep popping up and won't leave.  I basically hate the new machine and wish for my old one back. The old style was good and you wrecked it!",Don't like new kindle;;;;;;

Review: The jury is still out on this one. I had the version 1 for so long I got used to flipping the pages with the side panel. On this one the touch screen is so sensitive I find myself clicking two or three pages ahead each time I turn a page. This is quite annoying.

I don't like this Kindle at all. I'm very disappointed by the page turning -- it's difficult to use in various situation (i.e. when reclining). Sometimes it takes 2-3-4 times to get the page to change. I also am disappointed I can't get Scrabble and other games on this. I wish my old (basic) Kindle hadn't broken. I would just say please read the reviews before you buy this.

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"I love this version of the kindle and the ads are not obtrusive which is nice. However, the only issue I had was the touch sensitivity. The slightest touch of my shirt, sweater, sheet or blanket affects the screen. Either the font menu pops up, the pages flip either way so you have reread to determine where you are. Even with its bulk it's still light weight enough to be comfortable. Despite this minor flaw, overall, for the price it's definitely worth it!",I love this version of the kindle and the ads are ...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"My eldest son purchased this as a gift for my youngest son. We didn't know that it would be all in French--instructions, etc.--but luckily I speak and read French so I was able to change the language to English. It has worked great! Eyes don't get as tired when reading, either.",It has worked great! Eyes don't get as tired when reading;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"The Kindle is so nice and light weight. I love to read in bed with it. It is also easy to use. My only complaint is that it is a little difficult to read in a dim light. I also bought a cover for the 6"" paper white thinking it would fit, but it doesn't. Over all I am very  happy with the Glare free Kindle.",Glare-free Kindle is very light weight;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I've had several kindles - first kindle fire, kindle touch, & 2nd (or 3rd) generation. THIS one blows  them all out of the water! I love the extras that have been added, such as Goodreads & google xray. I know xray has been on kindle for a while, but it works even better on this kindle! I love it & can't believe I got it while it was on special for $49! Even if I'd paid $100, though, it would still seem a great bargain!",my favorite kindle yet!;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Wonderful! I had a back-lit kindle and with the number of hours I spend in front of the computer for work and school, I was getting awful headaches. This Kindle gives me no headaches! And while commuting for work and being in graduate school, it is nice to  have all of my textbooks and articles in one place, and to weigh so little!I would  recommend, however, to buy the one without the adds as I have concerns about the battery life and longevity of the screen, when it is constantly filled with either my book or an advertisement.",Buy the no-add upgrade;;;;;;

Review: I had the original kindle and upgraded to the Fire when they first came out. I love my Kindle Fire but the screen glares to much in the sun to make reading outside enjoyable. This version is great! I love the touch screen and find the controls much easier to navigate than the original version.
Title;;;;;;: I love my Kindle Fire but the screen glares to much ...;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I purchased this Kindle by trading in my older keyboard Kindle and I know I made a good decision!  This one is a little smaller in size, and it is easier to stick in my purse.  It also has more 'bells & whistles!'  No regrets.",Trade-In was good decision!;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I accidentally stepped on my old Kindle and knew I needed upgrade anyways. I got this one because it was part of a deal. I like that it's smaller and seems sturdier than my previous Kindle. The touch screen is easier to work with and the layout makes it easier to view my books and collections. The screen is super sensitive. If I hover my finger over the screen it tends to pull something up which can be annoying at times. However, for the price and for what I need, it works perfect.",I like that it's smaller and seems sturdier than my previous ...;;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"Battery did not recharge. I used it without complains for several weeks, but when time came to recharge battery, it did not work. I try to return products but the 30 days guarantee had expired. DO NOT BUY!UPDATE: wrote to Amazon and they send me a refund. Will be getting the new version soon, nothing refurbished!",Battery did not recharge. I used it without complains ...;;;;;;

Review: I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas.  He is very tech savvy and wanted to upgrade his phone to get the 6+ inch screen for reading.  At first I could tell he was scepticle but once he opened up his book on the Kindle he loved it.  It fits in his coat pocket and is easy to take to work.  The screen is nice because there's no glare or light- giving his eyes a rest from that bright smartphone.

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"Love my new Kindle!  I sometimes find holding a book difficult and painful, and after trying my daughter's Kindle, I thought a Kindle would be helpful.  My daughter gave me one as an early birthday gift and I'm now reading a few hours everyday, just like I used to do. Adjusting the print size is a plus and although I'm a bit clumsy with the touch screen, I'm getting the hang of it.  The Kindle is right up there with the top 5 gifts I have ever received.",Love my new Kindle;;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"I hate, hate, hate this product!!!! Like other customer reviews bring back the old Kindle with the buttons on the bottom and page turner buttons on the side. This touchscreen is a load of crap and you're paying more just for junk and advertisements you don't need or will use. To get started you are forced to sign up for Kindle Prime. If I had wanted that I would have signed up for it but I didn't need or want it so didn't sign up for it so wasn't happy I was forced to sign up for it to just start my Kindle. This continuous tapping to change pages is the biggest nuisance  and I have acrylic nails so it sounds like a swarm of termites on a eating binge with this continuous tapping. I travel and fly a lot for my job. I will now have to book my seat on the wing of the plane because with this continuous tapping to change pages it will annoy other passengers on the plane and they might throw me, my Kindle or both out the emergency exit. I found it very difficult to navigate to get where you need to be to read what you downloaded. I found the text difficult to read through all the smudges and handprints left through using a touch screen. I don't even like touchscreen computers! All this swiping and tapping to go back and forth you like something between an idiot and bird in flight. Someone could make a good music video showing how dumb you look doing all this swiping and tapping. I just hate it when you get use to a good product that you really enjoyed, I really liked my old basic Kindle with the buttons on the bottom and buttons on the side and had it with me everywhere I went, and they decide to upgrade and it's a load of crap and you can't go back to the old one. Like others stated if you want a Kindle you're stuck with these whether you like it or not and I absolutely hate it with a passion but I'm stuck with it because I like reading a Kindle. We should get a dissatisfied customer discount for having to purchase an inferior product to read a Kindle.",HATE KINDLE TOUCHSCREEN!!!!;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"It is easy to use.  the user guide was helpful.  It works well, however the screen is very sensitive.Kindle, 6"" Glare-Free Touchscreen Display, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers","Kindle, 6"" Glare-Free Touchscreen Display";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Great reader. Still learning to navigate how to get back to one or two pages to re-read. Not a fan of the commercials, but love the longevity of the screen time, ability to change print size, lightweight to handle, light is low-light pleasant reading. This will be great on vacations or in the car or on a plane, since it's light and not bulky. Next, connecting with my local library to download their free books so I can read more than the free offers with Amazon.",Christmas Gift to ME!;;;;;;

Review: Absolutely Awesome hands free reading!!..  place holding and font adjustment make this the perfect gift!.. Great product!!..also Love being able to upload a book in a matter of less than a minute..too many good things about this..and so far have no bad to say about this!! Kudos!!..

Rating: 1.0 out of 5 stars,"Wish I could log 0 stars  Wish I hadn't fallen for the  the promotion.  They said trade in was for an old Kindle that was working or not  I sent Amazon a perfectly good, in perfect working order, Kindle and they said there was no value  Really good deal for Amazon.  Sold me a Kindle I didn't need .  Hope management notes this.  I trusted Amazon.",Good deal for Amazon -- they got my perfectly good ...;;;;;;

Review: Great device at a cheap price! The only problem is I am currently living in Thailand and it goes into Chinese Kindle store when I connect to wifi. I haven't found the way around it. Still read book that I copied manually!

Nice display and resolution. You don't need to get the 300 dpi upper version as your eyes can't catch the difference for books. I'm a graphic person so take my word. The upper version has night light but not a good illumunation. Just a few leds on the corners. Also it's not healthy to read books in dark. Don't harm your eyes and grab this.
No glare and no backlight to interfere with sleep.  Great option for nighttime reading.
If this had a speaker I would totally like it more than my other Kindle. Still 5 stars.

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"There's nothing wrong with it.  It's just small.  I don't think I've ever read a real book with pages as small as this.  If I was purchasing again, I'd definitely buy the 7.5.The display is OK, but it's not paperwhite.It also doesn't connect automatically to my wifi. I noticed this because I was reading my current book on another device and when I went back to Kindle it was still on the last page I had read on the kindle.  I had to find the menu and select Sync and then reconnect to my network.  The Kindle has not been out of the house or turned off.One of it's selling points is that you can read it in bright sunlight.  I hope that's true, because you definitely can't read it in dim light. It absolutely requires a well lit area to not give you eyestrain.","It's OK as for taking on a trip, but not a great choice as a daily reader. Only readable in well lit environment.";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"It is my first e-ink reader, and it really do look, feel like a paper. It would have been great if there were more popular books available on kindle unlimited. I have bought this reader mainly to replace my child's chapter books, but won't be able to replace all the chapter books as they are not unlimited service and need to buy them for quite a price^^. Still love its dictionary and word wise feature!!",feel like a paper;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"So far, I like it. It's small, light and portable. The Spanish dictionary is super useful and the Wikipedia feature is helpful. The ads are non intrusive and sometimes almost useful. I don't mind the lack of buttons. Seems to hold charge well. I do wish it had a back light but the paper white model seemed like too much of a price jump. I've had a nook and so far, neither are terribly different.",Grear deal for an e-reader;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"This is so much better a Kindle than my previous.  Far better resolution. Smaller and lighter, thus easier to hold.  Much easier and more expedient page advance.  Easy to navigate between several books being cross-referenced for reinforcing learning.  Highly recommend this item",Love This Device;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I like that the screen is as large as my OLD Kingle that died from over-use.  I like the hard edge around this one, as I can hold it better without touching the screen and loosing my place.  It fits in my purse better, as it goes everywhere I go.  If I sit down, I'm reading.",I like that the screen is as large as my OLD ...;;;;;;

Review: Have owned several Kindles from the time they were first on the market.  So glad the price has come down!  Finally bought a cover to go with this one and hope it will last - as I had no cover and broke the previous Kindles.  Loving the ease of turning the pages with this one!  Thank you!
Title;;;;;;: The Kindle is the only way to go!;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love my Kindle White Paper!  I really tried to get into reading on my Kindle Fire, but it ended up being more of an app platform for me.  Games and such, and with the high color, glossy screen, I just couldn't get into ebooks on my Fire.  This White Paper goes with me wherever I go, and it feels so much like reading a book.  For those of you looking for that ""book feeling"" this is the device for you.  With weeks worth of battery life, I couldn't be happier.",As Close to a Paperback Experience as You Can Get;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Had to replace my old original kindle and chose this unit.  My only downside I see is it is slipperier than the older version.  The older version was almost like a rubbery finish on the back making it easier to hold.. This one is just slick plastic.  I guess that's so you will buy the cover for it.  Also it is not very ""Glare-Free"", when reading at the table with the overhead lights on I have to move it so the glare on the screen is lessened. My old one was much better at reducing glare.",Several downsides;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love the original readers personally.  I have had the fire in the past, and after about a year or two though they had their perks they fizzled out.  Glad these are still available.  BTW Holy Speedy Shipping.  Chose the free shipping on items over $35.00, ordered it on a Sunday, MLK day was Monday and it was on my door step Tuesday afternoon.  Thanks Amazon Crew!",Love Original EReaders!;;;;;;

Review: I didn't think I would actually like to have a Kindle until I got one by default when we upgraded my Mother to a Kindle White with 3G service.  I love it and now am thinking upgrading sometime in the future.  It's easier and faster to read than printed books but I still love my paper and ink books too.  You won't be sorry if you buy a Kindle.
Title;;;;;;: I didn't think I would actually like to have a Kindle until I got one by ...;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,Easy to use and light which I like.  I'm glad I got it to go with my other Kindles.  I think I have one of each kind now and enjoy them all.  I am an avid reader and I carry a Kindle with me everywhere I go.,"Kindle 6"" Glare-Free Touchscreen";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I was quite skeptical about using something electronic to read. However, I am now hooked! I love that the screen is glare-free. The battery lasts a very long time! I have been using my Kindle consistently for a week and still have almost a full charge.",Impressive;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Well thought out book with a great presentation of life's turns and twists. Many interesting subtopics on the varieties of life's predicaments. Easy to read, so say all my friends. One of them says he is learning a lot from reading the various topics. I hope he is not saying this just because he is my friend!  Myself, I enjoyed re-reading it on kindle. What a pleasure it is to use my little kindle while relaxing in my favorite recliner. Life is good! That's what I learned from writing ""Reflections on the Art of Living.""",So easy to read;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"i love this kindle!!! i had originally upgraded to the 1st generation paperwhite and HATED it!  so i sent it back and ordered the new voyager (or what ever it's called).  it was back ordered til 12/8 and i was going away for thanksgiving so i got this.  yes, i wish it was backlit but i LOVE everything else about.  the touch screen is awesome and i love the size.  i highly recommend this kindle.",love this kindle!!!;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"It's compact and I can carry it in my purse.  The screen is easy to read.  It does a lot of things, more than I know how to use.  Thank goodness it has a how to use manual on board!  I like it fine.  I do wish it was backlit so I could read it in low-light conditions.  For the money though, it's good.",Nice compact size.;;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"I am not sure what happened here.  I had a 2 year old kindle that broke weeks after my extended warranty expired, so I bought this one.  It is easily twice the weight and bulk despite the fact touch technology has been around for over 2-3 years on the kindle.  Feels like a step backward.Part of why I loved my kindle was how thin and light is was.  This brick feels like I will constantly be aware of it's weight.  Also, size and shape not as easy to hold.  Kind of sad.",Thick;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I have been holding off buying a Kindle, but my husband gave me this for my birthday and I love it! I'm an author so when I'm not writing...I'm reading. I got a cover for it and it is so easy to hold and cart around. Highly recommend...even though I still like to hold and read a hardbound or paperback book.",but my husband gave me this for my birthday and I love it! I'm an author so when I'm not ...;;;;;;

Review: Great device at a great price.  Holds charge for a long period of time and is clear to read in the light while being easy on the eyes.  Ads do not interfere with reading and I see no need to pay extra to remove.  Only negatives are 1) there is a slight discoloration when turned off showing a whitish streak that disappears when turned on 2) cases are confusing and the Amazon website does not state the product generation within the product description.  Nevertheless the reader has worked flawless and is simple to use.
Title;;;;;;: Great device at a great price;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love this touchscreen version.  I had one of the original readers many years before it ""died"".  This is a wonderful change for me.  Much easier to use, small, lightweight, and no glare.  Everything I wanted in a reader.",Nice change from the original reader;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"I got this one after having a kindle keyboard that spontaneously shut down after years of having it.  I'm not too happy with it.  First, it DOES NOT support audiobook files which I use for long car trips.  Second, the touch screen is annoying.  Every time I have to turn a page I've gotta block my field of vision to touch the screen.  I've had it for less than a day and I'm already returning it.",I'm not too happy with it;;;;;;

Review: It is easier to accurately change pages with the forward/backward switches. With the touch screen I sometimes turn more than 1 page. And unintentional touches change pages when not intended. For some reason I lost the indicators at the bottom of the page that indicated percent read and another sequence number. How do I get some indicators displayed again? Is it possible to indicate page number or remaining time to complete book?
Title;;;;;;: It is easier to accurately change pages with the forward/backward ...;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Had a kindle before and loved it, from the time it stopped working I purchased this knew one and have not regretted it,I love love reading and this makes it so easy, it's light weight so I can hold it like a book which is fantastic, I take it every where, it's not hard on the eyes and easy to operate, so thanks Amazon for another great economical device for people like me who don't have lots to spend but love to read.",Fantastic;;;;;;

Review: Love it! I have a Kindle Fire but missed the glare free newsprint looking screen of my first generation Kindle. My eye are less tired and I can read longer than with my Fire. Thank you for having so many options for reading!
Title;;;;;;: Love it! I have a Kindle Fire but missed ...;;;;;;

Review: I am enjoying my new kindle and it's nice to be able to be outside and there is no glare on the screen.  I should have ordered this the first time.  I still use my first kindle because I have books downloaded on it.  I like the touch screen on my new kindle so I am very happy with my kindles.
Title;;;;;;: I am enjoying my new kindle and it's nice to be able to be outside and there is ...;;;;;;

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"I was really excited to receive this for Christmas ! It was definitely something I wasn't expecting! I'm a huge book fan so I love that this is in black and white , and easy to hold . You don't have the awkward struggle of trying to get comfy after you turn the page. The only thing is , I hate that theirs no option to adjust brightness. My eyes suck . That's the only reason I'm giving it three stars , it was a big disappointment in my case",I'm a huge book fan so I love that this is in black and white;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I was a little disappointed with the finish/texture on the back it seems cheaper than my last kindle (it was quite a bit less expensive) I have become used to the different feel, and have to say I love the speed and the goodreads interface. Overall quite pleased with this purchase.",Best yet?;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Upgraded from the ""original"" kindle touch. What I love about this unit is that it is a lot faster. Page turns are almost instantaneous and the kindle store loads in no time. The screen is brighter and much higher res. The software extras are pretty cool if you have kids or someone who's looking to beef up their English skills.The only downsides the slide to unlock seems silly I preferred the old method of pressing the button to get to my content.Also the back was a lot better with the Original touch, the solid black back with angles feel less premium.",Great upgrade from the orginal kindle touch;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"It has been a long time until I got my hand on the Kindle for a reasonable price - It has many virtues but quite a few faults as well. It is very convenient to hold and read, the font size is adjustable easily and the weight is great. The problems begin with the unfriendly operating and pull down menus, it is extremely confusing and does what it wants rather than what I ask it to do. That is actually the biggest disappointment and it is so laborious that I had gave up on the device after just a few trials. Even my kids, electronic device savvies, find it really hard to navigate.",the font size is adjustable easily and the weight is great;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love my kindle. The screen is not back lit so you do need a light to read which some might dislike however, I prefer it and I feel like my eyes don't get as tired. I love the selection they have and how quick, fast, and easy it is to get new books. Some people say it isn't really the same as reading a hard copy of a book, but I think it is very close. I chose this version of the Kindle main to encourage myself to actually read rather than getting distracted with apps. It is small, light and fits in the hands very well.",Great Product;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"An amazing product! Wish I got one a long time ago. Kind of sad that there is no separate power adapter that comes with it, but other than that, it came in one piece and I'm happy. Not much too say that other people haven't said already. 5 stars.",Great!;;;;;;

Review: Just what I wanted! Basic ereader that is light and easy to use. I really enjoy that this syncs so easily with amazon and my library! I used a nook for many years and have just upgraded to the Kindle due to all the great reviews I heard from my friends.I would highly suggest this if you want just the basic read and go ereader.
Title;;;;;;: Basic ereader that is light and easy to use;;;;;;

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"I had kindle2 up until it quit working last year. That was my first adventure in devices. I carry this one in my purse since it is lighter than my tablet. I have 5 bible translations I can read while waiting at doctor office, etc. The touch screen is great.",Light weight so it goes where I go.;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Nice unit. Its easy on the eyes compared to reading on a normal tablet screen. ""Turning"" the page is a bit strange, the screen does a quick, funky pixal dance as the new page comes up. You soon get used to it and don't notice it after a few pages.  I don't like the Ads. When you turn it off, it displays a ad for a book. So it never looks like its turned off...  I'm glad I got this reader. I'm sure I'll be reading a lot more e-books now.","I like it,";;;;;;

Review: I purchased this so that I could read ebooks before bed.  My other reading device is backlit and the blue light and flicker rate impact my sleep.  I am very happy with refurbished kindle.  I can't tell that it wasn't brand new.  It's VERY light and very easy to use.
Title;;;;;;: I am very happy with refurbished kindle;;;;;;

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"I bought the first Kidle free 3G @ Best buy Dadeland North,Miami  2010 when I flew back to Philippines.I accidentally broke the Screen. Diagonal crack some remain about an inch upper the Keypad. I Still used it. Because it has a screen orientation to turn what display you want.Since, it is broken I'd still use onboard, ,with an inch.display enough to read & text a messages about 2contract(10months each Dur.)only Hyan(Yolanda Typhoone) completely destroy it.Bottom line I like so much the Free 3G features.even in the Middle of English Channel UK & FranceI Still Have accessed in Facebook&Chikka. ""Except in Russia""heheh,Military Security kindle 3G offline.I wanted to Buy a new one.Hope, I'l fine soon the New Kindle Touch 3G very useful to sailor's who knew Kindle.its true. .More power",I bought the first Kidle free 3G @ Best buy Dadeland North;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"It was exactly what I expected, plus a little more. It reads just like a book but you can hold it in one hand easily. There's an ""experimental browser"" which lets you go to certain websites. I've been reading a free ebook online with it. Sometimes the screen is a little glitchy when I scroll, but it's an experimental browser...that usually means it's not completely perfect.",It reads just like a book but you can hold it in one ...;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Love it. Battery life is long. Glare free is awesome, I don't feel like I've been staring at a light for too long.  Also I can use my galaxy charger to charge my kindle.The only problem is it takes too long to shut down the kindle, you have to press the on/off button for a long time before the shut down screen comes on. Maybe there is an easier way to shut it down, I just haven't figured it out yet.",Love it. Battery life is long;;;;;;

Review: Item was delivered with expert packaging; it had plenty of bubble wrap! I love this Kindle and would recommend it to anyone who is shopping for one.  It is easy to read books and now I'm waiting for the cover to be delivered.
Title;;;;;;: I love this Kindle and would recommend it to anyone who ...;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love it.  It's so light weight and fits in all my purses.  Also, no more knots on my forehead from my old Kindle hitting me when I fall asleep reading.  Love Amazon Prime, Love Kindle Prime and Love my new Kindle 6""  Glare-Free Touchscreen Display.  Keep up the good work!!","Everyone should have a new 6"" Kindle";;;;;;

Review: I have been using this after my 3rd generation Kindle stop working and I greatly miss my old kindle. There is no text to speech function which I used so often that I just use my iphone or ipad more than my new kindle. Touch function is nice to have but I don't see much improvement.

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"My biggest concern was the page color/tone. Too dark for my eyes, making it difficult to read for more than a few minutes.  Perhaps not an issue for the younger set. I did like being able to set the font, nice feature, as i prefer a sans serif myself. Wish the app did that. Otherwise no complaints, very light to hold. I may try the new lit version.",Returning;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"We had the reader with the buttons and it started to flake out on us this unit is great I love having something you can only read on, I don't get side tracked by other unit that have all the bells and whistles so I am glad kindle still has this unit and hope they never do away with it/",... started to flake out on us this unit is great I love having something you can only read on;;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"Terrible. I was stuck in the ""Getting Started"" screen for several days. There is no user manual that comes with the device. Finally, I shut the whole thing down and restarted. I then had to wait 10 minutes for an update. Next, I got stuck in the book I began reading and could not get back to the home screen. I prepared to return it, but my fianc decided to look up youtube videos on how to use it. Books don't need youtube videos, so I think I will stick with them.",VERY user un-friendly;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I got my Kindle over two years ago, and it is still awesome. I am an avid reader and read for long stretches at a time. My kindle is perfect for this. The battery never has run out on me and I tend to read for 8 hours straight. i finally got a Kindle paperwhite and now this Kindle belongs to my son who is still using it and it works great.",Still going strong over two years later!;;;;;;

Review: I bought the kindle fire first generation when it first came out. This last Christmas I bought this kindle reader for my teenage son. He loves it. It is so light and the screen is so easy to read. I am planning on buying one for myself. The kindle fire has a back-lit screen that makes it very difficult to read books on--especially outdoors and in sunshine.

I love my Kindle. It does what it promises and I think it's easy to use. I used to be anti e-book because I love seeing/feeling real books but for some reason I'm more inclined to read every night on an e-reader. I just keep the Kindle in plain sight by my bed. It's easier to transport than a book and it's nice to have your library on one device and be able to instantly read a new book as soon as you finish one.

This is the first kindle I have ever owned and I just love it. It is so light in the hand and the downloads are so fast. Now that 1000 page book won't kill my wrist to hold. This was the best Christmas present ever.
Title;;;;;;: ... first kindle I have ever owned and I just love it. It is so light in the hand ...;;;;;;

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"The only drawback I would say are the ads every time the screen times out or you put the screen in sleep mode instead of completely off. This is what amazon means by ""With Special Offers"". In order to get rid of them you have to pay 20 more dollars which still keeps it cheaper or the same as other e-readers, but I did not like the misleading description.Other than that, I love the size, weight, and look of this kindle. This is my first e-reader and I love the ability to change font sizes, look up words on the spot, or even highlight a character name for a quick synopsis when you can't remember where that character came from. I am a huge paper book lover so still having the feel of looking at paper is a huge plus. I also like that there is no backlight because I read before bed and looking at screens with a backlight right before going to bed keeps me awake.",but I did not like the misleading description;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"The Kindle I got was for my husband and is easy to use, as he isn't savv when it comes to anything in the tech world.  He loves it.  The glare free screen is just that, even in the Florida sun.  Great product!","Love the Kindle 6"" Glare Free";;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"I was led to believe it would do one thing and it does but not well at all.  I am really disappointed in this Kindle.  I'm still trying to decide to keep it or return it.  The touch screen isn't user friendly, the browser is a joke unless you have all day to try to get it to connect and actually do something useful and the Wi-Fi compatibility  is not up to standard.  I am considering returning it and purchasing something else.  I should have known it was too good to be true.  You get what you pay for no matter what they say it will do.",REALLY DISSATISFIED;;;;;;

Review: Very pleased with this basic Kindle and wish I had bought one a long time ago!  It has exceeded my expectations on battery life already and i love that it is so light and easy to carry and easy to use.  I wanted something i could read like a book and this Kindle is perfect for me.  No extras with a great price and I did not duplicate all the tablet features I already had with my tablet.
Title;;;;;;: Basic Kindle is a great value for reading;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I like the product very much because it is lightweight and will be great for backpacking,however I am very disappointed that the device is now marked down $20 more dollars a week after I purchased it and feel like you should refund some money to me or at least send a free cover.",kindle 6in glarefree;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I really like this device.  I also have a barnes and noble  nook color which I find clunky, heavy and slightly inconveneint.  There are two things I find odd, one being the lack of back lighting, but the text is so clear that for the most part it doesn't bother me.  The second is that it does not really shut off, just shuts the screen off and it is difficult to monitor the battery level.  Since the battery has a long life, that isn't even very important.  Very very happy that i took the plunge and bought it.",I really like this device;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I actually won this in a raffle, and I absolutely love it! The size is perfect to bring it with you to any place. There are many fun and affordable cases out there for it.Only reasons its not five star is I miss headphone jack, the feature that's reads the book to you, its only 4 gigs not 8, and no constant internet with or without Wi-Fi. But those were all thing my old kindle keyboard had.",and I absolutely love it! The size is perfect to bring it ...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Kindle, designed for its particular function as an e-reader has many good points over a table or whatever else.First, it functions wonderfully, andSecondly, it's rugged. If you drop your tablet, its off to the store for a new one. In its case, if you drop your Kindle, it may loose your place, but it still works great.A Kindle fan absolutely!!",designed for its particular function as an e-reader has many good points over a table or whatever else;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"Usually, I use Kindle Reader on my iPad.  It doesn't work well in bright light and I wanted something else that I could use under those conditions.  In that respect, this Kindle serves its purpose.  But, it is a little more basic than I thought it would be.","Usually, I use Kindle Reader on my iPad. ...";;;;;;

Review: Love this Kindle.  I owned one of the oldest models with the buttons on the side but wanted something new.  It took me a minute to get use to the touch screen but I love everything about this kindle. Very easy to navigate and search for books.  Highly recommend for the price.

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"The device is easy to navigate and easy to read. However, it, like all 4 Kindles I own, has a tendency to freeze occasionally for no apparent reason. I have yet to have any communication from Amazon about this problem. Improve your hardware, people. Also, it is very tedious to shop in the Kindle store, as one must go sequentially through the listings. As one who buys 15 to 20 books per month, I would like some way, other than listing a specific author, to be able to go further in the list without simply turning page after page after page.",The device is easy to navigate and easy to read;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Love my kindle. It works wonders! Exactly what I wanted it for: reading. I don't mind that it doesn't have the back LED lights. I got it for day reading and it's perfect. The interface is smooth and straight forward. The tutorial at the beginning is very clear. The only reason it gets four stars is the page turn tends to be a bit off sometimes. Other than that, amazing.",Love my kindle;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Just what I was looking for. I have used many reading apps on my phone, however I can get distracted by texts and emails coming in. With the Kindle, I can leave my phone in a different room and let the book absorb me in.This version does support PDFs, however the screen is small which makes for a difficult time in reading some PDFs. Otherwise works quite quickly.",just what I needed.;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Love the look and readability of the screen. Great to use for trips, can read several books and takes very little space. Battery seems to last a really long time.  Only downfalls... Had to buy reading light for reading at night. Friend had an older version Kindle and had some games loaded (solitaire, sudoku and battleship) I haven't been able to get any loaded on mine.",Compact and battery lasts a long time;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I gave this same Kindle to my boyfriend 3 years ago and he still reads constantly.  When a friend gave me my own I was thrilled, but now I can't put in words how it has changed my life!  No more searching for something to watch on TV, I read constantly, have read 8 books in one week!  was worried about being able to see the script, but being able to change the font size has solved that problem.  I'm taking advantage of the free book trial too!",Can't Imagine Life Without It!;;;;;;

Review: Since this is my first Kindle I like how easy it was to understand and navigate. I don't do computers very much. Only downside was that there is no back light so have to have lamp or other light source in order to read. Battery charge last very long time (about a week) before I have to recharge it. I would recommend this one for beginners.
Title;;;;;;: Since this is my first Kindle I like how easy it was to understand and navigate;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"If you just want a simple ebook reader, it's a great toy to have the screen is like looking at a glare free chess mat. You can look at it for hours. I bought it to get back to the basics and dial back from my internet time. My coworker tells me amazon has a better selection then barns and noble with their nook.",I love it!!;;;;;;

Review: I've been a Kindle 3 keyboard user for two years.  The Kindle Touchscreen is great; ease of use once I read the included on board manual.  The only thing I like better on the Kindle 3 is the display of the contents.

Having the Free Time with all those books at my fingertips is great and having achievements to unlock is motivating. It is dark and I don't see a way to brighten it. Sometimes it is difficult to do the vocabulary or get back to the home screen. Also if you don't get the achievement try going back with the book and seeing if you looked at the cover.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I wanted a plain and simple e-reader because all I needed was to read books.  This is perfect - compact, clear, easy to navigate, and affordable.  It doesn't have a bunch of fancy features, so as long as you're not looking for that, this is a good pick.",This is perfect - compact;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"It's smaller than my last Kindle, but for the price, its wonderful. So many new features to it than my old Kindle which I'd had for four years didn't have. Love it and would recommend it as its lightweight and travels very easy.",its wonderful. So many new features to it than my ...;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"If there was a place for headphones so we could enjoy audible it would have gotten five stars.  This is my second Kindle.  I also use the kindle app on my ipad which is why I chose not to get the paperwhite.  This is fast, the battery lasts, enjoying very much!!!",... there was a place for headphones so we could enjoy audible it would have gotten five stars;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"The device is find for an adult. I bought it for my 8 year old for Christmas. It was not clear exactly how to set it up and ad it to my account. It took almost an hour on the phone to get that done. The web page on Amazon advertising this says you can get the ""unlimited"" ""starting at $2.99"". I called Amazon prior to purchasing it to find out exactly what you get for $2.99 per month. I was told that with my $100/yr prime membership plus the $2.99/mo, that my son would be able to read for no additional charge anything marked ""kindle unlimited"" - that is not true. You get a very small set of books, most of which are too basic/young for an 8 year old for $2.99/month. To get just some of the books he wants, you need the full $9.99/mo subscription. Which is fine, but that is not what I was told before I bought it. Books don't consistently show up on it either - some showed up on my sons kindle, some of my son's books showed up on mine. Additionally, the ""free time"" application is not very intuitive - it was hard to figure out how to get books into it or the device out of free time mode.","Great for an adult, not so good for a parent buying for a child";;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"I have a Paper White 7 inch.  It is second generation and I love it.  This touch screen is a little difficult to use.  Unlike the ipad, this screen does not turn the pages as easily.  Hope this helps to improve this product!",It is second generation and I love it. This touch screen is a little difficult ...;;;;;;

Review: I love my kindle.  I am to a book reader but am becoming one now. It is so convenient and compact so I carry it everywhere.  I can see the words fine without the light as long as the room is lit.  The pages turn easily and it is user friendly.

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"Got this for my daughter who is 11.  She has an iPad for school and loves to get library books on it to read.  We don't like her reading from it at night, so got her this.  She had been using mine but we often wanted to read at the same time.  We were both sad to find that you can't get some of the free kindle games that we love to play as a family on it, like Every Word and Dots and Boxes.  They are not available for this 7th generation.  They are great little word or strategy games.  Not sure why they are not available.  Other than that, she loves it.  Just a tiny bit disappointed.",Almost great;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Really enjoying my new Kindle. Reading the User's Guide has taken a while because there's a lot to absorb, but at least I can always check back when I've got a question.For years I've used Kindle apps on tablets and Kindle Cloud on the Chrome browser, so I know already how much I like reading ebooks. But I like having an actual Kindle because of the super amount of reading time on a single charge, especially when compared to a tablet!",Hours of reading on a single charge;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I'm writting this review because I really like Kindle, but I think that it has some good and bad points. As to the good points: it is light weighted, easy to take to places, has a high memory capacity, it makes it easier to carry a lot of books at the same time. As to the bad points: for me, the worse thing is that Kindle doesn't have an option where you can invert the lights, so when you are in a dark place you can't read. I understand that it is supposed to be like an actual book, but as a customer, if i am choosing to buy an eletronic book, rather than an actual book, it is because I want more reading options. But I really recommend this product.",Kindle the Best choice;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Compact, hardy, and easy to use. Battery hasn't been charged since I got it over a week ago, and still doesn't need to be. I read 2-3 hours a day when possible and boy is this awesome. Since I got it for $49 bucks I don't have to be super careful with it either. I just treat it like a book.",Affordable eReader;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I love the feel and look of the Kindle, and if you can make reading on a screen any closer to reading an actual book, this is it.
