Which leads to my only complaint: there is no backlight. One of the main reasons I would choose a device over a book is to be able to read in lowlight, which you cannot do with this Kindle. I received this as a gift, so will keep it and use it, though sadly not as often as I'd like.","Good intro to an e-reader, but no night owls!";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Having upgraded from a 2nd gen Kindle, I love the smaller size and the fact that it is so lightweight, I can easily carry it in my purse and take my books everywhere.  I also like that it's touchscreen like my other devices (iPad, iPhone, etc).  Can't tell you how many times I have switched from reading on my iPad to my old Kindle, tried to swipe the page and thought for a second it was broken because it wasn't responding .  The battery life is good and the glare-free display is easy on the eyes.",Love my Kindle 7th gen!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"For what this is intended to be, it deserves five stars. It is the perfect, inexpensive, starter book reader. Thin, easy to use, compact, long-lasting battery charge, and adjustable sized fonts. There is no brightness adjustment, and you need an external light source to read after dark. The newer ones have 4gb of storage. I soon realized I wanted a few more features, and upgraged to the Paperwhite model, which does have the brightness adjustment, and internal lighting. Both models come with the same USB charging cable. You can plug them into your computer, or, many standard phone chargers work just fine, as does my iPad charger, using the Kindle USB cable.","Basic book reader, just the essentials";;;;;;

Review: A good reader. The only reason I give it four out of five is I'm not over fond of touchscreens; I liked the buttons on the old style better. That's just personal preference with no reflection on how the device works.
Title;;;;;;: A good reader. The only reason I give it four ...;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Can't complain...product is exactly as described.  It is very lightweight, easy to read, & is pretty fast when downloading books off of wifi.  I would recommend this to any avid reader.  I would add though if you want to read in a darker setting then you should go with a backlit Kindle.",easy to read;;;;;;

Review: This is my 3rd (or maybe 4th) Kindle and this is the best so far.  Having the buttons back for page turning is a huge plus.  Tapping the screen was OK but I like being able to leave my thumb resting on the button then just pressing for a page turn.  Reminds me of the early generations which I liked for that reason.  I also think the power button placement is better on the back.The only thing I wish for is the ability to assign the left big page turn button to be page back instead of page forward.
Title;;;;;;: ... 3rd (or maybe 4th) Kindle and this is the best so far;;;;;;

Review: I have owned many kindles. I have the app on my phone and 2 tablets. I read daily for hours so l know how to navigate a kindle. This kindle is constantly changing my font size. Sometimes as many as 10 times in an hour. Very irratating. But I only have this problem with this device. All my others (my husband and daughter's) kindles are awesome along with my the apps on other devices.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I have resisted buying any distracting, portable technology but I'm glad I bought my Kindle! It is easy to use, convenient to carry and a great way to pass time while waiting in airports or in restaurants. Also, I enjoy that I can carry all my favorite books in one small package.",A GREAT CONVENIENCE;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I got one each for my 10 and 6 year old girls for Christmas, and one for myself.  Truly one of the best Christmas presents I've given us!  Love it.  This is our first reading device so I can't make a comparison to any other product, but I can tell you we're enjoying ours very much.",Truly one of the best Christmas presents I've given us;;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"This was a replacement for my 6"" e-ink previous generation (5th) ""buttoned"" Kindle, and I must say that I am very upset with how much heavier (about 15%) and bulkier it is from that one. I would've gotten that exact one had it still been available. The design of this new one is uglier, too - my old one had nice rounded edges, while this one has squared edges and looks like a thin brick. Add to the situation that it arrived a day late and this it's a bad experience all around. I do not recommend it if you're upgrading from the 5th generation ""buttoned"" Kindle, though new users obviously won't notice a difference.","5th Generation ""Buttoned"" Kindle was better.";;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I have had this Kindle for one wee.  It is OK, but I'm still missing my old (keyboard) one with the reading light available via the purchased cover, but I do enjoy this one being for reading only. I also miss the availability of the Book Description link.",Adjusting to the New;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"While I am absolutely obsessed with Kindle (I got the first generation, and have had one ever since), I dislike the touch-screen. I have stocked up on several of the fifth generation kindles with the buttons, and am dreading the day that I have to get the touch-screen. Many of the improvements that amazon has made have been awesome- i.e. the fact that the new ones have a built-in light. I do wish they would continue to offer a non-touch screen version, however, as I think it is both easier to use, more intuitive, and has faster page-turning ability.",BRING BACK THE BUTTONS!;;;;;;

Review: I love my new kindle 6 inch reader a lot. The only problem for me is that it's not lit up. I'm used to my kindle fire 7in and my fire HDX 8.9 in that are both lit. I am going to order a reading light to attach to my new reader so that will solve my problem
Title;;;;;;: I love my new kindle 6 inch reader a lot;;;;;;

Review: I have put of buying one of these for a long time... that was a mistake! it's light - thin - battery last a long time and easy to read!you can adjust the font size. It's great for travel and a book loads in seconds and they are not expensive. I really thought I would miss a paper book... I don't!
Title;;;;;;: it's light - thin - battery last a long time and easy to read;;;;;;

Rating: 1.0 out of 5 stars,"Unfortunately, I've not been able to read pass one chapter with this Kindle E-reader. The pages do not change when touching and the device keeps getting stuck then turns off. This is the most frustrating thing since I am an avid reader. am completely stumped with this one. Guess I'll have to spend more money on a better reader. Not a happy customer :(",Guess I'll have to spend more money on a better reader. Not a happy customer;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Good product. Was a gift and im very happy with it.It's back lit, but I like that. It really does read like paper. And the instant link to Wikipedia is nice.It has limited, but useful internet browsing. But its tricky to find at first.Once you figure out how to navigate this thing, its quite handy.",Good product. Was a gift and im very happy ...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Great product. I also have the paperwhite edition and this one is as good as the other one (except for the screen light).The screen is the same size as the PW, but the second device is slimmer.If you read under normal lightning conditions you are going to love this Kindle.",Great buy for a low price! Recommended for book readers!;;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"I really tried to like this product as I have wanted a Kindle for a long time.  However, the screen darkness, even in brightly lit rooms or outside, made it difficult to read.  Amazon shows multiple images of this device with a white screen however this device doesn't actually have a white screen.Returned.",Actual screen doesn't match Amazon's web images for device;;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"Kindle arrived, but software is not working properly. I can't open the start menu once I have opened a book, so it's impossible to return to Home screen (I have to open the dictionary abd from there go to Home). I tried reading the manual, but it wasn't very helpful because it referred to butttons that the device doesn't have. I imagine this device has the wrong software. I will contact Amazon to see if they can fix this.",Software error?;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"ProsLight, fast, text is easy to read.ConsI have an old keyboard Kindle with a lot of content and collections.  The collections do not show up in the cloud along with the content that is on the old Kindle.  The collections do show up in the cloud but only if you are trying to put something into or take something out of a collection.  Also, I can find no way to bring down the collections from the cloud.  I would like to have the collections on BOTH Kindles.  Oh well...",text is easy to read;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"This is my 6th Kindle purchase -- including the replacements for two that were left in airports.  I am pleased with this one but would have off one more week had I known a new with ""back lighting"" was being released so soon.",I am pleased with this one but would have off one more ...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love my Kindle Fire.....hadn't seen one until a lady had one in the ER, and she showed me how it worked......SOLD ME!It was packaged nicely so it wouldn't get damaged in transit~ Thank you AMAZON!",LOVE IT!;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"It's a little bit touchy/ sensitive and can accidentally change text size or highlight a word without trying but for the most part it's been great - small, light weight and long battery life. I would recommend.",Pretty good product;;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"This is my 4th Kindle and I consider this tablet to be a piece of junk. It freezes up a lot  and the touch screen is unpredictable. One time you tap the screen to change the page and the next time you have to push hard all over the screen to turn page. Sometimes you touch to turn page and fonts show up and automatically changes the font size on its own. From watching the battery icon  discharge I don't see how it would last for weeks. I read  1hr per day and turn off wifi  and the battery still seems to be discharging too much. The Kindle, that I have , is very aggravating at  times.",Not worth the aggravation;;;;;;

Review: I love this product! I was a hardcore Nook fan but my Nook-glow light after time started ripping and the back light started to show through. I bought my Kindle paper white 5 months ago and we have been inseparable ever since. Amazing product its so light and so simple to use. Can take my entire library everywhere. Will shout my love of this product from the roof tops and praise it to anyone who will listen to my rants.
Title;;;;;;: Buy it! Use it! Read it!;;;;;;

Review: This was a Christmas gift from my daughter and I love it.  My wife has had a B&N Nook for several years now and I was getting tired of borrowing it to read things.  Now we have the best of both worlds.  The Kindle gives the feel of holding a paperback sized book with out the weight and thickness that some thick paperbacks have.

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"I really like the kindle.  I would have liked the white version, however this was a gift, and am thrilled to have gotten it.  I find myself picking it up more often  than I have any of the books I've bought. I love taking it to my appointments, usually there is a wait and it is so much better to have, than those magazines.  I've wanted one for a long time, just never took the plunge, I do miss the light that would able me to read in bed, Hopefully I can still purchase one that I can attach to it . I did get a cover. I do like the borrowing from the Amazon library with no time limit.I was able to get on the Ohio digital Library also.  So far it's been great.",I really like the kindle;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"The first kindle I had had audio, so I was able to listen to my audible books.  This was the one I could afford, but I'm sorry that audio is no longer available in all kindle formats.That being said, I love my kindle, and I really enjoy kindle unlimited.","Nice product, but I wish all kindles still came with audio.";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"UPDATE: (12/10/15) Now that I've ready about a dozen books on my Kindle with no software glitches whatsoever, I must assume that the initial problems I dealt with were resolved by one of the automatic updates. All the features have been working perfectly for the past 4 months and I now appreciate the Kindle even more than my Nook, thus I must update my review to 5-star since that's exactly how the Kindle has been working for me. It's virtually transparent when engrossed in a novel, but quick and responsive whenever you need to look up a word, find an explanation on Wikipedia, or highlight text. Excellent product!UPDATE:  (8/11/15) After initially posting a 2-star review (see below) based on my serious frustration due to having to reboot the device about one out of every three times I attempted to use the dictionary look-up or highlight features while reading, I have decided that when it DOES work properly, it's a fabulous reading device. I do actually like the way it functions slightly better than my Nook, and it's quite a bit more responsive (as it should be compared to a 5-year-old product). Overall, it's a well designed piece of hardware and if it weren't for the fact that I cringe a little bit every time I try to look up or highlight something, I would be giving it a 5-star rating. As this is an operating system issue it can be easily resolved, so I will give Amazon the benefit of the doubt on this one and hope that it gets resolve with the next firmware release. Until then I maintain that my 1st generation Nook still works more reliably.***This thing works... sort of. Compared to my first generation Nook it's complete garbage. On my Nook I could actually use the highlights and dictionary lookup features. With this piece of crap if you try to use any of those features it just freezes up so you have no choice but to reboot it. The hardware is fine, hence 2 stars instead of one, but the firmware/software is RIDICULOUSLY buggy for what I would consider to be an established product. Seriously Amazon, crap like this should have been eliminated my now. Why does my 1st generation Nook work better??? Anyhow, if you do choose to purchase this, just don't try to do anything with it other than turn the pages.",Initally too buggy for such an established product... but working great now.;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"I ordered this kindle with excitement and found it really useful and convenient when I see it for the first time. I wanted to give five stars comment but unfortunately I found that there is a small area that is not as smooth as it supposed to be on the screen. It's hard to find, but once you find it, you can never stand it. Due to the departure for me, I can not ask for a replacement, but I want to remind people to be careful with the screen. Anyway, I believe the product is wonderful if it's in a perfect condition.",... ordered this kindle with excitement and found it really useful and convenient when I see it for the first ...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Excellent E-reader.  Simple to use, easy to understand, light weight fits in purse so you can take with you any where. My o my complaint is the pictures off your books on the home page should be larger",Excellent;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I still have the older Kindle.  Wouldn't be without one, but I'm saving for a Paperwhite, mostly because of the lighted (lit?) background.  My only beef with Kindle is that even the newest versions have this problem:  notice that when you adjust font SIZE, there is a sudden jump about in the middle of the line of selections?  That's exactly where I'd love to have my font size!  (wah!)  Hel-lo, amazon R&D'ers, are you paying attention?",A giant crevasse!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I really enjoy my kindleIt was a gift snd didn't realize how much I would use it ,as I am an avid reader and like the feel of the older books and flipping the pages etc.The kindle also has so many great features like the vocsbulary/ notes/bookmarks","Didn't think I would enjoy my kindle so much, but it's great!!";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I personally love the Kindle Paperwhite. It's got a smooth, sleek feel to it and the touchscreen display is well-designed. I am able to read clearly on this Kindle product, and it even lights up a bit when the room is a bit dim. I've never had any problems reading books using the Kindle. In fact, before I received the Paperwhite, I wasn't much of a reader. Now, since it carries a huge library of books as well as the Kindle Unlimited service that Amazon offers, it is so easy to pick up your Kindle and start reading right away.I forgot to mention that this has been my most used electronic product to date.",The Kindle Paperwhite is a Wonderful Product;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love this reader so much. I take it in my purse everywhere. This is the best thing I have ever bought for myself. Do a lot of reading (I drive a truck and have a lot of down time loading and unloading, so this helps to keep my sanity).",I love this reader so much;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love the new Kindle E reader that I purchased.  I am still learning how to use some sections of it and haven't shared any books yet but just using this when I read is so much nicer than actually holding a book.  I love that it holds my place when it is laid down, and that it shows me how long I have left to finish the book at the speed I am reading.  However the one draw back I am finding is that Glare free is a myth.  Nothing about this is glare free.",I love the new Kindle E reader that I purchased;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I really love this Kindle, the only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because sometimes it will jump a few pages ahead randomely and I have to find which page I'm on. It's possible that it's because of the case I have on it, but I haven't figured it out yet!",I really love this Kindle;;;;;;

Review: I love my Kindle Paper White. I can read it outside without a glare. The only thing that would make it any better would be a feature to turn on a back lit screen. That would allow me to read it inside as well as outside. Love my Kindle.

I would recommend this kindle it's fun and easy to use.my reason for 4 stars and not 5 is it would be nice if you could see it in the dark to read other then that it's great and I'm very happy I purchased two.

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"I, over all, really like this Kindle.  What do not like is Every time I accidently touch the page, something happens. Like to find size changes or the menu pops up or I accidently turn the page.  I miss my old kindle! I do like that is books to the Wi-Fi faster and the kindle store is way easier to navigate.",really like this Kindle;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"While my new Kindle 6"" Glare-Free Touchscreen has a few new features: love being able to adjust size of letters as then don't need my glasses.  My biggest complaint is I don't like touching the screen to turn page. It is way too easy to accidentally touch screen and change page when carrying from one room to another; much PREFER the older way by clicking on side of case; far less 'oops'. Only complaint with old model was keyboard at bottom; seldom used it.Did get a new cover as old ones don't fit - quite a shame as old one I used for years was easier to open; and it had a secure 'anchor' on side.Would I recommend this to others yes;" but would be a YES to my old model.""
Review: love being able to adjust size of letters as then ...";

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Regarding page turning;"  there are times when touch page turning does not work
Review: and at those times I wish for the positive action of the buttons.  I have found that this happens when I am reading while theKindle is plugged in and charging.  Perhaps this has happened also to those who miss the buttons that their old Kindle had.""

This is my first Kindle and I absolutely LOVE it.  I was very wary of trying an e-reader of any kind but finally decided to give it a try after learning about some interesting benefits to reading on a Kindle vs a traditional good ol' book.  I was very surprised that I ended up loving it and wishing I had bought one sooner. If you're on the fence about e-readers at all you should definitely just take the plunge and make the purchase..you will not be sorry!

I am so excited that I finally purchased myself a Kindle. I've been holding off far too long! I love how easy it is for me to download a book and I LOVE the Kindle Unlimited subscription. Works perfectly for my lifestyle since I live out of a camper. I love books however the space is limited. Kindle is my hero!
Title;;;;;;: I love how easy it is for me to download a ...;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"It is a great reader, so easy to use and very light, it does not hurt your eyes like other readers/tablet. Youll need a cover to have a better hold and the only drawback is that you need light lamp at night.","It is a great reader, so easy to use and very lithe";;;;;;

Review: The Easter Bunny brought one each to both of my daughters )ages 9.5 and 11.5) and they love them!  They have read more in the last three days since they've had them then they had in the last 3 weeks.  They only issue I've had is being able to read the title of the book when all the books are listed on the home screen.
Title;;;;;;: 5) and they love them! They have read more in the last ...;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"It's just like my old Kindle (an earlier model )but improved. The text is sharp, it's more comfortable to hold, and the touch technology is more sophisticated. Let's hope it lasts even longer than my old one did!",It's just like my old Kindle (an earlier model )but improved;;;;;;

Review: it is everything I expected it to believe..I am very satisfied with it...I knew that it did not have an 'internal' light..which would be nice...but manage without it nicely...great pickup for the price!
Title;;;;;;: I am very satisfied with it;;;;;;

Review: I went for the Kindle without a light as I decided a clip on light was cheaper than the difference in price between thus and the paperwhite. After a couple updates it prompted me if I wanted to use the custom font Bookerly. I will be ordering a second kindle as my daughter who is visually impaired loved that any book could become giant print.

This is my first Kindle and though I haven't used it as much as I plan to it is a very nice device.  I thought I might have missed out by not getting the Paperwhite but the Glare-Free screen works great and the lack of back lighting is not a problem.
Title;;;;;;: ... much as I plan to it is a very nice device. I thought I might have missed out ...;;;;;;

Review: Works just as described only thing I would say is if you were wanting to read your comics in color not going to happen. You'll need the kindle with the color screen but if you don't mind that then look no further this is the one for you.
Title;;;;;;: Amazing for books... Not for colorful comics;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"As always a great product, this one went to my son so when he was in trouble he could still access his books. I was going for very basic for that reason and this is just right. Love that it went on sale 3 days after I bought mine, but amazon was again great and refunded the difference.",As always great product;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I enjoyed it so much, I bought my daughter one for Christmas.  The original one that I received 5 years ago is going to be passed down to her daughter.  It is light weight, easy to hold, as I have arthritis which makes it painful to hold a book.",I enjoyed it so much;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Purchased this for my son who loves to read. Thought i would give it a shot since the house is crowding with books and taking up too much space. He loves it, the display is great and perfect for reading and he can just download the books and not have to worry about storing them later. Great investment for someone who loves reading.",Great Purchase;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I got this for Christmas and I love it! I used to have an older version, so I didn't have the touchscreen feature. It might take a little while to get completely used to it, but it proves easy and self-explanatory. My Kindle is small enough to fit in your purse while being big enough to read easily. I really enjoy the seamless flipping between pages and handy menu at the top of the screen as opposed to a menu button and arrow keys. When my old Kindle was working, I had almost the entire Anne of Green Gables collection, and was sad when I lost it. Since my books were in the Cloud, I now have the whole set back and can't wait to read them again!",I love my Kindle! :);;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love my Kindle. I am an avid reader, but have developed cataracts & had to give up reading. Went to large print books, but they are so heavy & finally decided to try a Kindle. It is fantastic & I read all the time again. My complaint is I went with the 30 day free trial of Kindle Unlimited which then was to switch to $9.99 month until I stopped it. Well discovered today that they just took $99 out of my account for Amazon Premium (or whatever it is called. And I CAN'T find anyway to get ahold of Amazon to straighten this out. Is this a rip off or what. I DO NOT WANT their premium service since all I am interested in is ebooks.  I'm giving the Kindle a 5 star rating, but not the Premium service. Still would like the Kindle Unlimited.",I love my Kindle;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"My old Kindle finally died. I had it for about five years.(Well done old friend) this new Kindle is at a completely different level touchscreen,  black ink like printing is very easy on the eyes. Just a real pleasure to read from. Well done Seventh generation Kindle.",black ink like printing is very easy on the eyes;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"This Kindle replace my Kindle Touch, which I unfortunately placed in the wrong spot and so got recycled with my old newspapers. So I have to get used to the differences. I miss the text-to-speech feature of my ""late"" Kindle and scrolling is different. I'm also not clear on how the book sharing works although we have setup some arrangement;" my wife also just purchased the same Kindle.""
Review: Need To Get Used To It";;;;;

I was surprised at how small in size it is. It's nice because your hands don't get tired from holding it. I Have rheumatoid arthritis so it's nice for me. It's non glare is nice for reading in bright light.
Title;;;;;;: Good things in a small package;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Love my Kindle, Kindle, 6"" Glare-Free Touchscreen. It does not have a backlight but you can read it with just a little light. I lost my first one on a plane the other day so I'm getting ready to buy another one because I liked it so much.","Love my Kindle, Kindle, 6"" Glare-Free Touchscreen";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Bought the reader to take advantage of Kindle unlimited...very happy with my decision!!  Both the reader and the program live up to expectations...ease of use, long battery charge, variety of books available, cost effective.  I highly recommend!",Good deal!!;;;;;;

Review: I really like my new Kindle.  I recieved it as a birthday present from my children. One of the things I do not like that it did not come with an instruction manual.  The online manual is not real user friendly.  Probably the biggest disappointment with it is that it is not back lit or have a light for reading in dark places or at night.  I had borrowed my daughters and really liked it and that it is why they bought me this one.  Her Kindle had a light to it which worked great for reading at night so I figured my new Kindle would also.
Title;;;;;;: I really like my new Kindle;;;;;;

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"It is ok. The print for your selections is very small. You can make the actual print for the book reading larger which is great.  I had wanted the paper white version but there was a misunderstanding and they got me this  one.  So far I am still learning all the things it can do, eventually I will have it where I want it to be.","kindle e-reader, 6"" glare-free";;;;;;

Review: I didn't know what to expect with the Kindle. I enjoy the ease of downloading several books to have on hand without actually carrying several books with me.  I have some trouble with the glare-free screen. So far it is great with carrying a charge and it is very lightweight.
Title;;;;;;: I enjoy the ease of downloading several books to have on ...;;;;;;

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"I am simply loving this my Kindle 6"" Glare-Free touchscreen display e-reader.  The size is easy to handle and the no nonsense reading is appreciated.  Downloading books are a cinch.  I know I will enjoy this for years to come.",The size is easy to handle and the no nonsense reading is appreciated;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I haven't used it as yet, but I do like the size for holding, light and easy to hold.  I am frustrated that the charging unit sent with the unit can only be charged through a computer.  I don't like the fact that you have an additional cost for an outlet charging unit.",but I do like the size for holding;;;;;;

Review: I bought the Kindle for my wife for Christmas and she is most pleased with her  gift  she has found the reader to be easy to use even though she is not very technically adept.  It is a plus that it was on sale when purchased.
Title;;;;;;: ... for my wife for Christmas and she is most pleased with her gift she has found the reader to ...;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"It was just as I expected, I have owned the original kindle with keyboard for several years.  I was very happy with the original kindle and am also very happy with this new kindle.  I like the smaller size and quicker Wi-Fi.......",I was very happy with the original kindle and am also very happy ...;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"My only complaint is that I have a hard time getting to where I want on this device.  I tried downloading from Overdrive to get a book from the library and I couldn't find were it had downloaded.  Other than that, it is easy to read from and very light.  The price was right also.  I still can't figure out where the library books are downloading though.",A good price for this device.;;;;;;

Review: I've had it about a month now.  I purchased it to reduce eyestrain from reading a tablet (Nexus 7) or smartphone (Samsung S5) but I'm not quite sure about that.  battery life is GREAT!  2 weeks on all the time before my first charge.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I got this a couple weeks ago and it has been working awesomeley so far. I am considering getting a protective case, because the plastic on the Kindle scratches REALLY easily. I really like how you can buy a book on the kindle, or on your computer, and it downloads in seconds. I am very satisfied with this purchase so far.",Fun and Easy to use;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"This thing is awesome. Much quicker and more responsive than my Kindle Keyboard and also half the cost of what that 3rd Generation Kindle costed me new years ago.However, the screen is touchy. If you have shaky hands, then this might not be for you.The back plastic does feel cheaper. But then, the kindle is cheaper. Put it in a cover and you would never know the difference.",For the price? Unbeatable.;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Easy to use, with more options than the previous versions. Tactile screen that does not allow traces. Good weight and size, to the tact he feels strong. Bad: capacity does not possess for audio books.",It keeps on improving Kindle;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I LOVE having my Kindle. I thought I would read too fast for it to keep up, but with the touch screen instead of the buttons, this is great! If I were reading many magazines, I would probably want the color version....I like the smaller size over my iPad...fits in my purse easily.",Great Christmas gift!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love this kindle.  I have the kindle fire tablet but it's a little heavy to carry around. This one is lighter and I can take my books with me wherever I go.  This has all the versatility of the tablet (highlighting/notes, etc) without the weight.Great reader!",A great reader!;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"Not having a phone that has swipe capability, I have had some trouble learning how to navigate on the touchscreen display.  I am sure as I continue to use the touchscreen kindle it will become easier.  I like the to have the ability to transfer material from my old kindle to the newer one to give me access in several different places at one time.",I like the to have the ability to transfer material from ...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,Just two words...love it.  It's a little different than my Nook in that it doesn't show the page number on all books. Although the book I'm now reading does show the numbers. I don't know if I accidentally turned this feature on or if it's the formatting. I did read that it depends on how the book is formatted for eReaders.  Some books will show the actual page and some won't.Another feature I really like is how fast a selected book is downloaded to the Kindle. You no sooner make a selection and it's there.,"Kindle 6"" Glare-Free Touchscreen Display";;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"I've been using the iPad Kindle app for most of my reading, but wanted something smaller and more durable for the beach.  So far, the Kindle is easy to navigate and much lighter than the iPad.  However, my biggest gripe is that the page turning is not as seamless as on the iPad.  The text blurs and then the new text appears, which causes a brief delay.  By contrast, the iPad has a clean sweep to the next page.  But for the price, it's a good investment.",the Kindle is easy to navigate and much lighter than the iPad;;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"I have three of the original kindles and over 2000 kindle books.  The first kindle I purchased would no longer charge so I decided I needed a new one to replace it. As you have figured out I love my kindle. I purchased this kindle. I hate this kindle. The carousel is not on this version. It takes forever for me this look through my collection to find a book. Everything about the display is different and harder to navigate. The actual reading screen is smaller than my original kindles. I put this kindle back in the box to save in case all my other kindles died and it was my only option.  I then started purchasing the best grade of refurbished 3g keyboard Kindles for back ups while that is an option. That style has over 42,000 favorable reviews. Why doesn't Amazon just continue to offer that Kindle as part of the inventory?????  I prefer tried and true over ""new and improved""  42 thousand people can't all be wrong.",Hate this kindle;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Having been a Kindle Fire user for the past 3 years, I wasn't sure how I'd like this smaller one. I love it! My main problem with the Kindle Fire was the limited battery life. The Glare-Free Touchscreen battery lasts a long time. I use the Kindle Fire for movies, etc and the Glare Free for reading. Excellent combination.",Surperb reader;;;;;;

Review: This is a great device. It's lightweight and the battery seems to last forever. It feels a little cheaper than the previous touch version which came with speakers and a headphone jack but who really listens to music or audio books on their Kindle these days.
Title;;;;;;: This is a great device. It's lightweight and the battery seems to ...;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I received this as a gift (along with a protective cover). Love it! I use it everyday. The best part is that I can read outside in the sunlight or at night in the dark, and both are just as pleasant to my eyes. Also love how I can research words as I read using the dictionary and/or the Wikipedia features. Highlighting helps me find specific passages and see what other people chose significant enough to highlight.",If I could take 1 item with me to a desert island...;;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"the touch screen does not work very well. When it does, the screen will jump one or two pages.Turning on the pad can be a problem. Sometimes it will go to the main page and I will have to siftthrough several motions before I can get to my page. I am disappointed in my purchase.",I am disappointed in my purchase;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I bought this on sale and it is definitely worth the price. It has exactly what I wanted for my first  eReader. It DOES NOT have a light, but I am not bothered because I knew what I was buying. In my opinion, paying more for the paperwhite is not worth it just for the light. This is the same software, but much cheaper!",Love it;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Great product! I've always wanted a kindle, and now that I have one, I find that I can't put it down! My only concern is that the battery life doesn't really last two weeks for avid readers like me. But it's still longer than most tablets, and the lack of games makes it easier to concentrate on my reading. If I were to add something, though, it would probably be an audio jack and mp3 capability. I'd like to listen to music or audiobooks as well.",Great!;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I bought this to have as a second kindle because of the price, $59.99 special. I'm used to my kindle paper white so this one had a much cheaper plastic feel to it. Outside of that it has great print for reading in lighted places and with most of the bells and whistles as a kindle paper white less the light.",Good Purchase;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Its wonderful! the packaging was great,  the kindle itself looks beautiful. Now I only wish I could think of more books to read!!I would recommend this to anyone curious about these types of things. It comes in handy when you want to get a good book for cheap!And it is super light too! Over all I love it!",Absolutely Wonderful;;;;;;

Review: I have been very hesitant to move to an e-reader rather than physical books but I have been thoroughly enjoying this Kindle. The ease of use and convenience of being able to shop for a book whenever I like and then immediately have access to it easily makes this a worthwhile purchase. Not to mention carrying it in my jacket pocket means I have a small library wherever I go.
Title;;;;;;: A good introduction to electronic books.;;;;;;

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"I have problems connecting my Imac to my kindle, if I try to move files between the Imac and Kindle will not let him do this because it does not recognize the device and the kindle's software that I installed on my Imac does nothing.But otherwise the kindle is fun and easy to use and I like it very much.","very good, but it don't  talk  to my Imac";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"This was a gift from my daughter, clearly she gave a lot of thought into picking out a reader that I would enjoy. The glare-free touchscreen is just what I needed.  I get headaches because, once I start reading I can't stop. The glare-free screen is easy on the eyes and I haven't had any headaches.",clearly she gave a lot of thought into picking out a reader that I would enjoy. The glare-free touchscreen is just what I needed;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Having had a really ancient (if anything in the tech world can be called ancient) Kindle, my new Kindle is a marvel. It's so light to carry, and the screen is so clear. I love to read, and this Kindle exceeds expectations. Thanks.",Wonderful and easy.;;;;;;

Review: Easy to use. I debated between this and the paperwhite. I read the most in bed so now I am wishing I had purchased the back lit paperwhite. I'm sure I will find a case for this one which has a light included or a separate light that will actually fit into the case.

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"I purchased the 6"" kindle for my daughter to encourage her reading.  I am please to say not only does she love her new kindle - but now she loves to read.  She espically  finds the dictionary helpful - before when she was reading and would be confused by a new word - she would substitute a word she knew that she tought might mean the same thing . Now when she comes upon a new word she simply taps it and up comes a definanition and usage example. Simply brilliant !",Four Stars;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I have had a Kindle for 5 years (the original Kindle), and the screen just quit;" I am quite happy with my new Kindle although it is taking some getting used to as it is all touch screen and I am used to buttons (but not that difficult to adapt as my smartphone is touch screen).  The one potential issue is the shell is very slippery and I am concerned it will drop easily.  My next purchase will be a case for sure!""
Review: Meets all my needs/expectations!";;;;;

Rating: 2.0 out of 5 stars,"I liked the first Kindle - it was new and while some of the functions were clumsy, I wanted a book,not a computer. It died and Amazon was very good about sending me a new one, and even managed to put all my books on it that had been on the old one. I missed the hard keyboard - I liked the thin size - I loved that the page advance was on each side so I could move forward with either hand. I really liked how long it lasted without needed a re-charge.It too died - and Amazon sent me this. Gradual deterioration of a product. Thicker, smaller screen and now it's a touch screen, which is awkward and not helpful. Someone is captivated by graphics when all I want is a simple listing of books. Functions that used to take three clicks now take seven.Used electricity at a MUCH higher rate and no wonder, all those graphics I DON""T want. Amazon seems no longer able to replace the books on the old machine and can only come up with canned responses.The product advertising is so bad I didn't know I was ordering a touch screen - I didn't want a touch screen - and now that I have used this for several weeks, I like it less rather than more the more I use it. Yecch.",I liked the first Kindle - it was new and while ...;;;;;;

Review: I love the kindle! It is very easy to navigate and works awesome in daylight because it is not backlit. I purchased a cover with a nightlight and I can read it at night too. The best part is that my 8 year old is developing a liking for reading on it and wants one too!

I honestly had not considered buying an e-ink tablet due to the fact that I have several larger tablets with full color screens.  I received an offer to pick one of these up for an exceptional deal and decided to give it a shot.  I have been impressed so far with how much easier it is to read books on it.  They are far less stressful on the eyes for long reading sessions.
Title;;;;;;: I honestly had not considered buying an e-ink tablet due ...;;;;;;

Review: This was a replacement for my six year old Kindle that had started to slow and have a few glitches.  The display is very clear and easy to read.  The only feature was the inability to plug a reading light directly into the Kindle to use it for power and have it auto shutoff with the Kindle as my old one had.
Title;;;;;;: The display is very clear and easy to read;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I have really enjoyed using this new Kindle.  We had purchased one of the 1st or 2nd generation Kindles several years ago and was ready for a upgrade.  That one still works well, so I already had confidence in the line of products, just wanted something smaller.  Compared to our previous version, this one is smaller, lighter, and easier to hold.  I love the touch screen feature and the ease of turning pages, highlighting, saving a place, etc.  We are very pleased with the product.",Great Decision to Upgrade;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"My first kindle ""died""...... I was very pleased t receive this new Kindle.  It is lighter and the glare free screen is great.  Also, it was made so easy just to have all my content moved to the new Kindle. I would high recommend this product.",I was very pleased t receive this new Kindle;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Left my 1st generation Kindle on the train and had to buy the new one. Hated to part with the money, but at least this is a much improved device. Like its earlier versions, it does what it should. But, the smaller size and lighter weight are really great. The touch screen is also a big improvement over the oldies, especially for readers of nonfiction (footnotes).",Very nice reader;;;;;;

Review: It seems neat (what I can figure out) but I haven't figured how to open my Bible and read one verse then change to another book of the bible and read another verse.  I can't figure the guide book (I got off of online) But at least I figured out how to turn it on but I haven't figured looking at the books yet
Title;;;;;;: It seems neat (what I can figure out) but I ...;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love this Kindle.  I was easily able to add all the e-books in my library from my computer to the Kindle with the USB cable.  I've been using it for a couple of weeks now and found that it is easier to read than online articles.  I do wish that the screen was a little larger, but it is about the size of a paperback.",I love this Kindle;;;;;;

Review: I am rather disappointed.  My old Kindle was much easier to maneuver and the cover with light attachment doesn't fit this one.  Had I known it was not going to fit I would have upgraded to the paper white version.
Title;;;;;;: I am rather disappointed. My old Kindle was much easier to maneuver ...;;;;;;

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,I am impressed with how easy it is to read and turn pages. I however feel that is worth the extra $20 to get the one without the ads- it messes with my reading mojo. After  the ads turned on I went and paid the extra $20 to get them turned off. This was worth it. I have waited a long time to buy an e-reader and I am glad I waited to get this one.,"Great Reader- spend the extra $20 to get no ""special offers""!";;;;;;

Review: Does the job.  Does it well.  Affordable.  Low end unit good for those of us who misplace or drop and break expensive things.Only complaint is while the included USB cable appears to be a standard variety....the unit will only connect to a PC with that cable...not a generic one.  I suppose that is documented somewhere but who would suspect?
Title;;;;;;: Low end unit good for those of us who misplace or drop and ...;;;;;;

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"This is my first e-reader and I love it! Downloading from the Amazon bookstore is super-easy...though I'm still trying to figure out how to connect and download from my library. That has not been so easy but I'm working on it. Overall, I'm very pleased.",This is my first e-reader and I love it! Downloading from the Amazon bookstore is super-easy;;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"This kindle is ridiculous.  Why on earth can't the manufacturer fix this problem is beyond my understanding.  Each time you turn a page it takes 5 seconds to load and go to the next page and it flashes and blinks and flashes something really detestable to the eyes.  I called customer service and they said that is just the way it is.  Chuck this kindle and go with the new kindle 7"" fire for only $49.00.  By the way it may still be on sale.  I got mine for $39.99.  Come on guys - fix the problem already!!",Flashes sharp stinging lights in your eyes.;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"Frustrating. I prefer the first generation Kindle to this. The anti-glare is no better, the thing LAGS infinitely more, probably due to the (poor quality) touch screen. Probably my most frustrated purchase on Amazon, ever. My Kindle is currently frozen. I haven't had a frozen electronic device since my Windows XP 2000.",Frustrating to use.;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Very nice- the best e-reader I have ever owned. The size is perfect- neither too big nor too small for reading.  The black and white screen allows you to read at whatever pace you want, as it is far easier on the eyes than most color tablets. The battery life is outstanding- I read on it almost everyday, and typically go for weeks without needing to recharge.  The page turning speed is blazing fast- unlike many other e-readers that I have tried.  Very durable- my clumsy self has dropped it a few times, but it has held up well.  It is intuitive and easy to use. Overall, the best e-reader in this price range, hands down.","The best e-reader in this price range, hands down.";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I TRULY APOLOGIZE FOR THE STATEMENT THAT WAS JUST SENT TO YOU.  AFTER CALLING MY CREDIT CARD CO., I WAS GRATIFIED TO BE TOLD THAT I DID RECEIVE THE CREDIT FOR $ 85.98.  PLEASE ACCEPT MY APOLOGY, FOR MY OUTRAGE AND ACCUSATIONS.  I AM TRULY ASHAMED OF MY SELF. THANK YOU, HOPEFULLY YOU WILL FORGIVE ME.John E. Scallan",Four Stars;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I like the thinness of the Kindle, it fits in my back pocket just like the paperback books that I read.  I can store more books in the Kindle than I can carry in my back pocket;" I find it not quite as user friendly as a Nook.  Overall I am very satisfied with my purchase""
Review: I like the thinness of the Kindle";;;;;

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"I enjoy the kindle E-reader,but think the 5w sub charger and power plug, should be made clear that it's not included in the pkg. if I hadn't read some reviews about the kindle,I wouldn't have known, and would have been very disappointed to not get started with the kindle until I received the charger.",I enjoy the kindle E-reader;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Reading is easier with no glare.  I don't have to move or find a good place where the light doesn't make it difficult to read.  To me the screen appears bigger.  I like the fact that it holds the page I am reading when I turn it off, then goes right back to that page.  With no buttons to change pages keeps me on the same page.  I really like the touchscreen.  I wear glasses & the screen makes it easier for me to read.  I am not much of a reader & had difficulty with another Kindle reading & making it past a page.  With my Kindle I read more since I see more.",Appreciate my Kindle;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I received my Kindle as a Christmas gift and have really found myself enjoying reading again. My favorite time to read is after I go to bed, I seem to sleep better when I read just before going to sleep. Since I received it I find that I look forward to going to bed at night. I had gotten away from reading, because when you read hard covered books in bed they seem to get heavy and clumsy. My problem is that I am a paperback snob and love to get hardcover books, but find that I don't read them because, like I said I pretty much only read in bed.",I like reading in bed again!!!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I really like this Kindle. Books are easy to download and sync quickly for reading. I purchased two Kindle's and each one is named so that I don't have to remember which one I am downloading to. Bookbub.com for Kindle gives me many book options at regular, reduced and even free prices and automatically asks which Kindle Reader I want to download to. Way less hassle than Nook that now sits in a drawer.",Kindle and loving it!;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Love the new Kindle, but am having trouble with the trial Unlimited membership I received as a premium. Perhaps I don't quite understand it, but I am getting billed for some purchases. The Kindle meets all my expectations, and I'm glad the instructions are included on the free book list!!",Love the new Kindle;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I have extreme light sensitivity..and I used to read from a samsung tablet, until I got my paperwhite for Christmas. The ad was a bit deceiving, and we ended up having to pay $20+ extra to get rid of the annoying ads. I've loved my paperwhite ever since. I used to compare the command speed between my paperwhite and my galaxy tab, until my husband told me to see it as a big touchscreen calculator that I could read off of it.. it's easy on my eyes, it's light, small, and totally beats having to hold a book!",I love my paperwhite;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I read quite a bit. 2 to 3 novels a week. I got this free on a black Friday deal. I have an ipad with kindle app and enjoy reading on that. I never saw the need for an e-ink reader. After reading on the kindle touch for a few weeks I can easily see the appeal. That being said the improvements of adjustable backlight and more importantly the increased resolution of the voyage would be must haves if I were going to pay for a dedicated e-ink reader. Are those improvements worth the premium cost of the voyage at $200, no. I could see myself buying an e-ink reader with the voyages specs at the $100 price point though. Pros: easy on the eyes, cost Cons: Slightly blurry text (though easily overlooked) and lack of a backlight.",Hard to argue with free;;;;;;

Review: No. Hard to navigate on it. Every time you go from one child to another on Kindle free time you have to put in a pass word. The screen has a glare and is blurry making it hard to read. Overall evaluation poor.

when you had like 4 tablets that the kids destroy its hard to keep buying them. I'm glad I got this one for myself I love it so much I hide it from everyone. i recommend it!! I used this site to get it at a discount which has totally changed Christmas for us i love amazon!!  elitedealclub.com/?invcode=2rPimII1
Title;;;;;;: when you had like 4 tablets that the kids destroy its hard to ...;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"My old kindle was sat on and broken, the new one is very nice and once registered to the same account gives me full access to all my old books.I was happy with the old one and didn't need the new features, but all the good features and readability of the old one are there.  Turn wifi off is there, but a bit hidden.  Having it off does save battery and gives a brief pause before you can buy stuff. I got the case with the cover which is a nice upgrade. I read about half my books on Kindle, even when I have both forms available.  Five real stars.","Old Kindle broken, new one very nice";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I was a little skeptical because of the smaller 6"" screen, but actually its perfect. Its reads very clearly and it makes it less of a daunting task to read a book, you can take it anywhere, battery really does last weeks which is amazing, the ads only display as a screensaver only after about 10-15min of you not doing anything. I really enjoy it and totally recommend one to anyone that wants to read and try something new.","Very cool, i enjoy it a-lot more than i thought i would have.";;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"This is my third Kindle.  While the original and my first update operated in basically the same way the functionality of this new touch screen kindle is so much more ""user"" friendly than my first two.  I have over 600 books on my Kindle so the managing and ""ease of finding"" the book I am looking for is much simpler.",Getting close to Perfect;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I had the original Kindle and the screen stopped working so I purchased this model.  I think it works well and has some good features, but I miss my first one.  It had the bigger screen and buttons to turn the page which I prefer.  The touch screen is sensitive and when i move around it advances the page on me.  It does not hold the book open indefinitely so I have to search to find the book again and reopen it.  I found the old kindle menu system better.  All in all it does what I need and has the paper white non glare screen.  It's very portable and works on my treadmill.","I think it works well and has some good features, but I miss my first one";;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"Frankly, Im disappointed. This is not my first Kindle and I have two major complaints about the new one. First there is not a decent lighted cover to go with it. I miss the one that was attached to my last Kindle. After sending two (non-working) covers back Ive resorted to a reading light duck-taped to the back. It works, but doesnt lay flat. Second, my favorite game, Triple Town doesn't work on this Kindle. I really liked that game. The touch screen is nice but I wish I had my old unit back.",Gameless in Gaza;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Like it much better than older model, especially the ability to flip pages even with one hand. Thinner, lighter yet with a larger screen. Still haven't learned how to easily return to the main menu to shop, etc.",Like it much better than older model;;;;;;

Review: I love my Kindle!!! I had an earlier version but gave it to my mom. I love the touchscreen and that it has more storage. I had Kindle Unlimited for the trial period but I'm just as happy checking out books from the library for free.

It's size makes it easily convenient to transport around in a cargo pocket. The glare-free display is the best feature working both in sunlight and high illumination from florescent tubes in an office. Reading was a pleasure in the past with a hard-back or even a soft-back book but now with a touchscreen you fly through the pages. Very pleased with my Kindle.
Title;;;;;;: It's size makes it easily convenient to transport around in a cargo pocket;;;;;;

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"I don't like this Kindle as well as my old style Kindle.  The touch screen is so sensitive that I spend much of my reading time getting back to the right page.  It is hard to hold without touching the screen accidentally.  Also, there is a lot of advertising to navigate through to get to the right page.  I am still learning to use this one, but find that I keep picking up my old model to read comfortably.",Not a Fan;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"Needed this to replace my Kindle 2nd Generation.  I like the screen for reading but it is a little too sensitive when I try to get the menu to come up, it tends to turn my pages.  Also, my 2nd Generation Kindle had text to voice which I used extensively.  This option does not have that feature which is not helpful to me in replacing my 2nd Generation Kindle.  Customer service told me to purchase a Kindle Fire for text to voice or I could take my laptop with me everywhere I go for text to speech.  I do not like the options on the Kindle Fire for text to speech (because there are none)  This is a great option as it is very light weight and small for travel - as long as you don't need to use it when you are in the car.",I like the screen for reading but it is a little ...;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"The Kindle Fire tablet seemed very complicated at first, but after a while, I got used to it and now find it easy to find my way around and navigate the various options. I love it for listening to Audible books and reading Kindle books. But most of all, I love to watch Amazon Prime videos like Mozart in the Jungle. The Fire Kindle is convenient for both watching and listening, and I can pedal on my exercise bike, while I do both activities! The only problem is I get fingerprints all over the glass--more of them the more I use it--and I don't know how to remove them.","Very convenient, once you get used to it!";;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"I find it difficult to use and apparently I cannot order on line since my account refuses to recognize this new equipment so I can order using my computer.I find it very cumbersome to place my orders using the Kindle.  I am considering returning  the Kindle for credit. We spent about 30 minutes on the telephone with a Amazon representative who was very efficient in trying to correct this problem and in fact I could now order using the Kindle if I want to do so, but I still cannot order using my computer.",NOT SATISFACTORY FOR ME;;;;;;

Review: I enjoy the kindle.  It's battery lasts forever it is a nice interface and functions well.My one complaint is that there are a few series that I can't get on Kindle like the ciphus Cain series from Warhammer 40k

Pretty solid device.  The touch response is very good.  I didn't want a touch screen ereader but took a chance and I've been very surprised at the performance.  I've been through an original 1st gen kindle and a 3rd gen kindle keyboard so I have a little experience.  I wish I had jumped on this for the $59 holiday price but $79 is still good for a brand new kindle.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Extremely happy with my new Kindle. I'm a first time owner/user of an e-reader,  and I don't think I could go to a different brand after using a Kindle. I commute to work everyday on the subway, so reading an actual book can become cumbersome as it can get in the way. But with my lightweight and small kindle, and can hold onto it with one hand and turn the pages with my thumb. I love it!",I Love My Kindle!;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Lightweight and easy to use.  Can switch from one book to another with minimal effort.  My only complaint is that it doesn't have the capability to play games, which is something that I like to do.  That was not made clear to me when I purchased it.  Otherwise, a good product.",A good Kindle for book reading only;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I got the kindle with the sole purpose of just trying to read more and man did it help. It was way lighter and smaller than I thought it was going to be. It's definitely a lot easier to hold than a traditional book. Overall, I loved it, very user friendly, light, and can hold so many books.","I loved it, very user friendly";;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I ordered this because my first kindle died completely and I love reading books on a kindle. I must say, I love how many books I can have at my fingertips. But, the one thing I do not like is how cheap it feels. Like really cheap plastic. And the touchscreen is wayyyyy too sensitive.",... this because my first kindle died completely and I love reading books on a kindle;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Really happy with it, upgrading from an older model. I like that it doesn't have back lighting cause that strains your eyes and makes it harder to sleep at night. I wish there was a 3G option for when I travel and wifi isn't available like in some airports, but overall very happy with it.",A nice change;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Purchased this for my nephew who wanted to read more. Inexpensive by comparison, and perfect for young readers.Nice features that allow you to track your child's reading progress and word power.Perfect for anyone who wants to read without the excessive frills.This is a NON-illuminated product, which is a refreshing change for kids staring at illuminated screens all day.It is also simple black & white. Less distractions & more imagination.Highly recommended.","Simple, yet effective.";;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Wish we have ordered a larger unit. 6 inch unit is pretty small for our aging eyes.  Enjoying the books downloaded so far.Hope we have the problem with credit card cleared up.  The unit is still telling us there is a problem, though we have done all we know to do.  A new credit card has been installed.",6 inch unit is pretty small for our aging eyes;;;;;;

Review: Just used it for a week reading poolside- absolutely no problems.  I updated from a Kindle 2nd generation to this version.  Love the difference in weight and design from old one - so much lighter and smaller yet large screen to read
Title;;;;;;: Love the difference in weight and design from old one ...;;;;;;

Review: Love it!!! Better than I expected!Super easy to useGlad I read reviews giving heads up it is not back lit. Fine with that since I knew in advance.  Arrived earlier than expectedQuick set up and charge

This is my first experience with Kindle. I love it!!!!.  The feature i like the most is the Vocabulary Builder with the available dictionary at you fingertips. Also the ease which i can turn the pages when im reading and the speed in ordering the book and starting to read it.  I definitely recommend this product to the avid reader.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I do love the smell of old library books, but being able to buy a book and have it automatically available on my kindle for my train commute to work is priceless. Screen looks like real paper and doesn't hurt my eyes.",I do love the smell of old library books;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"This is my first Kindle and I'm very happy with my purchase.  For me it has the perfect size and weight to comfortably read in any position.  Easily transfered many of my personal files (.mobi and .pdf) through the personalized email address Amazon provided.  I took advantage of a special price reductin and got it for $59. I think it was a bargain. Now if you would excuse me, I have some reading to do ;")""
Review: Very first Kindle"; happy reader.;;;;

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"Nice size, like my old Kindle, but liked the side button better for page turning.  Maybe I'll like it better once I get more used to it.  Also, I've noticed that my font size is unreliable:  either going back to the slightly smaller default font or becoming huge, and often not staying where I set it after I turn it off!",I kind of like my old Kindle better.;;;;;;

Review: I am technical guy with loads of reading material mostly available on PDF. This is best way to read it without getting distracted by alerts/notification/messages which distracts me very easily and take me to wasting time on FB/Twit etc.

I had an original Kindle that finally died and since I read many books during a year I ordered a new one. It is everything that I expected it to be and I actually like it more than the original although I still cannot get used to pressing the buttons on the side to turn the pages. My one negative comment is that it does not fit in my originally purchased leather cover so it appears as though I will update that feature on my next order through Amazon.
Title;;;;;;: New Product is Better Than The Old;;;;;;

Review: I have carpel tunnel in my hands and its hard for me to hold a book without my hands falling asleep.  So I decided to get the kindle and see how it works.  I love this kindle - my hands don't fall asleep holding the book - no glare - can read in bright sunlight or dim night light - love it - will never go back to paper books again.  Save a tree get a kindle :-)

Nice little e-reader for the price. The only thing that is disappointing is the Free-Time option which is one of the main reasons I bought it. What happens is all your books load into the Free-Time and then you check the box for the book(s) you ant in there but according to the manual you can delete the books off the list so you don't have to sort through the tens or hundreds you have. I tried to delete the books I wanted in there plus worked with customer service on this and they said you can't delete the books even though it says so in the manual. Otherwise I would give it a 5 star and after I use it more I will do another update as it's only been a week of use.
Title;;;;;;: Nice little e-reader for the price;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Yeah....I really enjoy using this.  It is my first Kindle and for the $49 price tag on Black Friday, it was hard to say no.  It is easy on the eyes and its great to use, especially in my office.  Many users that I see posting on here mention the buttons on the previous versions of the Kindle and I have to say that I definitely can understand the advantage of having buttons versus the touch screen.  Sometimes the touch screen isn't as responsive as I would like it to be.  For me, it doesn't detract from the 5 star rating I gave it because everything else is so user-friendly.",It is worth it;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"It looks so much like reading a real book. My only complaint is that you can adjust text size in ebooks but you can't do that or zoom in when you use the Kindle store or Goodreads app. I'm visually impaired so seeing the words is sometimes hard for me. Other than that, it's perfect.",I love it;;;;;;

Review: Menus are not as user friendly as my previous Kindle. Really miss the buttons on the side to turn the pages. When reading in bed I hold the Kindle in my left hand. Turning pages forward is awkward since you have to be about an inch in screen to trigger forward not backward turning.
Title;;;;;;: Menus are not as user friendly as my previous Kindle ...;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I have MS and it is hard for me to hold a book. When the 1st Kindle was introduced my children bought me one. Then after a few years I purchased the Kindle Fire (loved it) but could not read in sunlight. Now I have the 6"" Glare-Free and it is amazing!! It is lighter to hold & the easy touch screen is a bonus along with being outside & reading. I may have MS but this Kindle has made my condition bearable. Thank you Amazon!!!","Now I have the 6"" Glare-Free and it is amazing!! It is lighter to hold & the ...";;;;;;
5.0 out of 5 stars,"As a language student; this is a perfect study tool-I have books to read that allow me to highlight and it defines words. It's reads comfortably
Review: and Amazon has TONS of books to choose from!I already have an iPad so I didn't want anything too big ;" nothing  that has tablet capabilities
Title;;;;;;: just a place to store my books in my new language.""
column4: Great study tool!";;;;

Review: I love this kindle!  I bought it because I wanted a device strictly for reading.  I especially like the glare-free touchscreen. The cloud is very useful for maintaining storage.  Once you finish a book you can send it back to the cloud which frees up storage to download other books. I highly recommend this Kindle. I would also recommend getting Prime so you have access to the Kindle Library.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"So far, only one week in, it has been great.  Wish it had a light or that he cover with the light from my original ebook fit this one.  Now I have to return the new one I bought for the old one and hope there is one that will fit.",it has been great. Wish it had a light or that he ...;;;;;;

Review: NEVER THOUGHT I WOULD LIKE AN E-READER BUT THE KINDLE IS GREAT ESPECIALLY WITH THE KINDLE UNLIMITED.IF I CAN'T SLEEP I CAN FIND JUST THE RIGHT BOOK TO READ  IN A MATTER OF MINUTES.  FOR THE MOST PART IT ISEASY TO USE BUT DO WISH THE DIRECTIONS WERE A LITTLE MORE CLEAR AND EXPLICIT FOR FIRST TIME USERS.
Title;;;;;;: KINDLE IS GREAT IF YOU LOVE TO READ;;;;;;

Review: I didn't realize it only had Wi-Fi without the (3G) that I needed. My bad!!! I have an old Kindle that came with WI-FI and 3G. I just assumed every Kindle did... I liked everything else about it. I just want a reader and I thought this would be the perfect one.. So I decided to do some further research and decided the Paper White with WI-FI and 3G was actually what I needed.. No fault on Amazon Kindle's part. I should of been more informed and done the research before I made the purchase.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Very pleased with my touch kindle.  I upgraded to this one after owning the keyboard kindle that lasted me for 4 plus years.  I thought I would struggle with the new kindle, but had no problems at all.  Really love it.  I also ordered the elsse cover for about ten dollars and I am very pleased with it too.  Happy Reading!",Very pleased with my touch kindle;;;;;;

Review: This is my second Kindle and I am happy with it. I do prefer the old one as it was a bit bigger. Overall I am quite content with the device. One big advantage to Kindles is the ability to enlarge the print.
Title;;;;;;: This is my second Kindle and I am happy with it;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Amazing! I teach people to download ebooks. I figured it would not hurt to have an e-ink Kindle since so many people I teach have them. It comes with the ebook of the kindle manual, which I read. It mentioned an ""experimental web browser,"" so what can it do? You no longer need a computer to download an ebook from a library using Overdrive. You can browse most sites without a problem. Sure, it's a little slow, and B&W, but it works very well. I read my e-mail! Thanks Jeff B, another Amazon innovation!",Amazing!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I bought this for my wife. She no longer reads much because of her eyesight.  Now, she reads every day, using the largest font. She's not gadget-friendly, so I picked this unit for its simplicity.  Best gift I gave this year.",Great for people with poor eyesight.;;;;;;

Review: I have purchased many different kindles. Although they all have their uses my favorites for reading remain the ones with no backlighting. I like the size and light weight of this kindle. It makes it easy to slide into my purse and go!
Title;;;;;;: I like the size and light weight of this kindle;;;;;;

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"I bought this when Amazon had a big sale on them.  Normally I use an Android tablet to read on.The Pros:-Light weight-Excellent battery life-Crisp text-Resistive touch screen is responsive and can be used with objects, gloves, etc.The Cons:-Small screen-Crisp text but doesn't look like a book page (the Paper White version is better I think)-Slow to respond-No progress bar like all the Kindle apps have and less features than the apps for other devices.  I'm sure a firmware update could fix this.-Feels cheaply built-No backlight/hard to read in dim light","Wish I had gotten the ""Paperwhite"" version";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Nice upgrade from the original Kindle that I have owned for years.  I prefer to read books on a dedicated e-reader without the glare so I can read anywhere I want..outside, inside in my bed before I go to sleep and this does the same as the original.  I like that there is no longer the keyboard at the bottom too.  The touchscreen turns pages quickly and more quickly than my original Kindle did.  I am glad I upgraded after my other Kindle finally bit the bullet..",Nice upgrade from the original Kindle that I have owned ...;;;;;;

Review: Can't change the font size of PDF files which causes certain PDF files to be incapable of reading (bad font size). One workaround is by sending it to kindle email with 'convert' option so that the formatting is better but not sure if this will always work. It would be good to have the option to change the font size in PDF files.
Title;;;;;;: One workaround is by sending it to kindle email with 'convert' option so that the formatting is better but not sure if this will;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I wanted something simple, just for reading and this kindle is perfect for my needs. It is above all my expectations, some of my favorite features are the wifi and the fact that it has the dictionary lookup and you don't have to leave your book! Overall amazing and affordable product",just for reading and this kindle is perfect for my needs;;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"Its almost as though they try to make it as difficult as possible to use this item.  No clear markings on the 'type' of Kindle this is, no user guide access here.I must have downloaded 6 Kindle User guides looking for the one that matches this Kindle.  Still have no found it.Not sure why companies think its cool to make products hard to use.  I am going to return this and all the purchased books and cancel Prime out of sheer annoyance.",horrible support;;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"I got the Kindle as an addition to my ipad as it's too difficult to read on the ipad due to glare and brightness, especially outside. But this version of the Kindle has the opposite problem - it's too dark to read!  Really strange that they found such a grey background to be acceptable. Going to give the next one up a try, perhaps, though it's more than I want to spend.",Screen too dark to read on.;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"Small... seriously, why does my phone get larger and my ebook reader get smaller? One goes in my pocket, the other goes in a carry on bag or backpack. I see no reason to limit the size of the screen on my e-reader and will pay a premium for the extra space, and/or easier handling of the device. If I wanted to crowd around a device that would fit in the palm of my hand, I'd use my cell phone. Where did my Kindle Keyboard go? What a marvelous device that was....",Why does my kindle get smaller and my cell phone get larger?;;;;;;

Review: Screen is easy on the eyes. Occasional spontaneous multiple page changes when holding by one hand. Bottom location of power button typically causes at least one accidental power down every reading session.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I adore my kindle, best purchase I've made in years. The only design flaw is reading a book with footnotes is quite difficult, the system doesn't work well for that, but other than that it is an amazing device that has made my life so much easier.",I was hesitant to turn away from paper books but...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Great, I enjoy it although I keep finding myself trying to flip the page the old fashion way. Only problem I have ( and it's probably me) is trying to in book mark a page and it skips a few pages ahead. Other than that I really enjoy using it. Great price and user friendly as side from what I mentioned before. I would recommend this to anyone. Oh plus you are able to read it in low light as well.","Great, I enjoy it although I keep finding myself ...";;;;;;

Review: I wish they had not gone to the touch screen. I am constantly doing something by accident wether it be turning the page cause I touched the screen without meaning to or trying to turn the page and getting word definitions instead.  Also the games I used to play on my kindle do not work on it. In my opinion it is a step back not a step forward.
Title;;;;;;: Want the old kindle paper white back;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I have been reading books on my smartphone for the last couple of years. I have gotten used to the tiny screen because of the convenience. It's light, small, and so many books. I didn't think I needed a Kindle. I got this one for a great price. Now I can see more of the story on one page. There is no glare! It doesn't even look like a computer screen. I also purchased a stylus to turn pages without getting my fingers involved. I purchased a cover to help protect it and it now feels like I am holding an actual book by so much lighter. So many good things!",I do not regret this purchase one bit;;;;;;

Review: This more of a question as I love the Kindle.  Are the covers/cases supposed to fit so tight that they don't close properly?  Please e-mail me back as I need to know if I should get a different case/cover  1wackywac@gmail.com.
Title;;;;;;: This more of a question as I love the Kindle;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I was given a kindle as a christmas present after saying I'd never use it. Boy was I wrong. I really like it. I love playing with it even though I'm pretty  illiterate technically. I've so far bought and read 3 books, and have hooked it up to my wifi and email! I do have one complaint: It's so easy to buy books, I'm afraid I'll end up maxing out my visa!","I admit it, I was wrong";;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"Sorry I will have to return these Items. I was hoping I had receive a device that would allow me to load audio books on it. After reading all this device will do, I did not find any way an audio book could be loaded on this device.The glare free screen is good. But reading instructions on how to set every thing up is not user friendly as far as this old lady would like. An instruction book that one could follow while setting it up would be more helpful. If free books are offered I could not find them, They would have helped me learn how to navigate this device. I need instructions on how to return this package.",The glare free screen is good. But reading instructions on how to set every ...;;;;;;

Review: 1) There should be some written instructions for people who have never used it before.
