Beginners should not have to muddle through.2) I bought a kindle for my niece at a different location and Amazon listed it as my kindle with my books going to it thus violating my privacy and causing inconvenience for my niece and brother.3) I bought another one for this address and for another family member and the same thing happened causing inconvenience and a breach of privacy.4) The adds are irritating.5) This is not a good choice if you read a lot of items with color illustrations (which can include adult books like military history books and the like).
Title;;;;;;: Would have been better if not for automated incompetence and also greed.;;;;;;

Review: This was my first e reader. I didnt like using my samsung tablet for readjng. Screens give me headaches after long periods of reading. This kidle is great. It looks like a peice of paper. Its very very very easy on the eyes. Reading is great on it. It is lightweight and compact

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"This Kindle is fine. I bought it to replace my 5th generation that I had broken. It's a very good reading experience and has excellent battery life. Absolutely hate the touch screen though. Every five minutes I accidentally reset the font size, which is super annoying.",Wish I hadn't broken my old one;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I think I am used to a lit screen, so having a Kindle with dim screen was tough to get used to. I love it though! Light, you pack it easily, easy to use. It is a bit tricky to figure out how to ""borrow"" or ""buy"" books, but I think I got it.",I love it though;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I would give this Kindle a five star review but for one thing:  There is constantly an advertisement on the screen trying to sell me a book I have absolutely no interest in.  I suppose that is why this model ""with specials"" was 30 bucks cheaper than usual.  Unfortunately, Amazon never explained what ""with specials"" meant.  I wish I could get a software upgrade to eliminate the ads.  Shame on Amazon!",I Hate the Constant Ads!;;;;;;

Review: My daughter absolutely loves it. I had to buy it to replace the Nook she had that I lost on her. Thought I would teach her a lesson because she was always leaving it laying around so I put it away... I still can't find after a year... so I purchased this Kindle and she likes it even better than the Nook. Thank you.
Title;;;;;;: so I purchased this Kindle and she likes it even better than the Nook;;;;;;

Review: I really like being able to turn the page by just touching the screen.  The first Kindle which I had for a very long time was anoying because I had to push the sides to change the page.The only negative is not knowing what page I'm on.  I've never liked the percentage concept to tell me where I am in the book.  Wish they would come up with a way to number the pages like a real book.It travels well and is small enough to put into my handbag so overall it gives me what I need in a reader.
Title;;;;;;: I really like being able to turn the page by just touching ...;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"bought it on Black Friday, and finally got it after nearly a month. But, it is worth waiting.What an amazing experience to read books via Kindle! Light and comfortable, im no longer worried about the ache after holding a reader for hours.",a good experience;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"What a difference 4 years makes.This new Kindle, is so light! I love that it actually tells you what page you are on! It even tells you how long it will take you toFinish the book! It's pretty solid , not As many crevices where sand/ dirt can get into. Great size , easily fits in purse.",Great improvement !;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"Got this as a xmas gift for my bf who's old school and only wants to read ""real books"". After I set it all up for him, he has really started using it every single day and enjoys it. I got him the base Kindle because he's terrible with technology and wanted it as simple as possible. Unfortunately, it has MAJOR problems staying connected to wifi and we have only used it with our home wifi so unsure why it keeps disconnecting and being unable to recognise our wifi. I've had to reset twice already because of this and I find it extremely annoying and a waste of time. The number of times I've inserted all of the wifi info and password into this little device would be enough for a lifetime, yet, it still manages to disconnect and not recognise the password until after 5 million attempts. Not sure if I'd purcahse another because of the trouble this is causing...looking into Kobo for future purcahses but all in all, reading and purcahsing books while the device is connected to wifi, it's great.",Nice but MAJOR wifi connection problems;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"A huge improvement from my old Kindle. Very light, easy to use with one hand, and the touch interface works very well. Selecting a word and getting the definition is super easy from anywhere in the text. Typing on the touch screen is easy. I took the Kindle to the beach and under the full sun or under the umbrella there was no glare at anytime.",Big improvement from older kindle;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I bought the Kindle 6"" Glare Free Touchscreen to replace my first and only Kindle that had the keyboard and buttons to turn pages.  I read reviews on all the new versions and picked this one because it was economical and met my needs as I wanted something that was small and easy to read.  The registration was easy and within minutes I was set up and reading.  I love it!",Very good deal!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,The convenience of the kindle has led me back to reading. The kindle has a really simple interface and a great battery life. I have only charged it once since purchase (around 10 days).The user experience has led me to prioritise it above other mobile devices. I now reach for it instead of my phone when I have some free time. I much prefer reading from its screen as opposed to my phone.,"Quick delivery, easy setup, great product";;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"The touchscreen could be more responsive, and the display could be a little brighter.  However, I really enjoy reading on this.  It's lightweight.  I love the features it has.  Overall, a quality product.",I really enjoy reading on this;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I was able to take advantage of a special offer.  It turned out to be a great deal at a better price.  I have an ""Old School"" Kindle Device with a key pad and directional arrow buttons.  It's wonderful to upgrade to an all touch screen along with it being much more compact, portable and convenient.",It turned out to be a great deal at a better price;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"A neat, handy reader.  I bought it for outdoor reading, in the sunlight.  It is perfect for that.  Very light for one handed control and very easy page turning.  Perfect for the pool or beach.  Small for easy carry, but plenty large enough for easy readingLove it.",It is perfect for that;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"The big bonus is that this Kindle model is very light and portable and was very easy to set up. The price point was appealing too. The downside is that even in daylight or in a normal-lit room in the evening, the display is not bright enough for my eyes to adjust comfortably. There is no back-lighting setting (ie. no brightness adjustment) on this Kindle and it is not entirely glare-free. I was hoping to take it on my camping excursions or to be able to read at night in my bed. However, a fully-lit room or an overhead reading lamp will be necessary. If you wear glasses or have eye issues, you will want to consider a model that offers a brightness setting.",I don't see the light;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I've had my Kindle for years and I cannot express how much I've enjoyed utilizing its convenience. I am a voracious reader and the books I choose reflect my 'light' reading choices.  Conveniences include the ease of use, ability to read more than one composition at a time, ability to order and read new instantaneously via Whispernet, etc, etc.  The only inconvenience is that my Kindle does not have a backlight, thus it is imperative that an independent  light source be utilized.  Hope my Kindle memory doesn't run out!",Love my Kindle;;;;;;

Review: I love it! Easy to use and transfered all my books!!

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"Too sensitive,turns several pages needs constant back and forth page turning.It gets stuck and does not get back or ahead to next page. The double rows are very bothersom,  the size of the print changes  suddenly,without me initiating the change. Very confusing.","Kindle E-reader,6"",refurbished";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"It's my first kindle. I read when I commute. It's very light and can fit in almost all my bags. I loved paper books, but with kindle I can read big books when I travel. I used Kindle app on my iPad to read for a while, but was always distracted by other apps.",Perfect;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I really like it. I do wish it had its own light, but it's easy to use and understand how it works. In rare moments I'll try to turn a page and it will take me back to the table of contents, but beyond that, i love it.",Great device;;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"I really liked my earlier model, which broke after 14 months, now you have really screwed up with this model of Kindle. Some objections include: when accessing the list of already purchased books, you have to sift through the illegible ""book covers"" for the titles,  3-6 at a time, which are interspersed with ""recommended purchases"" which you can accidentally buy--since you can't read the title anyway on half of the ""book covers"" anyway. Seems a guise it encourage additional purchases, accidentally.  The efficient text listing of previously purchased books utilized on the previous model was MUCH betterAlso, any random touch on the device may change the page perhaps tens of even hundreds of pages ---and finding the original site where you left off is very cumbersome at best--IF you can find it without re-reading half a dozen chapters to see where you wereThere are also some other minor complaints, but basically, it seems you took a good device which was working well, and screwed it up !!!Also, in an apparent effort to manipulate customers into subscribing to the ""Kindle Unlimited "" deal, the prices on individual books purchased have abruptly and dramatically increased.So take my advice--if you have not purchased a Kindle, DON'T--stick with books.",I really liked my earlier model;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"Its fine, its a Kindle, but can't say I like the touchscreen.  There is not a lot of room to hold it, touching the screen unintentionally causes windows to open which is irritating, and it was easier and more ergonomic for my hands to turn the page with a button than the touchscreen.  Still value the Kindle but meh...so not impressed with touchscreen.",Not fond of the touchscreen;;;;;;

Review: Just love it.  Having a bit of trouble getting used to it since I was used to the older version.  Do not like the way the books are displayed.  Can't tell which ones I have read in the past since all my books were downloaded.  I am sure I will get used to it.
Title;;;;;;: Just love it. Having a bit of trouble getting used ...;;;;;;

Review: I love my Kindle. I love that I have all my books with me where ever I go. I love that if there is an unfamiliar word I can tap it and find out what it means. I love that if I forget who a character is I can tap it and find out who that character is.  I love that I can keep track of what books I've read on Goodreads and Kindle.Amazon.com. The only thing I don't like is how the My Clippings folder works.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love having a Kindle. I was hesitant to get an eReader but fell in love with them this year. It's lightweight and portable. I love that I can read it outside without a glare and that I can store multiple books on it. I am able to read books for a low cost with the library loans and the Kindle borrowers library. I am thrilled with this purchase and encourage even the most skeptical to give it a try!Also, I bought a case for it and it gave me that ""book"" feel I had been missing",I love having a Kindle;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"Still trying to figure out how to use this thing ... a lot of the books I downloaded are just exerpts from a bigger book, which is what I thought I was getting ... so that is disappointing.  The whole point of getting a kindle was so I could read a lot more books for less $$$.  That has not turned out to be so.  Maybe it will get better when I learn more about using it.  Right now, it's just frustrating ...",Kindle .. not what I expected.;;;;;;

Review: Too complicated as compared to my old Kindle.  I just want to read books.  I don't want to critique them for others.  I make my choices based on the short summaries provided.  I don't need all those things coming on every time I touch the screen too fast or too slow or in the wrong place.  And I have trouble finding the new books I order.  I'd also like the option of permanently removing from my devices old already read books.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Very satisfied with my new Kindle that I received as a Christmas gift. I am able to purchase books from a wide selection with just the click of a button. Books are available for reading within minutes and for a reasonable price. Very readable, even in sunlight---exceeded my expectation.I would recommend purchasing to a friend.",Very satisfied with my new Kindle that I received as a ...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Simple, functional, no hassle. Does what it's supposed to do. I don't know about all the features compared with Nook, etc...I just know that it works for me and was inexpensive. For what it's worth, I dislike advertising in almost any form, but I find the ""special offers"" to be quite tolerable...they don't interfere with reading because they are only visible when the device is 'at rest'.",I dislike advertising in almost any form;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"First Kindle upgrade since my original Kindle Keyboard. Love it. Surprisingly responsive touchscreen (hadn't expected much, since this isn't really a tablet), clear & easy to read text, great battery life. Very worthy upgrade.",Love it. Surprisingly responsive touchscreen (hadn't expected much;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I am satisfied, but find 2 things I wish would be better. I can't change the orientation of the display which is sometimes inconvenient. And page turning isn't as easy as on my Ipad. But the Kindle is great for a small reader.","I am satisfied, but find 2 things I wish would be ...";;;;;;

Review: Love love this! Battery lasted me about 3 weeks but I have a case that turns it off when you close it. Great for relaxing outside but i wish i had gotten the one with a light on it fir reading in bed. I'll probably get a little clip on light.  Great investment for the price!

Rating: 1.0 out of 5 stars,"While I like this Kindle it doesn't present graphics (maps in the case of the first book I am reading) in regular font or ""print"". The entire map is ""faded"" and hard to read, i.e., map characters and word font are so ""light"" that it is very hard to read the map. I had to use a magnifying glass under a bright light to read the maps.",Graphics Display;;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"As far as I'm concerned,it's a piece of junk.  The first thing I noticed was that it refused to show me all the books I had purchased.  I could get 6, but it refused to show me the other 15.  The home page at top won't some up no matter how I try to get it. I managed to open a book and got it somewhere near the page I had been reading on my old kindle, but the dictionary kept popping up when not required and I couldn't get rid of it.  Everything froze.  I couldn't turn pages in either direction, I couldn't call up the home page, I couldn't even turn the machine off - when I tried, the page with the frozen dictionary would still be on the kindle and it stayed there.  When I tried to turn it off a second time and possibly reset the thing, the same page with the dictionary was still there.  Nothing I touched would coax it to leave.  I tried to turn it off again and a popup shot up in front of the dictionary and asked me if I wanted to cancel, restart or produce a blank page, but I couldn't do any of those things.  It just sat there and wouldn't go away.  The page wouldn't turn, the home banner at top wouldn't appear -- nothing worked.  I couldn't get rid of the dictionary and then a ''wise word'' screen showed covering up the dictionary and it wouldn't go away.I would ask you to replace this trash if I wasn't worried about getting another just like it.  Will you take it back?  If you won't replace it, it's going into the garbage can where it undoubtedly belongs.","Sheer, unadulterated trash";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Although it would have been way better if every book I downloaded from somewhere like gutenberg showed up on the device not as ""personal"" file. It's annoying and calibre couldn't just fix it easily.",Love it!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I received this as a birthday gift, and didn't think I would use it as much, but I was flat out wrong. I use this everyday and I just love how it syncs with my iPhone app seamlessly. The fact that this kindle has no glare whatsoever will make it into my pack when I go on day trips to the lake. The good reads app helps me determine what my next purchase would be, and the highlights in the book to show what other Kindlers highlighted is a nifty little feature. I Love this Kindle and it'll stay with me for a long time. Highly recommend for those constant readers!","Amazing Product, more than I suspected!";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Perfect size to fit in a small purse or bag.. I bought a skin for it with a front to protect it from, well, me. Have only read less than 12 hours over a span of two weeks, but have yet to need to charge it up.",Size is everything sometimes;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"The back ground is a little dark, however I wasn't sure I would like an e-reader. I ordered this one instead of the kindle paper white because of the price. With that in mind it is very much worth the cost and it's very enjoyable to use.",however I wasn't sure I would like an e-reader;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"Very nice product.  I have used the Kindle 3rd Generation for years and loved it until it died.  The touch screen is great and easy to turn pages, type notes, and even highlight.  The smaller size of the product was an adjustment and still would like something a little larger.  Because this does not offer some of the external ports, I was unable to find a cover with a built in light, which was desirable.  I purchased this over a Kindle Fire because I like the glare-free screen, but wish there was some type of cover and availability to have a built in light.",Very nice product. I have used the Kindle 3rd Generation ...;;;;;;

Review: This little Kindle is wonderful for a reader who likes to have books on hand at all times. It tucks into a purse or coat pocket easily. I use it everyday. The features are easy to use. I especially like to increase the size of the print when my eyes get tired.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"It's a simple Kindle, but it's super convenient and durable. The battery lasts long and I've accidentally dropped it a couple of times, and there are barely any scratches left. I'm super happy with this.",but it's super convenient and durable;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Can't go wrong with this simple e-reader.  Easy to use, lots of neat features, and easy to read screen.  I hated reading on my tablet because the glass screen made my eyes hurt after a while and if there were any kind of overhead lights the glare was unbearable.  This solved all of that.  This is my third Kindle e-reader and each generation keeps getting better and better.",Made for reading and does a great job at that.;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"The product is great for reading, the touchscreen is sometimes lagging and yo it could be good adding dictionary of english to spanish offline would be great or search a word inside another word definition.",Good for reading but lack of speed;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I wanted an e-reader that I could read outside with me, and this one is great.  I was used to using the app on my I-pad, but I quickly got used to using this one.  I highly recommend if you are looking for a kindle.",and this one is great. I was used to using the app on ...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I didnt think the transition from printed paper to display was going to be a simple  one but was I ever wrong.Its easy to read and fun to use.Full of features, my favorite is the built in dictionary/Wikipedia look up.Battery life is phenomenal. Honestly the reason I bought it was it was on sale.. but Im so glad I did.",Now I can have a library in my pocket;;;;;;

Review: The resolution is actually much better than what I expected. Even better for the fact that it does not have a back light because that's what a e-ink reader should be. Got it on cyber Monday. Very good deal.

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"The only feature that I did not like was the fact that it does not have an internal light for reading at night. However this feature is available in the newer kindle models. It is small and I can travel with it easily stowing it in convenient places such as a purse, backpack, and even cargo pants",The only feature that I did not like was the fact that it does not have an ...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I am very satisfied so far with my reader, though I wish it had come with some instructions instead of me having to blindly find all the features and how to use them, usually by accidently touching something.  A list of features and how to apply them would be nice. Probably not a problem for the younger generation who are more savvy on the touch-screen devices, but for us great-grandmas, it can be overwhelming.",older generation woes.;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"It's easy to hold and really lightweight, but the lighting sux i mean u always need a lamp on in the dark to read it ,and its a shame that the Kindle paperwhite is so much more money...but otherwise I love it",lightweight and perfect for avid readers;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I am retired and needed something basic for reading. The kindle 6"" meets my needs perfectly. I don't need to download a bunch of apps or music. This unit is easy to use. I am going to buy one for my 71 year old sister who is anything but computer literate, but operates the kindle just fine.",This unit is easy to use;;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"omg i hate the touch screen. do you read on the subway? well, i hope you only ever want to hold the kindle in your right hand. i'm constantly accidentally turning the page, and making the text giant. impossible to read and turn pages with one hand (can only do this with my right hand).  good luck. bring back the old non-touch screen!",omg i hate the touch screen;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Love the size and Glare-Free function.  The only negative is the touch screen is quite as responsive as I would like.  For simply reading books, it is tough to beat.  It shipped to me in like four days.","Great size, great function.  Touchscreen is a bit slow to respond.";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I avoided buying a Kindle for a long time.  Now, after owning one for a month, I have no idea why!  I love it and love that my habit of reading multiple books at once can be hidden because I have them all with me at one time and no one knows but me!",I love it and love that my habit of reading multiple ...;;;;;;

Review: I have wanted a Kindle ever since I first heard about them.  I received mine as a gift and am so excited to have one.  It is so nice to read a book with large print now and I can have many books and won't be cluttering up the house.  Great to take along on vacation.
Title;;;;;;: It is so nice to read a book with large print now and ...;;;;;;

Rating: 1.0 out of 5 stars,"After lugging around a 10.1"" tablet for nearly 5 years now, and hacking new versions of Android on it just so I could continue to update software I realised that it was time to upgrade my hardware. This decision was only decided after receiving a nice bonus from work and finally justifying a technology upgrade after hour upon hour of internet research. I decided to go with something advertised as having a long battery life and built to serve the same purpose as my dieing 10.1"" Tablet that was so old it could only really be used to read books. That old hacked relic still works though mind you. I work offshore and often we do not have the luxuries of TV or internet available when weather is bad and books suffice the only form of entertainment available next to twiddling your thumbs until you go out of your mind. Even when weather is good I can only handle taking hours for a section of Facebook to load due to slow satellite internet speeds. Prior to my most current venture offshore (now as I write this) I was ordering a new XPS13 to replace my also dieing antique Intel atom powered netbook. Low and behold I see an advertisement for a payment plan to get a Kindle. So I say what the hell adding a measly 15$ to a well researched and high-cost laptop purchase isn't going to break the bank. All of this occurred prior to going back to work. What joy I had when receiving the new toys to replace the old stone age relics I was lugging around for entertainment. Not to mention the weight reduction with modern devices when carrying them in my backpack while on deck. I tested both devices to confirm their functionality to determine if I would need to send anything back before embarking on airline flights, bus routes, and a helicopter ride before being trapped out at sea with only books and a handful of movies on a hard drive. So I plugged the Kindle into my brand new laptop and uploaded the novels, Dungeon Master's Guide, and PDFs of useful technical manuals for my work (I'm an electrical technician) from my tablet to the Kindle. Everything worked, I was able to test both devices simultaneously. So after opening a couple books I confirmed it is certainly a thing that does make books happen. Packed it up and prepared for the long journey and after my wife dropped me off to the airport and I made through TSA without being too molested I open my bag to continue reading George R.R. Martin's Feast For Crows...the Kindle only displays screen artifacts. No soft-reset attempts work or help. No amount of charging throughout the trip from my 2.1A battery pack help...I won't get those 18 hours of agonizing boredom back. I did however try charging it from the wall outlet nearly 12 more hours when arriving to my ship with no further change or improvement and have begun the Amazon troubleshooting process so we will see how that goes...but I am still on the fence on whether I want to feed it to the sharks or not. Considering our internet connection while in the middle of the ocean is 56K dial-ups ugly cousin it may very well be that by the time this review posts i may be back on shore or an aging man retiring from a career of offshore work who knows, but if I am able to get through to Amazon and work something out I will update this further.Meanwhile Forever Yours,Long time Amazon Prime Shopper and enthusiast...disappointed by latest future book technology.",First-Time Kindle Owner...not too impressed.;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love it. No glare, easy to read and easier to use than the old keyboard Kindle that I also loved. It's handier to hold because it's lighter and smaller. Has a great feel and responds well to touch without being too responsive and moving up too many pages like some tablets do.  It is truly glare free and that's important for me because I can't even read the paper white without problems. This is just perfect for long hours of reading and for flipping through sections of books, like cookbooks or travel guides where you want to find a recipe, or a topic quickly.",truly glare free;;;;;;

Review: Absolutely love it! I had the original kindle and just upgraded. I didn't think I could love anything more than my first kindle but the shape and size of this one is even better. It's easy to use and you can read for hours without getting a headache or straining your eyes!
Title;;;;;;: Absolutely love it! I had the original kindle and just ...;;;;;;

Review: This product is exactly as advertised and I suspect it will work as well and as long as my original Kindle.I do terribly miss having the page turning buttons as well as menu/home button that the original model Kindles have.  I would very much like to see Amazon re-introduce these features on the newer Kindles.
Title;;;;;;: I do terribly miss having the page turning buttons as well as ...;;;;;;

Review: A joy to use and a welcome change from the glare of monitors and tablets. The reader is inexpensive and very good value. Many books are either free or less than a dollar and the ability to download chapter samples before you buy gives you an informed purchase choice.
Title;;;;;;: A joy to use and a welcome change from the glare ...;;;;;;

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"I'm an avid reader. I've always used my I-phone with I-books. I did'nt know what I was missing! My non-glare Kindle is so much easier on my 54 year old eyes, and the size is a much more natural fit in my hand. I love the special deals I receive with Amazon prime! Thank you for changing my mind.",Love it!;;;;;;

Review: Received as a Christmas gift and being a avid reader this was a great present. I am loving the quick downloads and everything this Kindle has to offer to make reading more enjoyable. Thanks Amazon for this Kindle product. It is well worth the purchase if you love to read.

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"More difficult to use than older models. Having trouble finding how to order, change print size , etc. Older model had several Keys/buttons with specific functions. That is no longer the case. Simplicity had made using device more difficult.",More difficult to use than older models. Having trouble ...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"My boyfriend loved his kindle as a gift. Its small, and the touch screen is great. Its easy to upload books and he has been glued to it since last night :) Oh also I got it on sale! Makes it that much sweeter!",Great product!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Let me start by saying this is my favorite purchase I have ever made. I have not read a book in ages and I thought that my old love for reading was gone. I am a high school student and this kindle helps me in every way. Wether by entertainment or me learning new vocabulary with it's amazing dictionary functionality I couldn't ask for anything more. This is truly an amazing device. I have rediscovered a long gone passion and am truly grateful. My only complaint would be the resolution. When on a smaller font the lack of ppi is noticable. However, it doesn't take away from the experience.",Amazing!!!!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Lightweight, easy to use. Recommended cover is not as substantial as the first Kindle cover, but it is very light. This new Kindle Basic does not turn off all the way apparently. WHen you close the cover, it goes to sleep, then wakes up when you open the cover.",easy to use;;;;;;

Review: Received my Kindle for a Christmas gift and I love it.  It is so easy to purchase books except I do not have wireless in my home so I have to go 11 miles to the nearest free WiFi.  I really like the easy reading and also the choice in letter size.  It is so easy to bookmark and then return to the same page. It is very convenient to take with me wherever I go.  I also purchased the Kindle carrying case and that makes it so easy to hold.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I was looking for something to replace my newspaper ever morning. It was getting difficult for me to search for my paper every morning with MS getting worse. On the few days I was able to track it down it was often too wet to read. I thought there had to be a better way. The kindle fit the bill for me. I am now able to get my newspaper every day, it's dry, I can handle it with one hand, ever on windy days at one fourth the cost.",No more wet or lost newspaper.;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I ordered 3 on Thanksgiving, two for my children, they seem to like it very much because they carry it everywhere to read books. The other one is for myself, I haven't start it yet, I wish it works well.",they seem to like it very much because they carry it everywhere to ...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"This replaces on of the very first Kindle readers I've used for years, and it continues to be a good value for the price. Since I'm a Prime member I take advantage of the free loan of a book each month.",Excellent basic reader;;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"The screen is extremely dark.  I know it s not paper white, but the screen is considerably darker than I ever remembered when I originally bought a kindle years ago.  I find myself using my tablet with the Kindle app more than the Kindle.",The screen is extremely dark. I know it s ...;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"I needed to do more research before buying this one, when I got it in the mail i was very surprise bc I thought it was going to be bigger, but its ok. I'm happy with my Kindle and Im loving it. Also, you can't read where there's no light.",I'm happy with my Kindle and Im loving it;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"OK, I've always loved reading.  But, I stopped ages ago... I guess with the internet boom.  Anyway, I got this kindle as a gift and it's fantastic.  I'm starting to read again, like I used to, and it feels great. The kindle is light and feels natural to hold.  I spent a couple hours reading the other day and my hands didn't tire, nor did my eyes.  The only issue I can come up with is the fact that the screen is darker than the average book.  Like, I might be able to read a read book using less light then I can with the kindle.  Not a huge problem, just something I noticed.side note:  I bought an adorable fintie cover for it, and now my life is complete.","Look ma, I can (still) read!";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"It is amazing, no more paperback stories for my kids, it's easy for them to use and download what they like,and the most important thing that there is no screen light which make it safe for their eyes.","It is amazing, no more paperback stories for my kids";;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"The page turning and any sort of screen changes (like coming back from the screensaver or turning back on the screen) are jumpy, that's my only complaint! It's simple just like I wanted and very light and easy to use with one hand! The screen is perfect, sharp enough and just like looking at a real page.",It's simple just like I wanted and very light and easy to use ...;;;;;;

Review: My wife uses the Kindle and likes the old one better because it was thinner and had the paddle switches to flip the pages. The old one got damaged but I may just try to replace the screen. Newer is not always better.
Title;;;;;;: ... wife uses the Kindle and likes the old one better because it was thinner and had the paddle switches ...;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"When my old Kindle bit the dust, I was concerned I would find another that I liked as well as my old one. I like my new one even better than my old. It is so lite. It was very easy to down load contents of my old kindle onto my new one.",I was concerned I would find another that I liked as well as my old one;;;;;;

Review: Wasn't looking for anything sophisticated.  Weighs nothing and there really is no glare.  But really disappointed that I didn't spend the extra bucks for one with a backlight.  Battery does last and it is convenient to carry around.

Rating: 1.0 out of 5 stars,"Looks like an etch-a-sketch, terrible to read.",One Star;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"This is an incredible device. I really enjoy reading on it. I bought this version -without the build-in light- because I though that this feature could be replaced reading on open air and/or with light, but i was wrong. I can read without the light but I feel like with the light it could be more easier, but again, I knew about this before buying it, so is not Amazon's fault. I'm definetly buying the Paperwhite model in the near future.",Amazing e-reader for the price.;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love my new Kindle.  I've had the Kindle app on my Android devices for a long time, but I really enjoy the 6 inch Kindle.  It is easy to use and a nice change from my other e-reader devices.  I got it for a fantastic price.  It was well worth the cost.",I love my new Kindle;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I needed a Kindle to read in the sunlight. I had a first generation Kindle which after many, many years failed to hold a battery charge longer than a day. It still works and I am letting a friend use it. I love all the kindle products. They are priced fairly and the ease with which they work is amazing. I use it all the time. This was a gift from my daughter for Christmas. While I do not like the advertisements I see when I turn the device on and off, they haven't been offensive and she saved $20. This is the tool for anyone who loves to read.",I love all the kindle products;;;;;;

Review: Love the ability to have multiple books on my person at any time.  great for someone who is reading a number of books at the same time. One comment to improve is that the browser can not download PDFs but if you have full feature computer you can download and transfer the files to it.  Also a default option for showing larger versions of illustrations in books.  In certain cases you can tap on image and it will open a full screen version and in other instances it will move to next page.
Title;;;;;;: Love it and some suggestions for features.;;;;;;

Rating: 1.0 out of 5 stars,"After charging the device, I attempted for nearly an hour to use the touchscreen keyboard and register it. Unfortunately, when I touched a letter or number, either (1) nothing happened, or (2) the correct key was highlighted but one NEXT to it on the screen was input!  After too-many-to-count times of using the back arrow key to erase and start over, I finally got my user name and password onscreen. Would you say that is not very effective use of my time?Well, it got WORSE. When I pressed the correct Wi-fi network for my home, the one BELOW it on the screen was input and using the back arrow did nothing.I phoned Amazon Kindle support, and the agent told me I'd have to download the software (which she said wasn't loaded into the Kindle) onto my computer, and then load it into the Kindle via USB. After about ten minutes more of frustration (with nothing online where she told me it would be and her suggesting I change USB ports), I told her I no longer wanted a Kindle. I have better uses for my time. If I want to read an e-book, I'll read it on my laptop (which performs as it should).I am returning it for a refund today.",I don't recommend this device.;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"while actually reading, it's great, screen's clear and easy on the eyes. The biggest problem is trying to browse my library to get a book, there's reading suggestions and other things that take up space on the front page. I was used to using the Kindle app for my iPad, so this was a bit of a difficult transition. Also some people may be aware of this, I was not when I ordered, there are no speakers or headphone jack so you can't use it with audible/whispersync","it's great, screen's clear and easy on the eyes";;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Great reader! Light-weight & easy to hold. There is still a slight glare in really severe or bright light, but still much better than your standard tablet screen. The Internet capability is slow, so even though you could use the web browser, it's kind of slow. I suggest using this as a reader only.",Awesome Reading Tablet;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Battery does indeed last days, even with heavy usage (I'm getting roughly 8 days off a full charge, reading on it between 4 and 7 hours per day). Easy to navigate, easy to set up Wi-Fi and turn Airplane Mode on and off, and easy to change font styles, sizes, and margins. Best investment I've made for the amount of travel I do.",Easy to navigate;;;;;;

I'm definitely regretting buying this for my mom and not me.","it's great, everything works smoothly and it's very easy to ...";;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Easy to open, easy to operate and connect. It's very intuitive. I'm 300+ pages into my first book, and I'm having a hard time reading for more than 45 minutes without taking a break. I haven't decided if it's me (my eyes), the book, or the kindle.  I'm going to try a cover (it's a great size, but doesn't feel like a book), and download one of my favorite books and see how it goes. :)  I do love how easy it is to use, and the battery life is great!",Easy to open;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"I like my 1st. Kindle better where it listed all my books plus those archived. I prefer the controls on the original Kindle, especially the buttons on the sides. It is only Black and White, which is not a problem, but I cannot find any way to change the contrast. I do like how it is glare free and looks like a book. Makes it easier reading in the sun.",Overall not bad;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"my old kindle from 5 years ago finally kicked the bucket, so I began my search for a new one. I tried using his but it hurt my eyes.I decided to try the 6"" glare free, as it is the closest thing to my old kindle that I could find, minus the buttons and keyboard.  I've been really happy with it. the battery life is long, and it is easy on my eyes. Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I received this as a Christmas gift from my sister, and I couldn't be happier. I've been saying I wanted one for years, but never bought it. All in all I am mostly satisfied with my new Kindle

Rating: 1.0 out of 5 stars,"I bought this for my husband to replace our first kindle.  It was one of the old ones and he loved it.  It didn't have pictures and was easy to find new books from all the ones in our (my) collection.  He HATES this new one he can't find stuff.  He finds it hard to use.  If I could trade it in on a kindle fire I would.  He's using mine and I'm stuck with the ipad which I hate!Do you have a solution for us?Thanks,",Help Needed;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"I used to say I loved my Kindle now it's just eh.  When my original Kindle e-reader stopped working I received horrible customer service trying to resolve the problem;" after it was determined my Kindle couldn't be repaired I was told Amazon would replace it
Review: then I was told that I would be given a discount on a replacement
Title;;;;;;: then I was told a discount wasn't available for a replacement unless I upgraded to a Fire - all in the span of 3 minutes.  After receiving no help from customer service
column4: including one incomprehensible email written in broken English
column5: I gave up and just purchased the closest thing I could find to what I had prior. Since I prefer an e-reader
column6: I settled on this version.  I wish I still had my old e-reader as the touch screen on this is
column7: well
column8: touchy to say the least.  Sometimes when I touch the screen to advance a page it advances many pages and returning to where I was becomes a scavenger hunt of sorts.  The battery life is is not as good as the old version either.  Rather than a screensaver there are advertisements
column9: which is fine
column10: but last week I had my first """"pop up"""" advertisement which I find invasive.  The one thing I do like about this version is that it is small and light
column11: easily fits into a purse.""
column12: Eh
column13: not as good as the older model""";;;;;

Rating: 1.0 out of 5 stars,"I bought this for my 7 year old daughter who loves to read.  It was difficult for me to work and maneuver, I knew there was no way she could do it.  It was hard to return to the home page to change books.  I was also finding it difficult to find books for her to read.  I gave it to her on Christmas morning to see if she could do better than me and she didn't like it either.  She asked me to return it.  So I did.",Disappointed.;;;;;;

Review: Was excited to get new kindle.  Still using my kindle 2 and love it but could not pass on $49 deal. Disappointed that when I downloaded my books they were not in collections like I had my old kindle sorted.  Needed to re sort my books into collections which is a lot of work.  If I knew I had to do this would not have purchased new kindle. With technogy did not expect to have to do the restring of books.  New version is lighter weight but old one was fine

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Its everything the seller said it would be :) I got it for my daughter for her birthday next month, but I've been messing with it to get it all set up and it's pretty neat. I plan to purchase one for myself at some point. :)",Kickass Kindle;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I bought this to take to the beach. Didn't want the salty sea spray invading my Kindle Fire.  Glare free screen works well but the screen is somewhat too sensitive, a slight brush against it & it changes the page.",I bought this to take to the beach. Didn't ...;;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"3rd Kindle... had to buy this to continue reading, as I somehow broke my screen boarding a flight.  Touch screen is TERRIBLE!  For some reason it keeps changing the font size (is my finger too close?).  Touch screen is NOT a good choice for turning pages... it is either too sensitive of a finger NEARBY, or it pulls up a menu when trying to turn a page... oh, did I mention it keeps changing the font?  BRING BACK THE LAST MODEL!  I'll be looking on the secondary market to replace this POS, then it'll be in the bargain bin at Goodwill.",Touch screen is TERRIBLE! For some reason it keeps changing the font ...;;;;;;

Review: Like my original better. Difficult at end o book to go to similar books or next in the authors series. I probably should have gone to a better model. Disappointed . Was expecting the new one to be equal or better.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I got this as a birthday present and it has changed the way I read. All of the ads talking about taking your books anywhere, no glare, etc... are absolutely right. I can read outside, inside, day, night, wherever and whenever. The other part I love is no more buying a book online and waiting for it to show up, you can receive it electronically when you pay for it and you're good to go. I really like this and it makes me look forward to future reading with ease.",Revolutionized reading for me;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I just love how easy it is to read on it, also how lightweight it is. I can read with just one hand and its not a problem. The only real drawback that I found was the absence of a backlight, I tend to read at night, nevertheless with some bedside lighting I am more than able to keep reading.",I just love how easy it is to read on it;;;;;;

Review: The screen flickers when ever I touch it...

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Just excellent.Everything and much more than I was expectin for the device, it allows a good management of the book, it is ""Paper like"", and the most important thing is that it helps a lot for reading in english, because english is not my mother toungue, nontheless having helps like Wise word or the Oxford dictionary integrateds in the Kindle have been such a huge help for me.5 well gained stars for this device!",Just excellent. Everything and much more than I was expectin ...;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"A grand e-reading device from someone slavishly in love with paperbacks that begrudgingly uses one. Sometimes I miss the simplicity of the original Kindle, and the error-free page forward and back buttons. The touch functionality can result in some unexpected pagination results, but overall, a great product. The Goodreads integration is absolutely divine.",A grand e-reading device from someone slavishly in love with paperbacks that begrudgingly uses one;;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"Kindle is very slow and sometimes unresponsive when I ""tap.""  I can get it to work, eventually, but frustrating. I've read the instructions twice.Not sure if I should send it back or not.","Kindle is very slow and sometimes unresponsive when I ""tap ...";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I've been using it for a year now and it's working perfect. Im planning on upgrading it to voyage or paperwhite soon, but just because Im addicted to it. 4.0 out of 5 stars,"Never thought I'd say this, but this is a neat product. I've always been apprehensive about technology, especially if I don't need it (I have a ton of paperback books), but I'm having a hard time not getting attached to this thing. It's super lightweight and very easy to just slip in your pocket.In fact, due to this thing's versatility, I find myself reading more often than I would with any traditional book -- I take this everywhere!  Though it will never replace the ""magic"" of traditional books, I easily found a place in my heart for this gadget, and I'm sure you will too! =)",Read Everywhere!;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Great for the price.  I have a Kindle HD that I use mostly, but needed something I could use by the pool or at the beach.  I didn't want to spend a lot since it's not my primary Kindle.  This refurbished model is perfect for my needs.",Great for the price;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I like it -  it is a nice way for me to get books -  as a I live in a small town - and have to drive about 75 miles to get any kind of selection of books.  I like that I can adjust the font -  however my only complaint would be -  too difficult for me to navigate through the ""user instructions"" -  but I keep trying.If I could get past the navigation and use it to it's potential -  I would give it a 5 star",first time user;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I really don't understand all the negative reviews. I love my Kindle! Grant it, it is the lower end in the Kindle family on specs, but knew that when I purchased it. I have a Ipad, Iphone, Mac laptop ect..but I wanted a light reader, just for reading and this Kindle delivers!! I highly recommend it!",I love my Kindle;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"No improvement for me over last version.  As before, font switches to smaller type with no warning.  Frequently, I have to change it to the larger font.  Although, as advertised, display is certainly no brighter than the previous version.  What is better here?  I'd rather keep my 0r89r Kindle and get a refund for the same Kindle I have, my third, BTW I  have  bought hundreds of books through Kindle, and thank you..",What is better here? I'd rather keep my 0r89r Kindle and ...;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I am very happy with this Kindle as I can now read outside without having pages flapping and having to carry a heavy book.  It is easy to use, started using it from the moment I opened the box.  Very easy to figure out.  I do find that you have to have bright light in the house to be able to read the Kindle but that is not a problem.  Once again, while I am outside it is very easy to read, which is why I bought it.I highly recommend this Kindle, I can't tell that it is refurbished it looks like a brand new one.",Great For Outdoors;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Very nice tool to read books. It is easy for the eyes and extremely easy to get new books. The only thing I can see that could be improved is to have a quicker way to shut the screen off, than just pushing the on button for several seconds.",Very nice tool to read books;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"This e-reader is light, yet durable. It has great battery life, and is very easy on the eyes. There are lots of after-market accessories for it, and last but not least there is an AMAZING selection of kindle books at low prices to back it up!",It has great battery life;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"There's no function to adjust brightness, which means that you will need a separate light source. Which means it will be just as pathetically useless as a book in a dark room.Apart from that disappointing fact, it's very easy to use and I like to read on this device instead of my ipad (which is heavy and has a screen that's overly sensitive to touch).",Which means it will be just as pathetically useless as a book in a dark room;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love it. I already have kindle PW2.Even if I turn off paperwhite2's light, I can still see some weak light from kindle paperwhiter2 in dark.When I found kindle has touch screen and dictionary, I just bought one.The only thing I don't like is the case. The case is thinner than kindle. And the quality is really poor than PW2's leather case.",I love it. I already have kindle PW2;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"The worst part about this device is the software updates. I received my Kindle on Nov 22 and have already had to updated my software 3 times and its the second week of January. I have yet to purchase a book on this device and have it immediately show up. I must plug it into my computer, update software, and manually add my books from my desktop. I've done this with 4 books. Lots of work for a brand new device.",Software Updates are a PAIN;;;;;;

Review: The touch screen randomly decided to not work anymore even with a case that protects the screen. And Amazon won't take returns. I was orginally very excited to have the Kindle unfortunately it just quits working. I got it in November 2015 and its March 2015 that's about 4 months and it's broken.

This works perfect for me. I was tired of the backlight on my phone killing my eyes so I bought this. I love that it looks just like a book page. It is just the right size for my purse too! It makes it easy to always have a book when you get stuck somewhere having to wait

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"The kindle was a perfect gift for my 10 year old daughter.  My daughter got one for Christmas and had been reading on it everyday since. My son wants one now as well.My daughter had difficulty with understanding what she is reading at times, due to not knowing the definition of a word.  She can now look up the definition while she is reading rather than asking someone later and taking all information in at once.",Perfect gift;;;;;;

Review: I'm totally satisfied with my Kindle Glare-Free (7th generation). Reading e-books was never as easy as it is right now!Vocabulary Builder software is also amazing! It is helping me a lot to further learn new english words!

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"1.Simple package but very cost effective. With no useless rubbish inside.2.Battery life:feels like about 15-18hours continuous reading is ok, not very precise. I tested twice, first time about 4days, every day about 3,4 hours reading. Second time, 7hours reading a time, more than 50% battery left.3.Reading performance ok, various of format available, with ordinary and special function for better reading4.Service good, can response in short timeA very happy shopping experience.",New Kindle read more;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"I had the generation II kindle for years and unfortunately it quit working a month ago while I was on a business trip.  I ""needed"" my reading material so I went right over to Best Buy and purchased this kindle.  I am not as happy with it.  I find the screen so sensitive to touch that I often lose my place in the book (because the pages turn), or sometimes the pages turn in the wrong direction.  It can get confusing and frustrating.  I do like having the dictionary built into the screen, and I like how light it is.  I read at least two books a week on my kindle, I do really love kindles, but I think the older ones were better designed.",Original kindles were better;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"What can I say, I love this device!  I've been an avid reader my entire life, and there is no doubt that this device solves ALL my research needs.All my life i've always had to keep three items by my side while reading any form of printed text: A dictionary, an encyclopedia (Wikipedia) and a notepad for jotting down notes.  So obviously, later on, I figured the best thing to purchase is a Tablet (another one of the best inventions) which would make it alot easier to pull up information on the go.  But lo and behold, the FIRE, KINDLE is created.  What a beautiful device with all the features an avid reader could ever ask for! I didn't even mention how it solves library storage. But I won't even bother to get into all the details, the information is here on the website, so just go out and buy one.  Don't be a sour old grump like some other old school readers who wants to hold on to the orthodox ways of life.  Once you get one, I guarantee you'll  make them jealous.  Like my wife !.LOLYou owe it to yourself!",One of the best devices I own!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Just what I was looking and specting for, the dictionary/wikipedia it's a great idea for helping understand some concepts that the context can't help you to figure out. You can hold too much books since they aren't heavy. No pain on the eyes because it doesn't have light, just like a book, but without the weight or the smell. A great deal and a great tool.","Great Deal, Great Tool";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Am a first time Kindle user. I loved the Anti-glare feature and the fact that we can read pdfs in this, and need not buy all the items for us to read... ;")Just got delivered from amazon today (standard two-day delivery - thanks to amazon). So far the feel is good. Really compact !Will update it after a month or two of real use. !Cheers""
Review: Great buy for a first timers !";;;;;

I received this as a birthday gift and I absolutely love it. It's light weight and very easy to navigate between screens. The fact that you are able to get the look of a real book in text is what this kindle is all about. Navigating to purchase books and to access good read is a breeze. I highly recommend  this kindle!

Kindle is one of my favorite devices.I decide it to change my old Kindle (keyboard model) with this new touch kindle.The device looks wonderful and reacts very fast but I was very disappointed about 2 things:1. The device doesn't have jack for audio (I think that there are a lot of people who reads and listen to music ).2. The device doesn't have a case with light (like the keyboard model) - this is very frustrating because I liked very much the light case for my old kindle.

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"Good product for the price... But i guess Amazon must incorporate a feature so that we can download audio books abd listen it over this device.Also, the screen is great is brigth light, but is ureadable in low light situations. I guess a backlit display would help better...Over all a great product for this price!!!",Good product for the price;;;;;;

Review: I love to read and I am partial to reading actual books but the kindle makes it much easier.  I feel as if I am reading faster with the kindle.  I like being able to choose the size and boldness of the print which is a benefit over books.  It is like carrying a small library in my hands that I can take with me anywhere I go.  I never thought I would really like a kindle but I received one as a Christmas gift from my daughter and her family but I am finding myself liking it more and more.
Title;;;;;;: I love to read and I am partial to reading actual ...;;;;;;

Review: The lightweight design allows me to flow through my reading material with comfort. I find myself reading through my entire book with no fatigue to my wrist. The non-glare screen is amazing and the fact that I can adjust the font to suit my tired eye's is wonderful. It's like having had an eye exam at just the right moment! Thank you for making reading a joyful experience once again.
Title;;;;;;: The non-glare screen is amazing and the fact that I can adjust the font ...;;;;;;

Review: We should've went for the paper white... Trust me... This was our first eBook so we didn't want to risk too much. Big mistake!This one is great but the white one in my opinion it's awesome and looks good.

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"I didn't know how to operate the kindle and wish you had included a paper instruction sheet which would have helped me start.  It was a hunt and peck guess work for the first couple of times and contrary to my other kindles, I don't know how to call for help.  I saved the sheet from the second one I have fortunately.  I love how light it is;" the first  one helped break a strap on an expensive purse I took on a trip.  Barbara Volin""
Review: I saved the sheet from the second one I have fortunately. I love how light it is";;;;;

I love it. I was never much of reader. While in school I hated being 'forced' to read. Before middle school I would read all the time but in Middle School and High School I read the least amount as possible. Graduated and tried to get back into reading but hated having an actual book. But then I picked up this Kindle and I have read more in the couple weeks of having it then I probably have in the past few years. Its great! My wife has the 2nd or 3rd generation Kindle (with they keyboard on the bottom) and has had it for a few years and has loved it.
Title;;;;;;: I love it. I was never much of reader;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"The screen is very sensitive, not only for finger, but also for any other hard object such as a pen. Besides, reading on this device feels like reading with a real book, I can read it for the entire day without feeling uncomfortable as reading in my iPad. The only thing that I don't like is it don't have a speaker with it, for a person who spend always spend the entire weekends reading, reading with the accompany of music would be amazing!",reading on this device feels like reading with a real book;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love the touch screen. I think the kindle's ink is really sharp. It is so much easier to read on then a tablet. I didn't think I would ever convert from paperbacks to a kindle, but I do love the convince. I am glad that I don't have book clutter any more.",No book clutter! Hurray;;;;;;

Review: I am SO pleased with my Certified Refurbished Kindle. It reads well and is so lightweight. I can take it anywhere with me and it's not bulky. I love the highlighting function and the ease with which you can change font size. I have already downloaded six books that I can't wait to read!

Rating: 1.0 out of 5 stars,"I've had 3, yes THREE, kindles.  All 3 have died due to charging malfunctions. The first 2 were quickly replaced by Amazon customer service free of charge. Because this 3rd one FINALLY made it past the warranty deadline, I've been issued a huge screw you by Amazon. EXTREMELY disappointed in them and their once stellar customer service. DO NOT BUY! I've been very careful with mine always, have a protective case, put it up  where little hands can't reach, never been dropped, charged it exactly as specified., etc.  save your money and buy something higher quality instead.",EXTREMELY disappointed in them and their once stellar customer service;;;;;;

Review: It was very lightweight and easy to use.

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"I purchased this Kindle to replace an older version that finally wouldn't work any longer.  I actually like my old Kindle's ""push-button"" feature better to go back and forth from the pages.  I read in bed, and it accidentally slipped a bit in my hands and I somehow ended up many chapters ahead from where I was reading. It was a bit of a hassle (and annoying) to go back to where I was. I guess I'll get used to it. I am also a bit disappointed it didn't fit in my old Kindle's case as it is smaller - would have been nice if it was made adaptable to it since the cases aren't cheap.  Other than those ""complaints,"" I love reading from my Kindle.  The screen really is glare-free.  I often read from the Kindle app on my phone if I don't have my Kindle, but that doesn't work well outside because of the glare.  No problem with the Kindle.",Not a fan of the touch screen;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I like this device very much. It's light weight and cool to touch.I find that I have plenty of access to the web, and I just wanted something for books.This is great for my needs. Also, Kindle books are more reasonable than others.Good luck in you e-reader search.",KINDLE SIMPLE!!!;;;;;;

Review: I don't know if I ordered wrong or what.  But I can't say I like this one as much as the one that suddenly stopped wroking.  I am somewhat disappointed. When I get some money together I'll buy a newone.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love my Kindle so much more than I ever had expected to. It's great. I read quite a bit more on this e-ink device than any of my full color display tablets. It's far easier on the eyes and allows me to sleep easily afterward, which isn't the case with my tablets.",I love my Kindle so much more than I ever had ...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Great size. Fits in one hand, which is great when I'm commuting on the train.  Does what I need it to do, which is to have access to my hundred plus books and read without bells, whistles or distraction.",Very satisfied;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I LOVE my new Kindle. I was debating as to whether or not I needed a separate reading device, as I was previously using the Kindle app on my iPad. If you are on the fence, I say go for it! Reading on the Kindle is _enjoyable_, whereas reading on the Kindle app on the iPad is merely bearable. Get a Kindle. If you like to read, even a little bit, just get one already.",Great purchase!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I've had the kindle app on my ipad for years now and I've found that when I want to read a book I end up reading my email (personal and work), my twitter feed, my tumblr dashboard, the news (I have two news apps), the multiple forums to which I'm subscribed, then I check the weather and play a game of solitaire, two dots or trivia crack.  At that point I'm no longer in the mood to read a book.I got this basic kindle in the hopes that I would actually unwind and read before going to sleep.  It worked!  Now I'm enjoying books again and as a bonus, I can read in the bright afternoon sunlight on my deck after work.  Well worth every penny.",I'm reading books again!;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I am for the most part very pleased with my purchase. I like the free samples, and books being downloaded directly to my device. However, I took one star off because I was unaware that there are advertisements every time I lock the screen, which is a little annoying. Overall definitely worth the money.",I am for the most part very pleased with my purchase;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"This Kindle is perfect for reading on the train,bus or at home.  I love the small size so that I can store it in my purse or briefcase.  Battery life is wonderful soyou don't have to keep charging it like most devices.",This Kindle is perfect for reading on the train;;;;;;

Review: Just the right size. It fits in my bag without weighing it down. Do not let some reviews be misleading. It is about the most basic e-reader you can find.  It does not do any thing special except be a leight weight wonderful way to have your favorite books at your fingertips.
Title;;;;;;: It does not do any thing special except be a leight weight wonderful way to have your favorite books at your fingertips;;;;;;

Review: Amazing. I didn't think I wounderstand be into much but I love it. Long battery life. No glare. Easy on the eyes like a real book. I love how small it is so I can put in my purse. I also love how no one knows what you're reading.

Review: i have an issue with the fact that the power button is on the bottom.  when on the train holding in an awkward position the power is constantly getting hit and turning off the device. Its larger than the one i orignally had but i guess i got use to that.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I received this as a gift and it is my first e-reader. I would highly recommend for first time users! Great value!  I love how user friendly it is. Since large books tend to be daunting, I love the feature to hide what page you are on...I find myself actually reading more and checking my progress every-so-often. I also use in conjuction with Amazon Prime / Kindle Unlimited and Goodreads site.",easy to hold and use!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love my new Kindle...I use it when I travel and at home. its perfect for me as it is light weight and so easy to carry.  I am in my 50's I cannot carry alot in my carry-ons anymore, the screen is small, so my reading glasses are a must, as in most cases... Its quick, its fun, and its a Amazon product...I will purchase more Amazon products in the future.  They have my Vote!","Great, thats all can say...";;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"The extra gifts are mainly advertisement. It's a small device, easy to handle and not heavy. Reading with it is the almost the same as reading paper books. You'll need a book light if it's dark, no glare outside. Easy on the eyes, which is great!  Not friendly for PDF files reading. Good overall, considering the price. However, if you can go for a newer model, I would recommend to do so.",easy to handle and not heavy;;;;;;

Review: I enjoy reading using this Kindle. it is nice and compact. About the size of a normal paper back book. The screen is nice and easy to read. It seems to work without any glitches. I do wish it had manual buttons to turn the pages.the screen can be a little sensitive but not bad enough that it would turn me off from buying one. Overall good product.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"been using it for about a week now and I love it! very user friendly...wasn't sure if I was going to like the ""swipe"" feature..my last kindle had the ""turn page"" button, but i love it. Held a charge for over a week. no complaints.",... using it for about a week now and I love it! very user friendly;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"If you're wondering about getting a Kindle, I can say without reservation that it is one of the best purchases I've ever made. The access to out of print classics, the fresh writings of new authors and everything in between has provided me with uncounted hours, days, weeks of great reading. I can honestly say that my Kindle has paid for itself just from the savings I've gotten from just one author. Add to that the fact that the cubic footage of storage no longer required for my books has seriously reduced the clutter of my life!",Great way to save money and space!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"It was a gift for my girlfriend so I haven't had the chance to try it but my girlfriend is 100% trustworthy. It is her first e-book reader and she says it is the best e-book reader she ever had (ironic). She says it surpassed every expectation she had about e-book readers. She is always carrying it to anywhere she goes. She can't stop reading now, she really loves this e-book reader and I'm very happy about she being happy. It is well made, looks nice and elegant and also easy to carry with one or both hands.",It made my GF very happy!;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I really like this reader. I thought the special offers would be really annoying but they are not. This Kindle is not back-lit but, the print is clear and easy to read. Some people may not like turning pages by touch screen but this works well for me I, also like the built in dictionary and high lighting features. For an entry level reader this is great. This is my first reader;" I will more than likely eventually upgrade to one of the other 3G+wireless Kindle.""

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"I like this and got a great deal but my bad for not reading the fine print.  I have Paperwhite envy! It would be nice if it was backlit in low light but I increased the font size so that helps.  I usually read during my lunch hour and it is great for that.  No trying to hold a book in one hand and eating with the other!  i can just touch to turn the pages and eat like a normal person!!

Till a couple days ago I thought this device was pretty great.  AURGH ! ! !With Amazon's help my Kindle seems to be working again, but it was a very frustrating experience.",update;;;;;;

They love them.Pros:light weighteasy to holdresponsive touch screenbattery life is greatperfect for one handed reading, no matter which handclear, easy to read onable to make the words bigger smaller, change margins, and space between linesperfect for readingreduces eye strainCons:little slow, not too bad though",Wonderful for reading. Best eReader out there.;;;;;;

Review: I fully enjoy my Kindle.  I am on hospice and housebound...I love to read and now I am still able to shop for books and can sample them.  The only complaint is the smallness of the keyboard and the letters.  Surely with your expertise you could offer a full sized keyboard that could be attached (like a flash card is attached) to compose responses and then disconnected...I do not send responses because I cannot read the letters and continually mistype to start over because the letters on the board are so small....is there a separate email address to critique what I read?

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Love this version!!! I upgraded from the Kindle Keyboard which is also fantastic, but I've rubbed all the print off the keypad. I can't read by the pool with any of my mobile devices (phone, 8"" tablet, 12"" tablet).",Love this version;;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"While I still like the convenience of my new Kindle reader, I am very disappointed with this 7th generation model. I previously had the original Kindle with the keyboard built into the device its self, which I absolutely LOVED!! It is supposedly an advance to have a touch pad, but it is very annoying! If you put the Kindle down, if anything passes close to the screen or if my dog walks between me and the screen, it advances about 20 pages! And it is VERY difficult to get it to go backwards, usually requiring about 5 minutes of ""fiddling"" with the machine to get it back to the right page, totally destroying the enjoyment of the book. I REALLY REALLY MISS my old Kindle!!! I REALLY WISH Amazon still sold them. They were GREAT!",I miss my OLD Kindle!!!;;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"I purchased this product as a Father's day gift.My father is 87 years of age and of sound mind.The product was packaged properly and delivered unharmed and on time. However, we, my father and I, were unable to register the device in order for him to start reading books.We tried several times, but could not get passed that ""code"" that MUST BE ENTERED as part of the registration. That letters/numbers are impossible to read. On several of our attempts, we were certain we had the code correctly deciphered, only to have the information we had already typed in erased and prompted to re enter the user name, password, and code AGAIN.After a couple frustrating hours we gave up. The option to change the code until you get one that is more easily understood is not an option when registering this device. There is no explication of why the attempt to register was denied. And you are forced to re-enter almost all of the information EVERY SINGLE TIME.In conclusion: I purchased a gift on Father's day that he still cannot use on July 1st.. I am not pleased with this purchase.",CHANGE THE CODE!!!;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Excellent! I love being able to download foreign newspapers. The children's book we purchased was a bit difficult to read. Other than that, my experience has been fantastic, especially as a professional interpreter with the need to read in several languages.",Great for Reading International Papers;;;;;;

Review: I don't read a lot but when I do it's usually on vacation when I don't want to carry a book around with me. The Kindle is perfect for me!! I also use it every morning for devotions and now don't have to use my bible.

Review: It's pretty neat. Makes for fast reading and very efficient for commuting. Sometimes I can't see the page numbers (I suppose because they aren't proportional) which makes keeping up with assignments a little difficult. But it's great for leisure reading. There's no backlight so you need light just like a regular book. I guess thats less strenuous on the eyes
Title;;;;;;: It's pretty neat. Makes for fast reading and very efficient ...;;;;;;

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"This is a device that demonstrates regression. This is very portable, better at being glare free than other Kindles of its type and is fast at the things it does. Some things must be clearly noted: 1) There is no internal illumination and it can be read ONLY with external .light;" 2) there is no audio and no jack for audio. At the special price of $59 with adverts it is probably overpriced anywhere from $10 to $20. I don't recall the description well but the features it was lacking came as sort of a surprise and I felt they should have been mentioned more prominently. Otherwise it operates well as a cheap reader.""
Review: Less than you pay for";;;;;

As always I thing these things for come with some kind of help book.  I purchased this item for a Senior and we are still working on some of the features.  I also wish they would have come out with the accessories at the same time.  It is hard to find accessories for this item at this time for it being so new.
Title;;;;;;: As always I thing these things for come with some ...;;;;;;

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"I got this basic Kindle after my first Kindle froze and 1/3 of the screen got the dreaded lines throughout.  Apparently this is a fairly typical issue and if you are past your warranty there is nothing they can do to help you.  Anyhow, I got this newer version of the base Kindle and while it does the job, I don't care for the page buttons nearly as much as the older model.  I much preferred the buttons on the side of the screen that you used to turn pages....now I often accidentally tap in the screen and the pages start moving.  Either way, I still enjoy how slim and light the Kindle is...it makes it much easier to read why standing and riding the bus or while traveling.",Don't care for the page turning on this model;;;;;;

Review: It is the perfect addition to the Kindle Fire HD and my smartphone. I can take this to football practice and read outside without worrying about the glare. And the charge lasts a lot longer than either of the other devices I mentioned.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I really like the adjustable font size and style and the non-glare screen allowing me to read outside under a tree. Downloads really do take only seconds. Review: My daughters were thrilled with their kindles since both are avid readers. They loved the functionality of the kindle and both said it was the perfect gift.  A+ for me!  Thanks Amazon for making it affordable.

Download speeds are also really speedy. So if you want to read your book fast then this is the kindle for you.

This was my first Kindle so I don't have any other experiences  I'm very happy with the readability of this device  I'm in my 60s so I was concerned a small Kindle wouldn't have  large enough font. It has been just great and I can read it fine

3.0 out of 5 stars,"Liked the older version w/ the QWERTY keyboard better.  Still, it seems to work pretty well.  This was purchased for my wife on the occasion of her old Kindle up & dying on her.
