4.0 out of 5 stars,"Been reluctant to use a kindle however, I wish it had been around 20 years ago.  Merely have to look up titles and order the book, immediately at your fingertips.  Carry all your books in a small package.  Couldn""t be happier.It's like magic",It's like magic;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Love it!  I don't need all the bells and whistles, can't afford them anyway.  I just wanted a device where I could download books that had a screen without glare.  It's the closest thing to reading real print.",Love it!;;;;;;

Review: Everything it was promised to be. It's very light and the 6 inch may be small for some but for a general use it gets the job done. I have all my textbooks on the kindle and it makes it significantly easier to do school work. The touch screen is responsive and battery has lasted me 2 weeks so far and still have roughly 50% with moderate use. Bit of a fingerprint magnet if that bothers you but nothing a sleeve of a shirt can't fix. I suggest purchasing the kindle if you are in the market for an Ereader

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Great device.  I never thought that I would want to switch from ""real"" books to a kindle but I have changed my mind.  It's great to take when traveling - no more packing several books to take along.",I love it!;;;;;;

We don't always turn on the generator if it's going to be out for a short time. It can be calm and sunny and the power goes out so this device is a form of entertainment.

Review: Love it!!!! This is my third kindle and I would never use another reader. I have tried another and it was rubbish. The battery drained quickly and it was hard to load books on it. Kindle is amazing with the no glare and long battery life. It syncing to all devices. B

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Clear and easy to read. Downloads are quick as is the setup. Relatively painless in the first few days. I like the size. It is about the size of a paperback book. I do miss turning the page, but the rapid page turns by touch are easy to get used to.",Fine Summer Reader;;;;;;

Review: Great Product. Language was French. Had to get on line to determine how to change the language so I could operate the devise. Other than that happy with the thing. Great feature in that I can down load all of the books we have already purchased to this devise.

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"Eh. I like it. I just dont love it. It is slightly smaller than I thought, and its just a bit slick, which makes holding it when you're laying on your side difficult. 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Initially doubtful about the Kindle (I'm a paper and ink guy myself), I've come to love this e-reader! Small weight, great readability, easy learning curve. 4.0 out of 5 stars,"Overall I like it. The one annoying things is that, unlike my Nook, I can't change fonts/size/margin to make the text more comfortable on my eyes. If there is a way, it's so secret it's not even in the documentation.",Overall I like it. The one annoying things is that;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"Very good for the price. I like that it is glare-free. I prefer the controls on the original Kindle, especially the buttons on the sides. Newer kindle has touch screen to change pages which doesn't work very well when using a waterproof bag. Convenient size but screen is too sensitive to touch.",Very good for the price.;;;;;;

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"Very nice unit, easy to read and easy to set up. 5.0 out of 5 stars,"The Kindle makes reading on the go so much easier.  It's convenient, portable and exactly the right size to comfortably hold when readying. 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I have an old one. It is so much fun. NO, it does NOT have a light, and you really don't need one. You can buy a clip-on battery-powered light if you want. It is easy to use right out of the box. It is handy as can be. Love it!",It is so much fun. NO;;;;;;

Otherwise great, and a very good investment costwise.",The reading experience is great--very clear and easy to read with aging eyesight;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"I bought this replacement kindle after I lost my first generation kindle. the touchscreen is a little too sensitive for me. if i accidentally touch the screen (which seems to be every ten seconds), the font changes, or will try to highligh phrases, etc etc. So annoying! I miss the old school non-touch screen kindle. actually this new kindle is a tad bit heavier than my old one! about 0.6 ounces I think, which doesn't seem like much but my wrists can tell the difference, when i'm lying in bed and holding it up to read.That being said, i love kindle--being able to hold thousands of books in this 6-7 ounce reader, battery life that lasts about a month.",Touch screen is too sensitive;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I didn't have high hopes for my kindle, as I cannot look at a screen long. I saw that they were 50 bucks for black Friday so I got one and cannot be happier. I now have hundreds of books on my kindle.",yep;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"In hindsight I would have ordered the lighted screen, but this was my first ""e-reader"" and I stuck with the least expensive option. Still a fine purchase! Very pleased but it needs an app to secrete ""old book smell"" just to make the reading experience right.",Still a fine purchase! Very pleased but it needs an app ...;;;;;;

Review: I bought this Kindle for my wife because she's a big time reader and I wanted to save space in our apartment. Not only a great space saving idea but she loves the way it works as well as the battery life. The only thing is I should have gone for the 3g service.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Love it, at first I thought that the idea of kindle was silly, I mean afterall why not just use a laptop? But this is as easy on your eye's as a book and even easier to manage than a laptop. Loving it!",great!;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love my kindle, only one problem.  I am in my sixties, I read everything, and I mean everything.  However, with this product I received no instruction  book.  Everything else listed above was included.  I am sorry, I do not have anyone to show me how to use all these gadgets.  So while I love my kindle I will be sending it all back unless I receive some kind of instructions that I can read, and which will show me how to use it.  Thanks.","Love it, but have a minor glitch.";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I actually was a little sceptical about purchasing a Kindle, I am the person who just loves books in the ink and paper format.....but I really do love my Kindle, especially for traveling and for night time reading.....no bending of pages......I would recommend this product.",but I really do love my Kindle;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I got this as a gift for my intellectual boyfriend and loaded it with rare books that he's been wanting.  If I had bought the books individually, I'd have been out nearly a grand - however because I could buy them on the Kindle Store - it cost me (including the Kindle hardware) just under $250.  My stalwart love broke down in tears and I have not seen him without his new reading resource since.",Fantastic Gift Option;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"exactly what I wanted, this is my second kindle, the first was a keyboard kindle, which was great, but destroyed by my toddler. The touchscreen is a nice upgrade, i like the feel of it and it is a perfect size for reading anywhere.","which was great, but destroyed by my toddler";;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Its great. I like it because I can now have acces to my big college textbooks without having to go on my computer or having to carry the actually books around. For the same school purposes thought I would love it if it had stand alone note taking capabilities, that would make it a perfect machine. Oh and a but more customisable options, like the ability to set my own screensavers. But ITER than that its great",Its great. I like it because I can now have ...;;;;;;

Review: I've used the Kindle app on my tablet but find this is much easier on the eyes. I look forward to being able to read on the beach . it is lightweight and fits easily in my purse. I would definitely recommend it to others .

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Love this thing, even after swearing up and down that I'd never buy an ereader. The screen is so similar to looking at a page in a book that I forget sometimes I'm not. Battery lasts for ages and I'm kicking myself for waiting so long to get one. Must have for any avid reader.",Fantastic!;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"This ia question directed to Amazon and to those of you who have Kindles of different types. Because of seeing disabilities, I use reverse screen background on my phone to read. The background is black with the letters white.  This is what I can best see. Does any Kindle with touch screen offer this?  Thank you to Amazon and  Kindle users for any helpful information. My email is a.pam80@yahoo.com. Thank you!",Reverse background available?;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"This is my first experience with this device. So I haven't been ""imprinted"" with previous impressions or experiences with Kindle (of whatever version).  It's useful, fast, user friendly, can't say a bad word.Still, reading on Kindle is like watching opera on tv or drinking diet coke. You know that something is wrong here. It is a dead reading, really.",Kindle;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"There is nothing that I can add to the discussion except to say that the screen becomes extremely dark in already dark conditions. If you're always travelling, get an ebook light, and choose the iKross light available here on Amazon.",Light needed;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I just read a review that it can't be used at the beach!  That's the only place i use this device BECAUSE IT IS PERFECT FOR READING AT THE BEACH!  It is my favirite place to read and ONLY the kindke white works there.  I don't know what that girl is doing wrong, but this is a great device for ANYWHERE you want to read!",Take Me To The Beach!!!;;;;;;

Review: I have  a kindle fire hdx that works fine for reading but doesn't work in sunlight.  I also have tendinitis in my thumbs do the fire is hard to hold. I purchased the kindle  just for reading. It is much easier to hold . I didn't realize that it just doesn't work indoors if you don't have a lot of light.  I returned it for the one with the backlight
Title;;;;;;: Unlit  paperwhite poor visibility indoors with low light room;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Love it!  Ads are no problem as it is when it's off.  Doesn't interupt reading.  Screen doesn't light up on a paperwhite but that is fine with me.  Lightweight, easy to carry for travel, font size adjustable.  Easy downloads.  Best $ I've invested this year other than my daughter's education!  Thank you Kindle and Amazon!",Love it! Ads are no problem as it is ...;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Got this for my daughter as a birthday gift.  I think it fits the bill well for her (age 13).  I have version with the paperwhite, backlit screen which I love for reading at night (you can turn off the lights and not disturb your spouse...), but did not want to invest the extra for a teen that still might lose or damage the device by accident (in backpack, etc.).",backlit screen which I love for reading at night (you can turn off the ...;;;;;;

Review: Unable to use due to be unable to change language from German to English. . This was purchased for a kid for his birthday a few weeks ago and we're unable to use it and unable to return it..unfair...
Title;;;;;;: Unable to use due to be unable to change language ...;;;;;;

Review: I absolutely love this. I had the nook color for reading previously. This is so much better lighter easier on the eyes and to navigate. Granted you aren't surfing the net with it and that's fine. It's great as an e-reader.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"A great purchase.  I'm not a big reader, but love books.  I find that the Kindle allows me to read faster and not be intimidated by large book.  Great screen quality and I love the ability to define a word instantly while I'm reading.","Woot woot, Kindles rock!!";;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Hi,I have a question. I'm studying in this moment, i need to read many e-books but in some e-books its needs apps something like bookshelf, adobe, etc. The question is: Can I to read e-books through this apps en the kindle tablet? I thank someone for an answer.",I have a question please;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"So far so good. Basic reading device. Much lighter than holding a book. Screen is not too bright like holding a tablet. I ordered at 5pm on Dec 23, got it at 9am on Dec 24!!! I just loveeeee Amazon.",So far so good. Basic reading device;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"This is such a great little device!! Small enough to fit into a purse, super easy to set up, and so many books! Plus, since libraries usually tend to have large selections of e-books these days, it's possible to borrow all kinds of books for free. I hesitated to get an e-reader for a long time but I'm really glad I finally did!",This is such a great little device;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Great device that reads just like a regular book. It is very easy to buy books with and only takes around a minute to download a book. You can get books with great prices. The only downside is that you cannot read the kindle in the dark, but you can read it in direct sunlight, which makes up for that. If you are a person who loves to read at night I would recommend the kindle fire.",Met expextations;;;;;;

Review: I received this kindle as a gift a while back and use it on a daily basis. I like it better than the more expensive kindles because it does not have a back-light and does not make my eyes tired. It is ergonomically designed and has an extremely long battery life if you disable the wifi. The storage space is much more than anyone can ever need.
Title;;;;;;: Better Than The More Expensive Kindles;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Even though the Kindle Paperwhite has been touted as the preferred Kindle for those of us who just want to use  it for reading, I think my 6"" Glare-Free one just fine.  Excellent choice for me!","I think my 6"" Glare-Free one just fine. Excellent choice for me";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,Absolute best device to read a book. Have had a nook and used both an iPad and iPad mini and this is the best of all of them. With the sweet deals on books from Amazon this is the best deal around.,"Best eBook Reader, period.";;;;;;

Review: I've had a competitors product for years (actually I've had three of them).  Where I never had a problem with them it just wasn't fun reading.  I am so totally in love with my Kindle  I don't want to put it down.  Reading is fun again.  And with Kindle Unlimited I don't have to get enough.  One of the best purchases I have ever made!
Title;;;;;;: One of the best purchases I have ever made!;;;;;;

Review: I have been using a kindle for years now. I started with the generation 3 with buttons to turn the page. I wondered if I should upgrade but when one died I bought another on ebay. I decided I needed to switch to the new kindle when that one stopped working (I read alot so it is not terrible that they eventually die). Well I HATE IT. The font keeps changing at random moments when I touch the screen.  I thought maybe it was a malfunction but others have had the same experience. The button changing of pages works just fine and you never have to worry about fonts changing or other things happening when you don't mean it to. Back to ebay and a used kindle I go.I use the kindle ap on my IPAD and touch screens do not have this same problem so it does not have to be this way. I prefer a kindle to the IPAD but not when I'm not in control.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love having my books on one small device instead of tripping over mountains of them. I also love that the screen is glare-free and that I can adjust the size of the type, making it easy to read.",EASY to read it;;;;;;

Review: definitely a great device. does what what it needs to do very well. one thing ive noticed is on certain cites (gmail) it wont let me scroll down in the inbox. it also randomly closes out of cites on the internet but will open them back up when you get back on. it supports Wi-Fi just fine so im assuming this is just because it is ment more as an e-reader than an all purpose tablet. over all its a great product and does what it needs to do very well
Title;;;;;;: definitely a great device. does what what it needs to do ...;;;;;;

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"I love Kindle's and have purchased some of each of them (Kindle, Fire, Paperwhite) as gifts. I was very disappointed that this one did not have the ability to listen to my audio books. My previous regular Kindle had this ability and nothing was mentioned about the audio no longer being available. Quiet disappointing. Amazon often offers the ability to purchase the Audible version of the book which can be synced. No idea why this is offered but can't be used with anything other than the Kindle Fire which I do not prefer to use for reading.",No ability to listen to your Audible books;;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"Really ticked. I swore I'd never buy another reader because they don't last long in my experience. However, I love to play every word and another game as a stress reliever. You can't play games in this version. Really should make that clear in the description. I could've just kept using my iPhone to read. Waste if money.",I love to play every word and another game as a ...;;;;;;

Review: I am enjoying my Kindle however there is 1 problem and that is with the technology???  If I want to order a book I have to find an establishment that has Wi-Fi and that is not always convenient!!
Title;;;;;;: I am enjoying my Kindle however there is 1 problem ...;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"My husband and I were each given one for Christmas.  We're older and only slightly into electronic devices and were dubious at first.  However, this Kindle is so easy to use and has wonderful features.  It's easy to order new Kindle books and light-weight enough to easily hold up to read in bed.  We're hooked now.",Love It!;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"This is a pretty amazing e-reader..I really appreciate the fact you can note, highlight, and comes with a dictionary. You can note when you have an observation, highlight and review, or look up a specific word right then and there.The only drawback is NO back light....but that also equals limited eyestrain.It is user friendly and light-weight...a great gift!",This is a pretty amazing e-reader;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Very light. I use it when taking subway. It's small so that I can hold it and operate by only one hand. Reading with kindle, my eyes feel much more relaxed  than reading in iphone. Recommend it.",Recommend it.;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"It's ok, although the technology is not mature enough. As you will see, there's always a lagging when you flip a page or scroll down the web. And when the e-ink refreshes, it will always blackout for a second, which is quite annoying. Overall it's a good e-reader. I hope the technology will fix all the problems in the future.",Good read;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Great device. Battery is fantastic. It is small and light weight and perfect for reading outside. What do not like though is every time I accidentally touch the page, something happens like the menu pops up or I accidentally turn the page, kinda annoying.",It is Good;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I didn't know my wireless password so I spent a lot of time with my wireless company getting it.  Once I had that I had no problem getting myKindle to the point that I could input the free kindle book for May and once I figured out how to turn the pages on the touch screen, I had noproblem reading the book. I have not had my Kindle long enough to give a fair review of it.  I liked the lightness of it and the fact that I couldchange the font so it was easy to read on the screen.  I think in the long run I am going to love it and feel the same way as I do my laptop.I will wonder how I got along without it.",New Kindle Reader;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Exceeds expectations.  Having a general preference for books over computer screens, I like the black-and-white, reflect-only screen.  It is far easier to read than a light-up screen.  Also, the capabilities of the device are beyond what I had expected.  The dictionary/Wikipedia function is particularly useful. I actually prefer this device to those that are much more expensive.",I like the black-and-white;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,I was confused about the Goodread. Why isn't it like my previous kindle? I'm not fond of having to go through so many steps to make my books available for reading. I like the smaller kindle and it's updates from my previous older one. Now I need a cover for it.,"kindle, 6""";;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"I received a Kindle w/keyboard several years ago as a gift. It rapidly became the most-used device I owned, because it did everything I wanted and did it efficiently and effectively:  a model of beautiful simplicity.  The dual-sided page turners made reading using just one hand a breeze.  A tragic beverage spill recently rendered this device unusable, and I was heartbroken.  That sorrow was increased when I discovered only touchscreen devices are now available.  Having read reviews from numerous customers like myself, I believe Amazon would be wise to come out with a paper-look reader that has both touch options as well as the manual page turners and cursor toggle.  Until then, I guess I'll hope for a miraculous recovery for my Kindle w/keyboard.","Golden rule: don't ""fix"" what isn't broken";;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"It's light, easy to navigate, easy to use and carry around.Perfect to read in sunlight, not so much in dim light. Navigating to new pages is natural, though if you hold it left handed there may be occaisons where you flick backwards by accident.Really enjoyable to use and carry around.",easy to navigate;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Works perfectly. It is very easy to read on in the day. Extremely simple to use. Battery life is insane. The only downside is you can't really read it in dark lighting. I've read users bought the case with the flash light built in. That should solve my problem. I should have just gone with the paper white, but the deal for this one was just too good to pass up. 4/5 Stars",Almost the perfect reader;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Love it, I had the first gen one for the longest time until my dog sat on it. Then to replace it i got this one. I can say not disapointed what so ever and like some of the new features and the touch screen makes it much eaisier to hold.",replacing the first gen.;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Simple, light weight, LOVE the screen.... Just life looking at a paperback book page :)  Lots of on screen helpers and options, yet keeps it simple and easy to understand and use.  Hold a huge amount of books.",Great little reading buddy!! Just right for my purse;;;;;;

Review: I thought that if u just want to read a book this kindle is great but if u want to do anything else u have to get something different. But otherwise everything was great I didn't see a reason to buy a newer one because this one was great!

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,I had a keyboard Kindle and it froze up and I wanted another one and couldn't get one because they had upgraded to white page. Lets all get together and not buy anything till they come back with the keyboard. I know there is a lot of the ereaders that liked the keyboard. So why can't Amazon give a choice of a Keyboard and all the others. I think they could quit making other new Kindles and put all the new stuff in the keyboard.,"Wake up Amazon, Make more Keyboard Kindles";;;;;;

Review: I bought this for my mom for her birthday. she loves it she is 77 years old and is not very computer savvy but she can work her kindle the only thing was it did not come with a instruction booklet. and being in a different state I could not set it up for her. but she had a friend do it for her.
Title;;;;;;: I bought this for my mom for her birthday. ...;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"The glare-free screen makes this the perfect device for reading all your books, just load your book on the device and get along.Size is perfect for carrying.Only cons is the Experimental Navigator and maybe its missing some kind of apps, but for what you bought it (reading) is great.",Great for reading.;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"An easy to use and simple reader.  The only problem I had was getting it to connect with my Wi-Fi, as it was not clear that I had to use the WPS;" it would not accept the Wi-Fi password.  I recommend printing the User's Guide
Review: especially for someone like me who has not had experience beyond an earlier Keyboard Kindle.""
Title;;;;;;: An easy to use and simple reader";;;;;

Review: I got the Amazon Kindle for Christmas from my daughter.  I love the lightweight feel to it and how easy it is to manuever and view books.  Love the fact that you can review a book before purchasing.  I've always loved having a paperback in my hands but this has turned my reading into a whole new level.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Fantastic product that brought me back into the e-reader fold. I use it everyday on my commute to work: It's light and I can hold it in one hand, so it's really easy to keep reading in a packed subway.",Fantastic product that brought me back into the e-reader fold;;;;;;

Review: I have been very unhappy with this reader and intend to send it back immediately to exchange for the older style unit with the keyboard. I have found the touch screen to be very awkward to use and do not like it.
Title;;;;;;: I have found the touch screen to be very awkward to use and do not like it.;;;;;;

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"Not totally sure as yet. Like the new touch screen features, except when I must mistakenly touch something that gives me all kinds of under line hints or descriptions which has taken me to much time to get rid of. All I want to do is read without any disruptions to my view;" just like a book!""
Review: Like the new touch screen features";;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I bought this as a gift for my mother. She was reluctant to try e readers as she loves the feel of a new(or new to her) book. The kindle is perfect size for that. Getting her use to the software, (picking books out, etc) has proven a challenge but it definitely worth it. I know she enjoys the product and for that, i'm grateful.",Mothers Valentine's Gift;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Great ereader if that is all an individual wants, but personally I just wish I would have opted to spend a little more and purchase the color display Kindle in the beginning. I did end up purchasing the color unit also.",Great ereader if that is all an individual wants;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"If I was rating this for me, I would give almost a five. But I am rating it for a 94 year old that I am letting borrow it. The only feature I taught her to use was to turn the pages. Everything else would confuse her.  I wish there was a way to turn off some of the features, as she just doesn't get it. So the older version that wasn't touchscreen may have been easier for her. This isn't as user friendly as my iPad, but I think after I get used to where everything is, it will be great for being in the sun. Which was why I bought it. As my iPad isnt all that great in the sun.",it will be great for being in the sun;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Absolutely fantastic. I love my kindle, they will never quite mimic the feel of a good book but are incredibly convenient, easy on the eyes, and with the e-ink display it looks like you are reading from paper.",Great product at a great value;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I am disappointed that my previously puchased and read books do not appear in the appropriate created collections. My previous Kindle packed up, so it is most frustrating.  It is slightly too thick and heavy, but I like the one touch page turn - a big improvement.  Overall a much better Kindle.",One tuch page turner a great improvement;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I had a 2nd generation Kindle until spring, when it finally died after 7 years of faithful, trouble free service. This one similarly has long battery life and a great reading screen. It's also incredibly light, which is great for my wrists prone to tendonitis. I wish the screen were a little bigger, though, because I feel like I am constantly turning pages (and I use the 2nd smallest font size).",Another great kindle;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"When I opened the box, I thought this was too small. However after trying it out - I really like it. The ads on it do not interfere with your reading screen, so I don't mind them. Compact and user friendly.",However after trying it out - I really like it. The ads on it do not interfere ...;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I really enjoy my kindle. I just wish I could see it a little better in darker settings. Although, how to accomplish this without making the back light too bright (which is the point of the kindle), I'm not sure.",I really enjoy my kindle;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"order this kindle last night last,  day of the sale , I wasn't totally sold on  this one because no light but at $ 59.00 how can  you go wrong . I almost bought the kindle paper white for $99.00 but the 40 % difference in price for lighted screen  didn't justify the upgrade .",kindle vs paperwhite;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Love this! Received as a gift and never knew what I had been missing. This is small & compact enough to carry with me and gives me reading opportunities I would have missed. Never thought I needed a Kindle since I have an iPad, but I was wrong!",A Must Have!!;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"I liked my original Kindle better.  Perhaps once I get used to this one I will like it also but right now I find it more difficult to use.  I can't seem to easily find things on it, such as the Kindle store, my books that I have bought, etc.",I liked my original Kindle better;;;;;;

Review: Although a bit smaller than I would like it works great.  Set up was a snap! I do like the fingertip control....I was afraid I would miss all the buttons from my first generation kindle but I don't at all.
Title;;;;;;: Although a bit smaller than I would like it works great;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Yes, we love it.  It was a gift... and our first Kindle. Something we will be able to easily port around. Downloads are easy and incredibly fast;" set-up was super easy. Like the touch screen and dictionary look-up. The nonglare screen suits our needs best. Think the other reviews cover the rest!""
Review: Perfect";;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I absolutely love my new Kindle, 6' Glare-Free Touch screen. It's everything it was said to be. I have had my Kindle for a few weeks now and already read 5 books. Now I have what I want to read with me at all times. I no longer have to lug around my laptop or a bulky book.",I absolutely love my new Kindle;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I finally decided to buy a Kindle e-reader for distraction free reading. I am comfortable with the touch interface because that is what you get on Kindle App on tablets, which I used previously. Overall, I am enjoying reading books on my new entry-level Kindle. My three suggestions to Amazon for future improvements: (i) I would have preferred a slightly larger Kindle, more in the paperback form factor. Perhaps, they could have provided a larger screen by narrowing the bezel at the bottom? (ii) I would have liked audio pronunciation of words in the dictionary. Of course, this would require audio functionality and a speaker but that would be a worthwhile addition. (iii) Allow use of multiple accounts for sharing within a family. My wife has prime membership, I don't, but to use prime benefits, I would have to de-register Kindle from my account (where I have many books) and register with wife's account. What a hassle and how unnecessary! Perhaps Amazon can fix this with a future software upgrade?",Nice and convenient but can be improved;;;;;;
4.0 out of 5 stars,"It works like I expected. Hard to read in low light but I guess that's what Paperwhite is for; I didn't want to spend extra as I bought it for vacation reading. Overall
Review: I like it fine;" its lightweight and fits in my small purse.""

I have always been a Nook or iPad book reader...but this device is just amazing!!! Love how light it is and thin.  I can finally read outside with no problem and it holds a charge forever.  Perfect device for the right price! Love it!!!
Title;;;;;;: but this device is just amazing!!;;;;;;

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"Nice reader at a nice price, but needs better accessories, such as a cover with a light built in.  Kindle Touch was a superior, better built device, but was more expensive.  It had much superior accessories though.  Should have looked for a decent case with light before I jumped on it, but at the $49 Christmas price, it was tough to pass on it.",Needs better accessory choices;;;;;;

Review: Prefer this unit over the Paper White. Easy on my eyes and doesn't reflect light. Haven't used most features but will in time.Borrowing from libraries is a good feature and books are returned automatically.Do wish screen size was proportionate to a standard paper back !
Title;;;;;;: Easy on my eyes and doesn't reflect light;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"This Kindle has exceeded my expectations.  It was very easy to set up, and very easy to adjust.  It is less tiring on my eyes than the regular monitors and tablet screens I use daily.  I am planning on buying another one soon to give as a gift.",It was very easy to set up;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Works very well as expected.  Would like to be able to read it in the dark and I believe that is available on some Kindles.  We have a couple of Kindle Fires but prefer the lighter versions just for reading. The original Kindle let me buy and download books from anywhere.  I even sent one to my son who was on a ship in Japan and he could buy books from there.  Now, I have to be near my router to download a book.",Would like to be able to read it in the dark ...;;;;;;

Review: Ive had this kindle for a long time but that should help with knowing the depedability. i still use it to read my favorite books. Especially on long trips. I went to bahamas in nuly and took it with me on a 4 hr plane ride.
Title;;;;;;: need to have for the people that like to read;;;;;;

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"My husband got me this for Christmas and while I wanted a Kindle, this one is very limited on what it can do. If you only want to read and do nothing else like get on the web on other sites and play games, do social media etc. then this is the Kindle for you. It is easy to use and it does what it says. I like it because now I have a back up to the Kindle app on my phone. I won't ever lose my ability to read my books if one device breaks. It is pretty plain, it would be nice if they made it more colorful or the screen brighter. Guess you have to upgrade for that though.",Pretty plain;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Would give a 5/5, but the terms of the delivery were less than satisfactory. My Kindle was scheduled for a Sunday delivery through USPS, but they didn't even make an attempt. Then at the end of the day they said that they had made an attempt...So I'm really just removing a star because the USPS lied about its delivery attempt. I really could care less if Amazon can't deliver on Sunday, I would just prefer that they don't lie to me about.Aside from that, the Kindle is awesome, and it has been making my morning commutes on BART a lot better!","the Kindle is awesome, and it has been making my morning commutes ...";;;;;;

1.0 out of 5 stars,"Hate this Kindle (this is my fifth Kindle).  Purchased for my grandson for Christmas as a ""deal of the day"" back on Black Friday.  Didn't notice that you can't change the brightness at all, so every book is the same dull screen brightness.  I know I should have read the specs better, but still, Amazon needs to be more clear about how this works.  I just noticed it as I was trying to set it up to give him tonight for Christmas.  I'll give it to him tonight, but will be returning it for a better model.  This is truly entry level and there is virtually no reason anyone should ever buy this model.  Stick with your phone, iPad, or spend a few more dollars to get the paper white.  This model is like your first car in high school.  Hate, hate, hate it!!",Spend a few more dollars and get the next model up.;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I was hesitant to get the new kindle 7th gen, seeing that it does not come with page turning buttons, I was very impressed with this new kindle and it's touch screen, very cool, ever since i got it i've been using it constantly, it's light enough to use with one and and it's compact, i love it.",Very good purchase.;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I have the Kindle touch with 3G and I love it! I read a lot and drive a truck, it is great for the time when I'm unloading and have time to kill. I also like having the 3G, it takes less than a minute when I want to buy a new book and download it anywhere I go. I've had the previous versions and just bought the new Fire HD for my daughter for Christmas.",Greatest invention ever if you like to read.;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"When I bought this Kindle, I was unaware that there were so many different kinds all with different features.  Even though I like the glare free screen, I would have liked to have it also be back lit so that I could read at night while my husband is trying to sleep!",Even though I like the glare free screen;;;;;;

Review: I really love this thing.Battery life is great. Touches register accurately. The screen is high enough resolution I think. It does shading of images ok. It charges quickly enough.I guess it could use an audio out. Not that big a deal to me though. Phones do audiobooks just as well as a kindle would.
Title;;;;;;: As a first time Kindle owner...;;;;;;

Review: It is light weight and glare free. Touch friendly with quick response and adequate choices for fonts. Downloads are easy and fast. I love my kindle. Now I just need to get my family to stop stealing it.

Rating: 2.0 out of 5 stars,"I purchased the Kindle for Kids bundle.  It was delivered promptly . . .  hmm, trying to find something else nice to say about it.I own a Kindle Paperwhite, and absolutely love it.  The screen is sharp and bright, so naturally I assumed that the Kindle, sold in the above bundle, would be as good, or at least close to it.  Nope.  I kept trying to figure out how to make it brighter--it was like reading a 40 year old paperback.  Even under a good reading lamp it was terrible.  I looked in all the settings and there is no way to adjust it.  As for it sensing the ambient light, all I can say is I tried it in everything from dark to bright lighting and it was terrible, plus the clarity of images was no good at all.I bought this for a (nearly) 7 year old, to try to make reading more fun, but it is so visually unpleasant that I did not even show it to him for fear that it would make him hate reading forever.  Returned it the next day.  I guess I will have to come up with the money for the paperwhite.  Big disappointment!",Terrible Display Quality;;;;;;

Review: I love this sweet little thing!!!!  So light weight and does only what I  need it to do which is give me books to read and nothing more. Finally I  can sit outside and read!!!

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"It's great, but I bought it as a gift for my husband and now cannot remove my name from it. On his own Kindle, he is known as a user only. There must have been some step I missed when I was purchasing it, but not being too computer saavy, I apparently missed it. It's a bit annoying. He is up and reading now, after some effort, so I guess all is well in the end.","It's great, but I bought it as a gift for ...";;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I was resistant to the kindle, but have quickly fallen in love with it. My only complaint is that there are grammar errors in the text occasionally that I matched up with the printed version that aren't there. Otherwise, so much easier to hold a kindle in bed than a book.",I'm a convert.;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"It works great, the only problem I am having is the touch screen is very touchy, I am having a bit of trouble keeping it from flipping several p[ages at a time.  Otherwise, my very early Kindle died on me and I did not want the paperwhite or the Fire, I read outside and in very high lighting conditions and the original type of Kindle work best for me.  I also like the light weight.","It works great, the only problem I am having is the ...";;;;;;

Review: This is a fantastic Kindle! I got mine for Christmas and have loved it ever since. It is great for outdoor and indoor reading and the highlighting and dictionary features are very helpful. The only thing I do wish it had was a backlight you could turn on and off depending on your location. Overall I would recommend this kindle to anyone!

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love my little Kindle, I have a KindleFire also,  but my favorite is  my baby Kindle, it fits in my purse. I take it everywhere and I can read it at the beach or by the pool. I love having two Kindles because I am never without a book to read.",I love my little Kindle;;;;;;

Review: I liked it very much until recently.  I wish I had gotten a Nook instead.  At least there is somewhere to go for help.  Can't utilize the users guide if the device is not working properly.  And trying to find answers on line is a joke unless you're a geek.
Title;;;;;;: I liked it very much until recently;;;;;;

Rating: 1.0 out of 5 stars,"I am not that familiar with a Kindle products, and this is not what I thought it would be. We purchased it as a gift for an older person, and it is too small and difficult for her to operate. I am also not pleased that my account was automatically loaded on it, so I would be charged for anything she purchased. We plan to return it, but would like to delete my account information from it before doing so. Please advise us how to do this.",Not What I thought It Would Be;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"My old kindle broke and I needed a new one. The interface is nice, touch controls are intuitive, and the battery life holds up to expectations. the screen is just as visible as the old keyboard model that broke on me.",Lives up to expectations.;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"Just like the Touch Kindle just smaller and lighter. I thought it was backlit so I could read in the dark, but it isn't so I am returning it. BTW when you get a new Kindle you have to redo load every book if you want to read in a place without WiFi. That takes eons!",Just as good as the Touch Kindle;;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,the software is inferior to the old kindle unit.  too many stupid options and over complicated.  obviously designed by a non reader who has no idea of how book readers read.,"newer, more complex, inferior";;;;;;

Review: no more searching for over priced books in dubai's massive bookstores instead i purchased the over priced kindle they sell at the virgin megastore . Still quite happy with the purchase. Please send me a nice leather cover for it Amazon as I can't afford it anymore.:)

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"Not as good as the model it replaced. I have been using this reader for a few weeks now, and I don't find it as user friendly as previous models. It is noticeably heavier, thicker, and more difficult to turn pages. Especially hard to use one handed. God help you if you bump the screen accidentally or lay something on it, or place it face down, your off to lost in kindle land!  I think in kindle's zeal to make their basic reader better, they have reinvented the wheel and made it oval .It's the basic reader folks...Keep It Simple!  If I can find someone still selling the older version in new/like new condition, I will buy one and give this touch screen lemon away.",NOT AN IMPROVEMENT;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"After Voyager came this resolution seems too low. I love products with high resolution or larger screens. I had Kindle DX for a long time and then I searched for a big screen for a long time. I like the portability of the Kindle 6"". Used for 6 months before getting the high resolution cousin. Love the book ecosystem very much. Great for on the go travel. If your morning commute involves train get the Kindle, if it involves car get Audible!",I love products with high resolution or larger screens;;;;;;

Review: I really liike this kindle. Especially the dictionary is awesome and very convenient. The technology is amazing!!!It was delivered to me quickly as well. Thanks Amazaon!:)
Title;;;;;;: Especially the dictionary is awesome and very convenient;;;;;;

Rating: 1.0 out of 5 stars,"My experience has been HORRIFIC with the people who answer the telephones , expecially in the Phillipines,  also with inability to send me the correct cover and to pay for its return,and the fact that I have to figure out how to use it at my age , 84!!!!! This is the 4th Kindle I have purchased and  over 180 books!!!!!",My experience has been HORRIFIC with the people who answer ...;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I have several different generations of kindles. This Kindle is outstanding. Thank you Amazon for exactly what I wanted. And I received a very quick , response shipping and delivery. Thank you Amazon...Respectfully David Bagley...",Kindle;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Bought this for two relatives for Christmas and they love it.  It is amazing all the free books that you can download from the local library right to this kindle.  It reads just like a book, only better and for $59, you can't beat the price. Very pleased with this purchase!",Bought this for my son and sister-in-law and they love it. It is amazing all the free books ...;;;;;;

Review: My Kindle is awesome. New books are cheaper than buying regular books. We bought ours on black Friday and recieved the following Wednesday. Kindle battery stays charged forever. Well not forever but for a long time. I have 10 hours of reading time and it still indicates a full charge.
Title;;;;;;: My Kindle is awesome. New books are cheaper than buying regular books;;;;;;

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"I am happy with the kindle but I wish that I would have bought the Paper White. I realized that my night light is not so great for reading and if I had the ""paper white"" I could adjust the screen a bit to be able to read in lower light situations.Otherwise I really like it.",Nice but wish it was brighter....;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"The interface is different. I have had two of the earlier Kindle touch units, until I left it on an airplane.  This one is very robust but don't try to read it waiting for the bus in the rain.  Little splatters of rain on the display freak it out.",It's ok;;;;;;

Review: Very happy with the new kindle. But the reason I had to get it is that my old kindle died after just 2 years. The screen developed a blank bar of about 5 lines of text. This time I have also purchased for $20 the 2 year replacement plan. I am pretty disappointed that the original didn't last longer. Thee laptop I am writing this review on is almost 10 years od. Well done Dell.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I bought it for my son to use in high school, to encourage his reading. Phyllis Peck",I especially love the fact that I can cancel orders that he ...;;;;;;
5.0 out of 5 stars,"The Kindle is my favorite gadget I've ever purchased. It has replaced paper books for me, and I recommend it to everyone I meet. I can't say anything more;" it's the best.""
Review: Best purchase ever.";;;;;
Really miss the page forward and back buttons on the sides of the frame.  The touch screen for page turning makes it more difficult to have a seamless reading experience.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I prefer a non glare screen for reading, particularly on the beach. this kindle does just that! Review: When we got the item I planned to return it as it would not charge.  We tried to get it to turn on and it would not. We ended up using another USB charger and it would charge so kept the Kindle.  The USB that came with the Kindle was faulty but the Kindle itself work quite well.

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"very difficult to get started, required help from amazon to log onto wifi, set up amazon account and learn how to navigate.  Very different from the Kindle Fire that I owned previously.  Love the non-glare and now that I have been using it, it is good!",Love the non-glare and now that I have been using ...;;;;;;

Review: I love this Kindle. User Friendly and great clear but glare free screen. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is looking for a kindle/device to simply read and don't want all of the other things that come along with a tablet. Great Product!

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"Though not unhappy with this new Kindle, I don't appreciate having to look at their ads every time I go to turn it on.  If there is a way to turn this off I would love to know.  I'm going to order a cover so I'm not bombarded with whatever Amazon wants to sell me when I look at it.",Get rid of the ads;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I also have the Kindle Fire, and love it, but could not read it on the beach or in the sunlight, this works well in the sunlight, but not in a dark room, no back lite on it, but with a small lamp on it works well,much lighter than the Fire. 1.0 out of 5 stars,"This is a real rip-off.  It is a stripped down kindle, you can't skip chapters, you can only go page by page.  It's nowhere what the old kindle 5 way or keyboard were.  I had it less than five minutes before packing it up and sending it back.  Buy something else.",This is a rip-off;;;;;;

Review: Very good quality. This kindle is so much lighter and easier to operate than my kindle fire. I decided to buy it again since the price was very reasonable. I like the new features. You can read where you want to at anytime.

This replaces an older Kindle. The new user interface is very nice. I have yet to learn the new document organization on the device. I cannot create collections on it directly. The only organization seems to be in the cloud.

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"I would prefer having a print user's manual.  It is irritating to have to bounce back and forth between the manual and attempts to try instructions from the manual, when both are the same gadget.  Otherwise, I like the Kindle very much.",Print the manual!;;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"The device felt cheap to me. I have an original kindle that I love and it still works well. But they had a deal on this so I thought I might upgrade. However i just wasn't thrilled with it. I also had spotty wi fi reception where my original worked just fine.Amazon was great as usual about the return. It just wasn't for me. Maybe the higher version is better, I just would not recommend this particular one.",Returned it;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"The size, the weight, the screen.. everything's perfect in this device. I love that it's as easy on the eyes as a book. I've recommended to all my book-lover friends.",loved it;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"I'm just so frustrated that they decided to put neither speakers nor a headphone jack in this thing.  The whole device is absolutely incredible.  So, so, so nice.  And then, seemingly for no reason, they make this incredibly stupid decision to purposefully strip it of any audio capabilities.  So much for audible and Kindle Narration being compatible with your own company's device!",Seriously No Audio!?;;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"Like being able to touch page to move on. Do not like having all the other things (highlights,etc) that I never use suddenly appear on the page if I move the Kindle wrong or accidentally brush it.  Would much prefer prefer such things at the top of the page with buy and home, etc. to tap. Like the lighted page, though. All in all I prefer the way my old Kindle works.",Like being able to touch page to move on;;;;;;

Review: Love my new Kindle.  I got it for Christmas and downloaded my first book right away.  Finished it in a week.  Love the super light nature of the device and ability to adjust the font size too.  Can't wait to read my next book.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"This Kindle was perfect! I just wanted something compact and portable so I could read whenever I wanted and this was the answer. If you don't need a tablet, and only want a device to read with, then I would highly recommend this Kindle.",This Kindle was perfect! I just wanted something compact and portable so ...;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"The Kindle ghosts alot - when you turn a page, you can still see the page before it like a carbon print. I've called tech support and that's ""normal"" for this version. It's face is smaller than I expected as well, but on the flip side, fits in a purse nicely.",you can still see the page before it like a carbon print;;;;;;

Review: I love it!!!!  so easy to carry.  I have read books on the Fire and Ipad and didn't like either the way I like the Kindle.  I will always be a book reader and continue to buy books but this is the next best thing.

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"I like the size, but not the touchscreen. I have to be careful to hold it at the edges or I accidentally advance the page. I couldn't find a non-touch screen in my price range. I'm having trouble getting my books organized into collections. My previous Kindle was organized by collections, but I don't know how to transfer that organization to this new Kindle, so I've been doing it manually from the cloud. It's cumbersome. My previous Kindle stopped working. It would continuously reboot itself about every 10 minutes, which is why I got this one. The screen is non-glare. Overall, I like it and would recommend it.",I like the size;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Much cheaper on Thanksgiving Day. Slightly light than Kindle Paperwhite. A little bit darker than the screen of Paperwhite. I compared the response speed of Kindle 6 and Paperwhite, Kindle 6 reacted a little faster.",Much cheaper on Thanksgiving Day. Slightly light than Kindle ...;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Very confusing to start up - had to have someone else get it going and then I was finally able to finish the process. Review: This was very hard to get set up.  It would be good if the guide book would be in print so you could look at as you go instead of it all being online.It took several attempts to get everything going.  Almost asked to send it back.  But now we have it set up and it is working.

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"Refurbished KindleLooked brand new.Tried to update and register the computer. Do not know what generation it is (question asked for me to update and register the  computer).Do not like touch screens, will have to get used to them.",Do not like touch screens;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I really like this. The only thing I would say that is the slightest bit annoying is the lag the screen sometimes has, however, I know this is a function of the technology as a whole and is not a fault of the design itself.",Really really loved this;;;;;;
3.0 out of 5 stars,"I like the 6"" Kindle very much;" it was a great price.  However

Review: Great product. Once I received it I wished I had purchased the paper white version for easier reading in darker environments but after a couple of hours of use I realized the back light was an overpriced option. I love this thing!

I am really impressive by the shipping speed of Amazon. I orderd and just waited for two days. The package is perfectly packed and full of belonging items. The kindle is brand new without any scratch. I really love it.

Rating: 3.0 out of 5 stars,"Am going to return it for a kindle paperwhite.  If you want to save the $50 that's fine, but in the long run you'll get a lot more use out of a kindle that has a light in it.  First thing my wife said the second day she had it was ""can i read in the dark on this?"" It hasn't been used since.So i'd have to say that the kindle itself is of great quality and it does what's advertised,  but as for user friendliness I just don't see what a kindle without a light will do for most consumers as i'd assume most people want to read in bed.",Buy a paperwhite - don't bother with this one.;;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"I find it difficult to read. Very dull even in good light. I would not have purchased it if it had not been such a good deal. But even so, I will not be using it very often... Maybe when I travel. VERY disappointed.",Not a Happy Camper.;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Great product. My only problem with it is that you cannot read at night without an independent light. You have to buy a separate night light. Otherwise, it is a great product, especially for my 13 year old kid.",Great product. My only problem with it is that ...;;;;;;

Review: This is my second kindle.  My first one wore out after much use.  This one is great.  The touch screen is very touchy bit I think after I use it more it will be easier.  If you are just reading with your kindle this is a good one.
Title;;;;;;: This one is great. The touch screen is very touchy bit I ...;;;;;;

Review: I love this kindle! so easy to throw in my purse for a long car ride or for use at home! I love the fact that you can still read the screen easily while out in the sunlight. Can't do that with all e-readers!

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"Bought this as part of Prime Day on a whim - I had no idea how much it would change my reading experience! Still love a good paperback, but it's a wonderful addition to my daily commute and other travels.",Still love a good paperback;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"It is simply a fantastic machine. It allows me to read for very long hours because  of the larger text size options. I am very happy with this kindle, it is both easy to use and fun to read on. I will buy buying one for my whole family very soon.",Simply Amazing;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I am enjoying the Kindle.  I'm still learning how to navigate the books and controls,  but I am very happy that the Kindle is so light and that I can enlarge the font.  Looking forward to reading future Ken Follet and George R.R. Martin books on it.  I hope to link to the public library when I am more proficient.",but I am very happy that the Kindle is so light and that I ...;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Love it, but must say that I am very disappointed that the text to voice was taken out of this model. I would have kept my old kindle touch had I known this.","Love it, but must say that I am very ...";;;;;;

Review: This works very well.  I like being able to send PDFs to it.  I wish the browser worked better though.  I cannot access all my email accounts with it.  I believe the browser is being developed though and this is not the main function of the Kindle right now.
Title;;;;;;: I like being able to send PDFs to it;;;;;;

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"What good solid product! Little glare, screen reads like a real book and the text is adjustable, great features on the home screen. Page transition is bit rough but overall it's great entry level e-reader.",What good solid product;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"Didn't expect it to be so small and very light but overall it will get the job done for my reading list.Shipping was great, arrived on time! Just a little disappointed with the size and not as many features.","Shipping was great, arrived on time";;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"It will be fantastic when I'm completely familiar with its functions.  Practice, practice.  Easy to read, comfortable to handle and carry. 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love my new Kindle. Have always loved reading and this is so much more handy than lugging a book or books around. I can read a book a day so if I had to travel, it was either pack more books or purchase them wherever I went (which was too expensive). Kindle is the solution to any reader's dilemma!! 5.0 out of 5 stars,"the touch screen is surprisingly sensitive and it really exceeds my expectation to be honest. I love it so much.the only problem would be that it is not very PDF friendly, I have to convert the format if i need to read PDF on kindle, which is really a pain.",Love it;;;;;;

Review: The best thing about buying a kindle is tht you always get good support from amazon. I have had Kindles for a while now and have been very happy with them.

Review: I love this kindle. It's super easy to navigate and its size is ideal for those who like to carry ereaders in their purse like I do. I had gotten one for my mom and instantly wanted one for my own. :) It's perfect!!

Rating: 2.0 out of 5 stars,"I didn't realize there was no backlight, which means it can't be used in a darker room.  That makes it similar to a book, but i don't recall ever reading that in the product description.  fortunately Amazon took it back with no problems.",fortunately Amazon took it back with no problems;;;;;;

Review: I really like the idea of holding/reading so I never wanted a Kindle. My boyfriend surprised me and got it for my birthday. I'm obsessed with it. You can still highlight and also double click a word for the dictionary. I love it!!

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Great for reading outside.  My one complaint is the location of the power button on the bottom of the device.  I have sometimes turned it off by accident when I rest the kindle on a pillow or on the ledge of my stationary bike.  Other than that, it seems very easy to use.",Love eInk readers!;;;;;;

Review: Love it!!! is small light easy to read and the touch works for what it is meant for. Turning pages is easy and confortable. Scrolling potential books is not so smooth with the touch but is easy to get use to it. Overall is a great product.

I love this Kindle!  It is exactly what I want - no frills - just for reading - fits perfectly in one hand.  I have my Amazon/Kindle account hooked up with my local library so I can check out books and save some $$$.

Review: I bought these for my daughters.  I have the original kindle and  one thing I loved about the glare free readers is it feels as if you are reading a paper.  My kids have already borrowed books from the library and are loving it. It is one device where I don't have to tell my kids to put down. I love it.
Title;;;;;;: I have the original kindle and one thing I loved about the glare free readers is it feels as ...;;;;;;

Not only will the old apps not work, but I can not find replacements that will work on this Kindle.","As good as the old Kindle, but no apps!";;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"I'm giving four stars instead of five because of the lack of customization options offered.  For example, I can't change the sleep screen unless I decide to root the device.  Something like this should be easily personalized.  Other than that issue, everything works great and does exactly what it should.",Something like this should be easily personalized;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"This is the best product to read e-books in the market.The first kindle has pretty much problems but the new kindle is word buying, the battery life is very good and there are lot of new features added. Review: Absolutely love it. Having never owned an e reader or any type of product like it I was impressed by the ease of use. I especially like how small it is.

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"Love the size and the light weight. Very simple to operate. 5.0 out of 5 stars,"I love that I can read this anywhere, even outside.  There is no glare so it does not hurt my eyes after a long time reading like with lighted screens.",I love that I can read this anywhere;;;;;;

Review: Don't like the touch feature  too sensitive doesn't go where I want. Hard to hold and not have letter size change all the time !  Want my old kindle

Rating: 2.0 out of 5 stars,"The classic keyboard kindle was their best device by far. Touch screens are terrible for reading books, one accidental touch of the screen and you've turned the page. It would be great if they would, at a minimum bring back the buttons on the sides for page turning, and allow you to disable the touch screen when reading.",Touchscreens Suck on a Kindle.;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"This was a valentine's day present, it works perfectly so far,this is my first Kindle ever so I'm very excited, as a reader from latinamerica where books are difficult to get, this is just the perfect present, quite a lot of battery life, and amazing display, I love it :)",Awesome device;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"This product came earlier than expected which was such a nice surprise! The kindle is exactly what I needed, that could just be personal preference but if you want something just for reading this is the product for you!",Fast and Exactly what I wanted!;;;;;;

4.0 out of 5 stars,"Met all expectations except for having all the adds appear on the sleep screen.. when purchasing the kindle it said has ""special offers"" but did not specify what that meant.. upon further investigation turns out its advertisements.. the ""special offers"" phrasing is very misleading.",Met all expectations except for having all the adds appear ...;;;;;;

Review: The Kindle is better than I could have imagined. The books are easy to down load and my eyes do not get so tired from reading.  Plus I can carry it with me with the books I have requested ready to read. Thanks Amazon
Title;;;;;;: The Kindle is better than I could have imagined;;;;;;

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"I love my Kindle. Sometimes it is difficult to select the word I want for look -up. It tends to highlight the sentence unless I enlarge. But other than that its great. I would save for a Kindle fire, though. It's larger, the font is easier to read w/o adjustment and allows you to read in the dark.",I love my Kindle;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"I haven't been able to read in months because my eyes are bad.  With the Kindle, I can read again!!!  I love that I could change the font size to allow me to read.  I don't even have to hold it up to my nose to read or use a magnifying glass anymore.",... able to read in months because my eyes are bad. With the Kindle;;;;;;

Review: There were no instructions on how to use the kindle.  I don't know how to find what I want nor how to return or clear the screen.  My daughter said I should go on line and pull up instructions.  The only thing I learned was how to turn the kindle on.
Title;;;;;;: There were no instructions on how to use the kindle ...;;;;;;

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"Kindle perfect for reading, very light and handy.!!! i love it. Though I couldn't find in the user's guide, if it ever turns off or something. Review: My husband surprised me with this Kindle as a birthday gift.  So far it has exceeded my expectations. I would certainly recommend this to any book lover.
Title;;;;;;: The screen is easy to read and it is so light;;;;;;

Rating: 2.0 out of 5 stars,"I have the 2nd generation Kindle's with the keyboard, 3G, and have been using it for over 3 years. I love it. I don't know what I ever did without it.Fast forward. I have two young boys who are both avid readers, and so for Christmas I bought them the most basic Kindle possible.Battery life is horrible. For my boys, after 3-4 hours of reading over 3 days, they have to recharge. This is after wif-fi being disconnected (if that makes any difference with these Kindle's which I'm beginning to think it doesn't...sigh). The original Kindle's will last weeks on a single charge as long as there is no wi-fi connected. I love this for long plane rides, which my family often endures.  Amazon took what had to be the most simple user experience for someone that just wants to be able to read books, without having to store all those paper books in their home, and made it the most complicated little machine to do so. It has so many ""extras"" that link back to Amazon in some way, mostly to purchase books or join programs (this is not including ""ads"" which are just junk and I would strongly suggest removing from the device if you haven't already done so, you can do this after you buy them for  20 extra dollars). I get that, Amazon wants to make money and make the device seem ""in tune"" with the user. Over time these features may prove to be useful, and with time it will become easier to navigate through the rabbit hole that is the ""Settings"" area but for now, it's just an overly complex system to have someone download and read a book. I truly wish Amazon would come out with something with no extras, no free time, no google reads, no books suggestions, no experimental browser....just a device for downloading and reading books, (more like the original Kindle) and continue to support it. Not everyone wants touch screen and multiple options and ""features"" at the cost of efficiency and simplicity.",Disappointed;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"I had to replace my Kindle Fire because of problems with the charger cord and plug-in receptacle.  The Fire and this e-reader do not operate the same way and I am having trouble finding different screens and navigating.among them.  Why not a short intro to using the paperwhite, without having to download a whole manual?Also, the hard cover I got strictly for the new reader does not fit it properly.",I had to replace my Kindle Fire because of problems ...;;;;;;

I'd rather depend on friends, the NY Times and quality book reviewers.",Amazon is intrusive;;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"People have written so many thousands of reviews on Kindle that I am going to confine my review to a few key points:  This is my third Kindle.  I put off buying one for a long time.  While I treasure ""real"" books, the practical realities of modern life, complete with frequent moves and family and friends around the globe, make having 300 books at my fingertips priceless.  I got my Paperwhite model when my original, basic Kindle ""died.""  I do like the Paperwhite (backlighting) function.  What avid reader doesn't swoon at the idea of sneaking a read in bed in the dark without struggling with a flashlight?  But I do NOT like the touchscreen for turning pages.  I am not a Luddite.  I use and appreciate technology but I just do not get the appeal.  To me, a huge part of the appeal of a Kindle is that it is small and light.  I should be able to hold it in one hand an turn the page WITHOUT LIFTING A HAND.  With the old models, you could apply gentle pressure to the page turn lever on the edge of the device and - voila! - next page.  Now it feels like a work out: lift-and-reach-and-lift-and-swipe-and.... no thank you!  I can't take it.  I find myself avoiding picking my Kindle up because the prospect is so unappealing.  I am looking for a used or refurbished model.  Amazon now offers one model with a ""pressure based turn sensor"" but at $200 you pay for the privilege.  This Kindle has lots of other functions like vocabulary builder and a built in dictionary.  I don't use those.  I wish there were a better inventory management system, ideally one that would sync with an online index of one's books.  It's a bear to try to organize content.  If it were not for the page-turning issue, I'd give it a much higher rating.  It is a pretty neat little device otherwise.","Regrettably, not a page turner";;;;;;

2.0 out of 5 stars,"One might say I should have done more research but because I also bought the paper white, I realized that the screen was very dim. Most definitely it is one that requires bright light in order to read at night. Reading during the day posed no problem. I wish I could return it but I am out of the country and it would be too expensive",disappointed;;;;;;

Review: I bought this last year and paid $79.99 for it.  The screen is ruined in the same way my 1st Kindle was.  I would not recommend this Kindle.

Rating: 2.0 out of 5 stars,"That's about the only pro I can give this ereader. It works. You put books on and you read them. Reading the product description I knew there was no back light for it, I knew it was small, I knew there was no apps or internet access. That's fine I have a nook and laptop and tablet for the additional things. I really did want a simple ereader. Next time, I'll get something else. The only reason I am keeping this one is because it was only $60 and I understand you get what you pay for.Pros: 1. It's lightweight. 2. It's simple. 3. The touchscreen is pretty cool. 4. And the special offers on my home screen every day keep me updated about new books and products.Cons: 1. Glare-free? That's a laugh. I can't read it in the dark because of no backlight (which I knew about) but I can't read it during the day because I can't see the screen it's nothing but glare from whatever light I'm using. 2. You can't brighten the screen. 3. I really don't like how the kindle loads up, changes pages, or loads new content. It blinks and freaks out for a few minutes like it's crashing. Then it straightens itself out. 4. It doesn't turn off. Just the screen goes off. 5. In order to get to your user manual and set up instructions, you have to set up your kindle.....what's the point?All in all I got it because it was the cheapest one and I wanted to be able to use the rest of my Christmas money to buy books. Next time, I'll spend the extra $40 and wing it....or I'll go back and get a nook instead.",Well....it works?;;;;;;

3.0 out of 5 stars,"I really liked this kindle. I found it easy to use and it didn't take me long to figure it out, especially when this is the first eReader I have ever purchased. I called Amazon and they told me that the Kindle I got was an older touchscreen model and that it didn't come with the adjustable light feature. I paid $59.00 and they told me if I bought the $79.00 one would Include the adjustable background lighting. I thought I was getting the same one as the $79.00 and that it was on sale. This was very misleading and disappointing. Now I have to pay a return shipping cost which I feel is unfair because they failed to mention that I was purchasing an older model. Review: The price is so perfect for this non glare kindle. I didn't want anything fancy and this is perfect. I'm a college student and with the built in dictionary I have been building my vocabulary. A great gift for all ages

Review: This is my second Kindle. Bought the basic model for outdoor reading and use at the beach. The non glare is a must and is not found with the iPad. Size is perfect for carrying in a purse. Easy to.use and access purchased books or those from Public libraries.

Rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars,"LOVE IT!!!!! This is my second Kindle. This one does a lot more thanmy Kindle 1st generation and a lot smaller and touchscreen. Also gota great sale price on it , so got it as a Christmas gift for myself.",LOVE my Kindles;;;;;;

5.0 out of 5 stars,"Bought for my 8 year old and is great for her. Love having an electronic device that she can only read on, not play games.",Happy;;;;;;

Review: The Kindle touchscreen is perfect. I does one thing  and does it well. Easy on the eyes it's a great way to read a book.

Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars,"I've never owned a kindle before so this was a good way to work into it. I also don't need anything crazy fancy, because all I want to do is simply read a book.
